story:
What is CoronaCore

CoronaCore is an Open Source project which allows you the relive the original World of Warcraft and the Burning Crusade expansion on your server, your desktop or anywhere else you want.

As the original World of Warcraft is continually evolving and expanded with new content, and game features, we started this project to give those who missed out on the good old days when the game was different. Which means, if you’re a casual player and haven’t gotten to see all of The Burning Crusade, this is your chance to see and enjoy it fully.

CoronaCore enables you, to install and run your own local or hosted server for The Burning Crusade. The project is not about creating a private server, it is about developing the software to do so and enabling you to run it for friends and family!

Who is behind it?

The project is developed openly on GitHub by Christian Schamara and Daniel S. Reichenbach. Daniel founded the original project to create free World of Warcraft servers in 2005 and to this day continues to be involved in the community. As developer his primary interest are delivering great software and fun to the community. Christian joined the scene in 2007, and since then has been contributing code and game content almost daily.

After almost nine years of development which we funded ourselves, we have reached a point where we finally require community support to continue active development, and continue providing World of Warcraft and the Burning Crusade expansion for your enjoyment.

In order to achieve continued development we started this campaign to let you take an active part in the development and the continued growth of the project.

What We Need & What You Get

Due to the increased amount of time required to continue development of the CoronaCore server for World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade, we have to invest much more time into development, which exceeds what we can privately fund.

  • to increase our output of new features, bug fixes and content updates, we would love to work full time on the project which means roughly 30 hours per week for each of us,
  • to provide better support for you, our users, we have to invest further resources into supporting material, e.g. to provide pre-built installers,
  • to provide user friendly documentation that lets you install our software and game content on your own server or desktop, we have to invest further resources.

This combined exceeds what we can achieve with our spare time currently, thus we would love to spend three months working full time only on bringing you the best World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade experience ever!

For two developers to expand the projects features for three months we would have to collect 1.800€ for each developer monthly, or simply said 3.600€ for the two of us to work one month full time to make our server software a greater experience for you and your friends!

The Impact

With your support we could:

  • implement missing features much faster,
  • fix incoming bugs on a daily schedule,
  • revamp game content for zones, instances, battlegrounds, etc.
  • create missing game content such as world events,
  • finish incomplete features.

On top of that, we could expand our user support, allowing you to easier run your own World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade server for your friends and family.

Perks we offer!

As we are an Open Source project, we offer that will make our software more fun for you to use. With each perk, you can chose an increased level of support to run your own server, and have fun with friends and family:

  • for 25 € we will provide continuous mail support. Shoot your questions, and receive instant help from the development team,
  • for 50 € we will install our software on a system of your choice. Watch, enjoy the show and just play the game!
  • for 100 € you will additionally learn how to upgrade your server easily when new features and game content is released to have even more fun.
  • and finally for 250 € we will provide personal support over Skype, and use TeamViewer to help you with running and updating your own server.

Risks & Challenges

If we do not get sufficient funding for working full time on the project, we will still invest what we can gather to improve the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can not support our efforts with funding, you still can tell your friends about our project. Every helping hand is more than welcome!

Talk about us on Facebook, tweet about the project or just spread the link to this campaign!

Thanks for reading, and of course for any support you can provide!

Server Example Videos

The following videos give you a quick introduction what your can do with CoronaCore.

If you want to see more, follow us on Facebook. We are taking requests for videos, too.

Starting your own server and playing

This videos show how you start the server and log in to play World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade.

Customizing your own server

In addition to playing you can also create and run your own content! Build events, create your own stories, or just fool around!

To do so, a simple text editor is sufficient.

Credits

World of Warcraft, and all World of Warcraft or Warcraft art, images, and lore are copyrighted by Blizzard Entertainment, Inc.

story:
I’ve been making video games for over 17 years. These days I’m a game designer (you can check out the titles I’ve worked on here) but I started out as a tester.

I was 20 years old and I got a job playing video games for a living. What could go wrong?

It turned out that all kinds of weird things happen when making video games, like a boss pinning a man down and threatening him with a dart, a programmer going for a swim in a toxic pond and a member of staff trying to run away, only to be taken hostage and dragged back to the office.

With so much to tell I decided to write a book called “Pizza Whores – Will Test Video Game for Food”, because that’s what we did most of the time, worked long hours for only the additional extra pay of free food.

Although the manuscript is finished (you can get a copy for your Kindle on Amazon and you can read early drafts of a few chapters on the blog), call me old fashioned but a book isn’t really a book until you can leaf through its pages, put it on a shelf or pass it on to friends.

My aim with this campaign is to raise $10,000 to cover the cost of the first printing of the book, distribution and marketing. With physical copies of the book I’ll be able to get some real traction spreading these unique, revealing, bizarre, and funny stories of life inside the games industry.

And, of course, getting a copy of the book, a signed copy of the book and even an acknowledgment in the book, are all perks.

Even if can’t contribute with your hard earned cash, please, please, please, spread the word!

Thank you!

story:
WELCOME to the coolest new way to use what you have to get ALL you need, want AND Desire… just by playing a game… no really it is JUST that simple. Einstein says the easiest way to learn is play.  My Barter Game™ was created by Ana Hawk, CEO of Instant Barter to specifically help people understand trade or barter in a fun EASY way. When asked to share her knowledge of Barter and write a book she said, “Books are boring let’s build a game and make it fun and easy!”  This works for businesses as a team building exercise, adults, and children ages 7 and up. Great for family fun too.  EVEN BETTER we have just secured US Manufacturing! Fulfillment will be by Disabled Vets and a program the RED PAPER CLIP CENTER (our nonprofit) will be handling. FUNDING from this campaign even helps launch the RED PAPER CLIP CENTERS programs. For more information on this visit: http://www.RedPaperClipCenter.com . SO see you get to play AND Help others! And it may even be a tax deduction… could life be any better? 

HOW TO PLAY: 

You start the game with $100 cash and $100 trade currency the big GIMMIE of the game is when you go around BOTTOM LINE (our start) you need to PAY $200 in cash! So you see you have to quickly use what you have to get what you need!   You do this by acquiring TRADE cards and working deals to redeem them for their cash or trade value to make PROFIT.  BARTER started civilization and capitalism and is the original economy and also a solvent one.

The purpose of this fundraiser is to produce more of these games and sell them both online (www.mybartergame.com) as well as in stores, where we have several large retailers around the WORLD ready to add our game to their shelves! Your contribution also gives you the opportunity for some great perks, our way of saying thank you and involving you in this entire process! BONUS: you could have one of the first 500 HIGHLY COLLECTABLE copies; these will never look this way again version. How often do these opportunities come along? Once in a lifetime MAYBE! If you are unable to contribute financially at this time, we invite you to share this campaign to help us launch, educate, make some real change and have fun doing it! THANK YOU!!!!!

story:
Summary and Features

Trial and Error is a simple 2D platformer but with a twist. Here are some features we have planned for the game:

  • A full story/campaign
  • A time trials mode
  • A level editor with steam workshop
  • Slow/Fast Zones that slow down time or speed it up
  • Red/Purple Spikes where the red spikes will leave your body as a platform, the purple spikes won't
  • Steam trading cards and achievements
  • Multiplayer (With friends, or random matchmaking)
  • Mobile Versions
  • Console Versions

Multiplayer may not be a feature at launch, so you may have to wait a while before that feature becomes available. Multiplayer will include a chat, but no voice chat.  On console versions there MAY be online multiplayer and there will be no chat or voice chat.

    Rewards

    Standard Backer:
    • Warm Fuzzy Feelings
    • A chance to get into the private beta (it will be a steam key and only 100 people will be in the beta)
    Bronze Backer:
    • Warm Fuzzy Feelings
    • A chance to get into the private beta
    • Your name in the credits in the game, website, and special thanks youtube video
    • Your name will be entered to be randomly selected out of 5 people to have the names of the 5 main characters be YOUR NAMES
    Silver Backer:
    • Warm Fuzzy Feelings
    • A chance to get into the private beta
    • Your name in the credits in the game, website, and special thanks youtube video
    • Your name will be entered to be randomly selected out of 5 people to have the names of the 5 main characters be YOUR NAMES
    • A free copy of the game once it comes out
    Gold Backer:
    • Warm Fuzzy Feelings
    • A chance to get into the private beta
    • Your name in the credits in the game, website, and special thanks youtube video
    • Your name will be entered to be randomly selected out of 5 people to have the names of the 5 main characters be YOUR NAMES
    • Three free copies of the game once it comes out
    Platinum Backer:
    • Warm Fuzzy Feelings
    • A chance to get into the private beta
    • Your name in the credits in the game, website, and special thanks youtube video
    • Your name will be entered to be randomly selected out of 5 people to have the names of the 5 main characters be YOUR NAMES
    • Four free copies of the game once it comes out
    • Access to all concept art, soundtracks (used or not), and any unused level designs that you can re-make yourself in the level editor!
    Diamond Backer:
    • Warm Fuzzy Feelings
    • Your name in the credits in the game, website, and special thanks youtube video
    • Your name will be entered to be randomly selected out of 5 people to have the names of the 5 main characters be YOUR NAMES
    • Four free copies of the game once it comes out
    • Access to all concept art, soundtracks (used or not), and any unused level designs that you can re-make yourself in the level editor!
    • Get into the private beta once available. (Regardless of the 100 people cap)
    • Get a 30-60 minute skype call with me and any other developers who are available.
    Early Bird Backer:
    • The first 25 people to pledge $10 get everything from the Platinum Backer

    Where does the money go?

    • Most of the money will go to the proper equipment needed to develop the game, music, and graphics
    • Another big chunk will go towards hiring people
    • Some money will go towards the iOS App Store Monthly Fee and Android Google Play Store one time fee
    • Some money will go towards the website domain name
    • A small amount will go towards the Steam Greenlight one time fee.

    Stretch Goals

    There are NO stretch goals as the $5000 will be enough to cover an iOS, Android, PS3, PS4, PS VITA, and Xbox One development and releases.

    *NOTE: CONSOLE VERSIONS ARE NOT A 100% GUARANTEE*

        How you can help if you can't afford to pledge

        You can help by sharing this link with your friends and have them pass it on to their friends! It will really help out!

        FAQ

        • Q: When will the game be released on Steam?
          A: Whenever I finish it, and the greenlight is accepted.
        • Q: When will the greenlight take place?
          A: Once the indiegogo is funded, I will post the game to steam greenlight, and then send every backer a link to the greenlight via email.
        • Q: When will we find out more about the game?
          A: You can go to http://youtube.com/TrialAndErrorGame to get updates on the game's development!
        • Q: Will there be console versions of the game?
          A: With the tools we'll be given. It's 100% possible to easily do that, but we need a Sony/Microsoft Dev License. I'm hoping there will be console versions but no 100% guarantee.
        • Q: What consoles will you publish on?
          A: We're hoping to publish on Xbox One, PS3, PS4, and PS VITA.
        • Q: Will there be Multiplayer on consoles?
          A: Yes. But possibly only splitscreen play.
        • Q: Will the mobile versions be different to the PC/Console versions.
          A: Yes. It will have it's own story and all new levels. No level editor, but you will be able to share high scores through Game Center and whatever Android has!
        • Q: How much will the game cost?
          A: The PC/Console games will be $4.99-$9.99 (undecided) while the mobile versions will be only $0.99-$1.99 (undecided) *All prices are in USD*
        Ask more questions in the comments to get answers!

story:
Brass Empire is a strategic deckbuilding card game for 1-4 players (ages 10 and up) and plays in about 30 - 60 minutes. It takes place in a Steampunk universe where each player takes on the role of a different corporation hiring the best employees, constructing building, and manufacturing steam-powered machines. Players battle and sabotage each other to amass economic wealth and influence to win the game.

 Brass Empire Components:

  • 4 Personal Starting Decks (40 cards)
  • 5 Corporate Reserve Decks (25 cards)
  • 4 Mining Platform Cards
  • 100 Labor Market Cards
  • 100 Design Department Cards
  • 50 Brass Point Tokens
  • 10 Hit Point Tokens
  • Full Color Rulebook
  • A Nifty Box

Exclusive Extras for Backers:

  • Any and All community created cards from the ENGINEER Tier (up to 5 cards)
  • 5 Exclusive Company Starting Cards each feature a unique and powerful card for each corporate faction to place in their reserve deck.
  • 5 Company ID cards with unique risk/reward mechanics
  • 5 Unique Mining Platforms for each corporation

2 Player / Alpha Components:

  • 2 Starting Decks (22 Cards)
  • 3 Corporation Starting Reserve Decks (15 Cards)
  • 50 Labor Pool Cards
  • 40 Design Pool Cards
  • 30 Brass Point Tokens
  • 5 Hit Point Tokens
  • A Nifty Box

Welcome to the Steampunk world of Cobalt. For centuries, Cobalt has been ruled by corporations seeking to enhance their wealth and influence with Brass. Brass doesn’t just fuel the economy but literally fuels the technology and transportation of the world through its unique thermodynamic properties. Every day these companies compete and battle to expand their territory and authority. Companies work to optimize their labor force and resources to mine the most Brass in each territory through corporate espionage, technology, security, and even sabotage. You work for such a company and have been tasked with expanding into a new region by constructing a new corporate complex, hiring employees, and battling other companies in the area. The player who earns the most Brass will lead his company to victory in the region.

Each turn, you will play Employee cards from your hand to gain resources. These resources will allow you to acquire new Employees, Buildings and Units for your deck. Along the way, you will acquire buildings to enhance your hold on the region and command units to attack other companies and mine for Brass. At the end of the game, the player with the most Brass is the winner.

"(Brass Empire). A deck-builder with deeper player interaction. Played 8 times since PAX!" -Ziggy @arrogantgamer

In short, Brass Empire is kinda like if Ascension/Dominion (Deckbuilding games) had a baby with Magic/Hearthstone (Battle Mechanics) and it was Steampunk. Check out some of the videos below to learn more about how to setup and play Brass Empire:

Brass Empire has a lot more player interaction than other deck builders.  It is essential that you observe and adapt to the other players' strategies.  Here are some of the mechanics that make Brass Empire unique from other deckbuilding games:

  • Reserve Decks - Each player selects a corporation and has a small set of cards that only they can purchase from giving each faction it's own flavor and starting strategy. Advanced players can customize these decks.
  • Dual Center Rows - One row represents the typical resource generating cards while the other row is comprised of cards that stay in play to sabotage players or give you an ongoing buff.
  • Combat - Powerful units can attack and destroy any permanent design cards.  Be sure to strike first so an opponent doesn't take out your mining platform.
  • Mining Platform - As long as this building stays operational you can convert the construction resource into victory points, but if a devious opponent takes it out - you'll have to rebuild or change your strategy!

We want you to try the game prototype for yourself! Check out the draft of our beautiful Rulebook here or give us your feedback and print out the Rules yourself here. Download the (older and out of date) art-free Print and Play prototype here. 

You can learn more about the game on BoardGameGeek:https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/181393/steamcraft

"Played this at PAX Prime 2015 in the Indie MEGABOOTH and had a blast! This game plays like Dominion meets Magic The Gathering, with 5 factions that each have a unique and valid strategy. Very well thought out with just the right amount of strategy and each game takes just the right amount of time." - AngelKatalyst 

 "When all the Brass was collected and only one corporation remained, all the Child Geeks thought (Brass Empire) was a winner." - Indepth Preview by Father Geek

"Played it with a friend of mine who had never played a Deck Builder before, and the game is so well designed he was able to pick it up and soundly thrash me. It is great to see another card game come out that is not based in the fantasy realm, I think it ranks up there with Star Realms, both in gameplay and artwork." - WolvenGarde 

 "After playing through the #PAX2015 Indie Mega Booth tabletop games, @mgnade's (Brass Empire) was my favorite. Very polished and super fun!" - Rob Pereyda, @rpereyda

Every Kickstarter Backer will have the option of including their name in our Official Rulebook in addition to following all project updates. Every Backer that pledges $10 or more will have the option of downloading/receiving the PnP files.  The Print and Play files will contain all of the cards unlocked as Stretch Goals and all 269+ cards from the core game.

This tier includes the core game (all 5 factions) and everything you need to play the game with up to 4 people.  In addition to getting the full retail version of the game at a cheaper price, all backers at this tier and higher will receive ALL of the stretch goals and Kickstarter Exclusive cards unlocked during the campaign.  This will include any/all of the Kickstarter Exclusive cards from the STEAM ENGINEER Tier.

Get the 2 Player Alpha Edition shipped to you as soon as the Kickstarter is over! The Alpha Version features over 100+ cards and 3 factions from the main game along with tokens and a limited edition box.  You can help shape the final product by providing us with your first impressions and feedback from playing this version of the game before anyone else!

This will be a limited and Exclusive Run from theGamecrafter which is who we used for the physical demo productions pictures seen above. We will send out surveys for this tierimmediately after our campaign and order these items ASAP after our Kickstarter funds are deposited. Estimated Production / Shipment is less than 2 weeks in the USA.

STEAM ENGINEER - $500 (Only 5 Spots)

Collaborate with the team to create a Kickstarter Exclusive card based on your name, face, photo, pet, design and/or idea to appear in Brass Empire (includes a Design credit in the manual). We will send you a large print of the artwork from your card in addition to everything from the ALPHA PLAYTESTER tier (4 player game, Alpha Version, First Wave Shipping, and all stretch goals unlocked during the campaign).  

    We have some additional content and Kickstarter Exclusives that we'll be able to include free of charge to every backer pledging $40 or higher if we exceed our funding goal.  Here are just a few of the stretch goals that we have planned.  We will release more news and details on Stretch Goals as the campaign progresses:

Unfortunately we have to charge shipping on this campaign for international backers (Shipping in the U.S. is free and included!), but are continuing to work to minimize and subsidize the shipping cost to you. 

  • United States: Free / Included
  • EU/Canada: $10
  • Everywhere Else: $15

We plan on using Customs-Friendly Shipping and have a few fulfillment centers we are already working with on quotes.  As a result, you should not get hit with customs, brokerage, or import fees. 

International shipping is annoyingly expensive. However, to help offset the shipping costs a bit, there are work-arounds. The shipping rates will remain fixed regardless of the number of games or add ons that you purchase. If you have a bunch of friends who want to support this project, just make one group pledge for as many games as you’d like. 

Here is a quick breakdown of the Add On costs for additional rewards:

  • Add $15 to your pledge for each additional copy of the 2 Player Travel Edition
  • Add $35 to your pledge for each additional copy of the 4 Player game and all stretch goals
  • Add $15 to your pledge for the Playmat

A Note on Bulk Discounts and Group Purchases:

If you're looking to save by doing a larger group order, we are offering the 10th copy of any version of Brass Empire for free.  That means that you can get 10 copies of the 2 player version for $140 or 10 copies of the 4 player version with all stretch goals for $320.  Remember that shipping is free in the US and remains the same regardless of the number of copies added on to your pledge.  If you are a retailer looking for a bigger discount, please contact me directly: http://www.rockmanorgames.com/contact/

"Can't wait for the campaign to start, and I'm kicking myself for not having bought the Alphas Mike had at his booth." - WolvenGarde, PAX Prime Playtester

Discount: We're giving Kickstarter backers a discount off MSRP and subsidizing shipping so that backers get a great deal.  

Kickstarter Exclusive Goodies: We have a bunch of stretch goals and promotional cards that we will give to all of our backers pledging $40 or more.  This enhancement pack of cards willNEVER be available in retail. 

Get it First: Kickstarter backers will receive their copies of Brass Empire well before it is available anywhere else.

Money Back Guarantee: If you decide you don't like Brass Empire within 1 month of receiving it, we would be happy to refund your pledge. All that we ask is that you try the game at least twice to learn it and see the fun and depth of strategies. If it's not for you, send it back.

You're helping us out! We want as many people as possible to play and enjoy Brass Empire and by backing this project you're helping us get our start.  We've already started talking to publishers and they've referenced that their interest is piqued by successful kickstarters.  That means backers are directly helping us get Brass Empire onto Store Shelves! How cool is that!  Gaining additional backers and selling additional copies helps us further offset our fixed costs, like manufacturing, shipping and art, and greatly increases our chances of getting into retail and additional distribution channels.

Thanks so much for your support and pledge!
story_txt:
Brass Empire is a strategic deckbuilding card game for 1-4 players (ages 10 and up) and plays in about 30 - 60 minutes. It takes place in a Steampunk universe where each player takes on the role of a different corporation hiring the best employees, constructing building, and manufacturing steam-powered machines. Players battle and sabotage each other to amass economic wealth and influence to win the game. Brass Empire Components:
4 Personal Starting Decks (40 cards)
5 Corporate Reserve Decks (25 cards)
4 Mining Platform Cards
100 Labor Market Cards
100 Design Department Cards
50 Brass Point Tokens
10 Hit Point Tokens
Full Color Rulebook
A Nifty Box
Exclusive Extras for Backers:
Any and All community created cards from the ENGINEER Tier (up to 5 cards)
5 Exclusive Company Starting Cards each feature a unique and powerful card for each corporate faction to place in their reserve deck.
5 Company ID cards with unique risk/reward mechanics
5 Unique Mining Platforms for each corporation
2 Player / Alpha Components:
2 Starting Decks (22 Cards)
3 Corporation Starting Reserve Decks (15 Cards)
50 Labor Pool Cards
40 Design Pool Cards
30 Brass Point Tokens
5 Hit Point Tokens
A Nifty Box
Welcome to the Steampunk world of Cobalt. For centuries, Cobalt has been ruled by corporations seeking to enhance their wealth and influence with Brass. Brass doesn’t just fuel the economy but literally fuels the technology and transportation of the world through its unique thermodynamic properties. Every day these companies compete and battle to expand their territory and authority. Companies work to optimize their labor force and resources to mine the most Brass in each territory through corporate espionage, technology, security, and even sabotage. You work for such a company and have been tasked with expanding into a new region by constructing a new corporate complex, hiring employees, and battling other companies in the area. The player who earns the most Brass will lead his company to victory in the region.Each turn, you will play Employee cards from your hand to gain resources. These resources will allow you to acquire new Employees, Buildings and Units for your deck. Along the way, you will acquire buildings to enhance your hold on the region and command units to attack other companies and mine for Brass. At the end of the game, the player with the most Brass is the winner."(Brass Empire). A deck-builder with deeper player interaction. Played 8 times since PAX!" -Ziggy @arrogantgamerIn short, Brass Empire is kinda like if Ascension/Dominion (Deckbuilding games) had a baby with Magic/Hearthstone (Battle Mechanics) and it was Steampunk. Check out some of the videos below to learn more about how to setup and play Brass Empire:Brass Empire has a lot more player interaction than other deck builders.  It is essential that you observe and adapt to the other players' strategies.  Here are some of the mechanics that make Brass Empire unique from other deckbuilding games:

Reserve Decks - Each player selects a corporation and has a small set of cards that only they can purchase from giving each faction it's own flavor and starting strategy. Advanced players can customize these decks.

Dual Center Rows - One row represents the typical resource generating cards while the other row is comprised of cards that stay in play to sabotage players or give you an ongoing buff.

Combat - Powerful units can attack and destroy any permanent design cards.  Be sure to strike first so an opponent doesn't take out your mining platform.

Mining Platform - As long as this building stays operational you can convert the construction resource into victory points, but if a devious opponent takes it out - you'll have to rebuild or change your strategy!
We want you to try the game prototype for yourself! Check out the draft of our beautiful Rulebook here or give us your feedback and print out the Rules yourself here. Download the (older and out of date) art-free Print and Play prototype here. You can learn more about the game on BoardGameGeek:https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/181393/steamcraft"Played this at PAX Prime 2015 in the Indie MEGABOOTH and had a blast! This game plays like Dominion meets Magic The Gathering, with 5 factions that each have a unique and valid strategy. Very well thought out with just the right amount of strategy and each game takes just the right amount of time." - AngelKatalyst  "When all the Brass was collected and only one corporation remained, all the Child Geeks thought (Brass Empire) was a winner." - Indepth Preview by Father Geek"Played it with a friend of mine who had never played a Deck Builder before, and the game is so well designed he was able to pick it up and soundly thrash me. It is great to see another card game come out that is not based in the fantasy realm, I think it ranks up there with Star Realms, both in gameplay and artwork." - WolvenGarde Selected as one of 10 Games for the Indie Megabooth Tabletop showcase "After playing through the #PAX2015 Indie Mega Booth tabletop games, @mgnade's (Brass Empire) was my favorite. story:
Pizza Brave is a fast-paced platform-adventure game that takes you across dangerous worlds, delivering pizza, in a retro pixel-art atmosphere. Help the Delivery Braves by avoiding obstacles, and stop at nothing until they reach their destination!

We started working on a game concept and now, with your help, we want to make the full version a reality!

The full version will include:

  • 8-Bit Retro Style Graphics and Music

  • Fast-Paced Action

  • 18 Delivery Braves

  • Challenging Adventure

  • 3 power ups

  • 4 obstacles

  • Amusing Graphic Adventure Dialogs

  • 4 Different Worlds to explore

  • 4 Awesome clients to deliver pizza

  • Available on multiple platforms

  • Multi-Language

  • Leaderboards

  • Gameplay Video-Sharing

  • Pizza!


Estimated launch : Mid November 2015



We plan to launch the game initially on Steam [PC, Mac OSX & Linux].

We need your help to get greenlight! Just take a minute and give us your support!

Vote For Us on STEAM GREENLIGHT:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=511104059




We developed a mix of two classic genres, action-platformer and graphic adventure, to create an amazing experience. Pizza Brave combines the adrenaline of action-platformer with the engaging fun of multi-option graphic adventure style dialogs.


You will run non-stop to deliver your pizza on time! Jumping over challenging platforms while avoiding dangerous obstacles.

At the most unexpected moment you will receive a call from the clients asking the most surprising questions. Answer with the right option and you might receive an extra bonus on your tip!


We took effort in creating a game that gets you involved in a retro-style world, that is at the same time both fun and challenging.

Already finished all the available levels at the Adventure mode? Don’t worry! As you progress on the adventure by completing deliveries you will unlock new dangerous worlds to explore and awesome clients to know.

Discovered a secret path? Completed a perfect run? You can show your amazing skills and share the gameplay video with the world thanks to the inclusion of Everyplay in the game.

Also, Action Platform games are nothing without power-ups and pickup items to both reward and challenge your skills! Here is a preview of what we have planned for Pizza Brave:


Along the way you can encounter power orbs that, when picked up, will cause various effects on your Delivery Brave: from giving you an extra jump, to inverted gravity, and many other surprises! In the most difficult moments some may help you, but others may not...

                


Watch your step! some platforms may fall when you walk over them. Be fast on your feet and jump in time to avoid falling and losing your precious pizza!

       


Red keys will deactivate dangerous laser barriers and clear the way to your destination. But beware! If you miss even one you will end up fried by the power of the mighty laser beam!

        


Laser technology is both dangerous and awesome, and with it we made light bridges possible! use them to avoid dangerous obstacles, but take care not to deactivate them by mistake!

        


No platformer is complete without awesome loot to collect! Answer the clients’ questions by choosing the right answer, pick them up along the run, or receive them as tip from a successful delivery. Collect as much coins as you can and use them to hire more Delivery Braves!



Many other surprises are waiting just across the street! Here are the ones we are planning to include if we reach the next goals:

When this stretch goal is reached we'll make the game available also for iOS and Android devices. Now you can play Pizza Brave ANYWHERE!


If the campaign reaches this stretch, we will work on amazing extra content including a webcomic, exclusive media, More Wallpapers, Delivery Braves’ avatars, Animated Gifs and much more! All of them will be available at the game’s website www.pizzabrave.com


Also, just because, we will channel our pop-culture powers and call in some of the mightiest heroes from the movies and cinema world to aid you on this adventure!

Including the Mighty Mozza Brave Rangers Team to be available on the first week of release.


We will make the Inner Volcano Complex World Available on the first week of release!

Also accompanied by a High Fantasy Inspired pack of Delivery Braves to delve in this dangerous dungeon with style!


If we somehow manage to raise $17,800, as soon as we regain our composure, we’ll give birth to a new world, in SPACE!

And to congratulate the community for reaching this achievement we will make available a Videogames inspired pack of Delivery Braves Available on the first week of release!




“Pizza Brave” is a widely known pizza delivery franchise with many establishments in various points of planet Earth and nearby solar systems. Nobody knows exactly when or where the company was created, but rumors say its origin can be traced back to the beginning of Egyptian civilization. Although their HQ can be found on Earth, several branches have been placed on populated planets to keep control on the company’s expansion through the galaxy.

According to the intergalactic committee of food critics, the company is rated number one on the “Milky Way's top list” of popular food chains, and third on the Local Galactic Group's list of most popular franchises, right after BoomBoomCandy Corp. and KokeKola. Its success can be attributed to two main factors: its willingness to localize their products for the taste of the local customers, and the hard work of their carefully trained delivery forces: known as the “Delivery Braves”


The Pizza Brave Clients

Mino T. Aurus

A friendly surfer who lives on a tropical paradise. He’s a cool guy who is always ready for a party.



Mr. Yeti

Always stressed, this grumpy businessman hates wasting time. Be fast on your feet or forget about your tip.



The company takes pride on the efficiency of their delivery service, upholding their motto of “Be Brave, Face the Risks, Keep the Tips”. It’s for this reason that the aspiring future deliverers are provided with obstacle training and courage tests to evaluate and improve their performance (and they have to like cats too, for some reason).

The explosive success of the company on the Milky Way has attracted lots of attention from the population of planets with less popular gastronomy (whoever controls the food controls the universe, after all), and all kind of alien species have traveled to Earth, the home planet of pizza, to prove themselves worthy of working for such prestigious company. While the company continues its seemingly unstoppable expansion across the galaxy, its employers compete among themselves to be the fastest, strongest and bravest of them all, dreaming with the day they could win the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity of becoming the employee of the month.


Martin Brave

Martin and his twin sister Marlene left their little country house to look for adventures and opportunities in the big city. He is looking to prove his worth by becoming the employee of the month.


Marlene Brave

Marlene and her twin brother Martin left their little country house to look for adventures and opportunities in the big city. She is looking to prove her worth by becoming the employee of the month.


Flamey

Flamey is an “Ignus”, the only known species of the universe to inhabit a star. Her inner heat keeps the pizza warm, reason why she's known as one of the best Delivery Runners of the company, even when she sometimes burns the pizza box. However, her popularity doesn't stop her from reminding people that she's only working there half-time to pay for her studies on Nuclear physics.


Tyrannosaurus Regina, Movie Star

Regina was born in a closed jurassic community, located on an abandoned island. Even though her peers were happy living simple lives, she knew she was destined to greater things. Following her dreams of becoming a movie star, she moved to the continent and got the best job available for someone of her skills, saving money and performing auditions until her dreams can finally come true.


Dr. Nado, Science Researcher

Dr. Nado was a member of Pizza Brave’s research wing, the group in charge of creating new pizza flavors. After an accident resulted in a group of test animals earning self-awareness, the company demanded their researchers go through the security-awareness training taken by the runners. Dr. Nado enjoyed the experience so much he decided to become a Delivery Brave himself.


Get to know more about Pizza Brave, the Delivery Braves, and more Clients at www.pizzabrave.com



We prepared lots of cool rewards to thank you for helping us! They go from getting early access to the full game, all the way to getting your own physical copy of Pizza Brave inside a neat old-school game box!

$15 - Early Bird Backer

Same as Basic Backer, but the first 100 get a discount!  

$20 - Basic Backer

You will be the first to get the game on release date!  

  • Pizza Brave Digital Copy,

  • Exclusive Wallpapers,

  • Your Name on The credits!

$25 - Early Experimental Brave

Same as Experimental Brave, but the first 200 get a discount!

$30 - Experimental Brave

Everything above plus:

  • You get EARLY ACCESS to Pizza Brave Beta-test,

  • The Main theme song of Pizza Brave!

$50 - Brave Kit

Everything above plus:

  • Get a T-shirt,

  • The Full Soundtrack of Pizza Brave!

$100 - Immortal Avatar

Everything above plus:

  • We will immortalize you in a pixel portrait!

$200 - Boxed Copy

Everything above plus:

  • Get a physical copy of Pizza Brave inside a neat old-school game box!

$500 - Be a Brave

Everything above plus:

  • We'll create a Brave based on YOU!


Well, let's get into some more detail about each one of those nice perks:


First of all, we will love you forever because you helped us! And we will share that love with the world by putting your name in the game's credits!


A set of exclusive wallpapers for our backers! Great illustrations about Pizza Brave for your desktop or mobile. Will not be available anywhere else!


This is why you are here! Get a digital copy of our full game as soon as it's launched!


You will have access to Pizza Brave’s Main Theme Song! You can use it as a ringtone or just listen it all day long!


You will have access to Pizza Brave’s complete soundtrack. Just press play and loop it forever to make your life a videogame with our amazing soundtrack!


Test the game while it's still under development and start giving us feedback!

As soon as we have a nice playable version with the most important features, we will release it to beta testers who will have early access to the game!


You will get a shirt with an awesome Pizza Brave design to brag with everyone!


Send us a nice picture of you and we will unleash our retro-art powers to turn you into a pixel Avatar that you can use anywhere


A Custom Pixel Avatar is not enough? Then how about an amazing Delivery Brave based on YOU!? Send us a nice picture and we'll make it into an amazing Delivery Brave to be featured in the game! You get to play as yourself on a game you made possibe! How Meta is That!?



You will get a physical copy of Pizza Brave. It will come in a Pizza Brave Flash Drive, inside a collector’s edition box.

        



By now we have:

  • Segments of the first two levels

  • First two clients [dialogs and graphics]

  • 5 delivery braves,

  • Concepts for the following worlds, clients and braves.

We want to dedicate and invest all the time and effort this game deserves to deliver a high-quality, engaging, fun and challenging experience on time.

With this campaign we are aiming to:

  • Finish the music and SFX

  • Finish the two current worlds,

  • Add two more worlds for a total of 4

  • 13 delivery Braves for a total of 18 on the release day

  • More coins, power orbs, clients,  test, test, test, and more test until Pizza Brave becomes 50% Challenge, 50% Pizza, and 200% Fun!

This is how we will apply the resources of the campaign





We know that some delays and issues may arise while we are making this game. There’s always that untrackable bug, or the fine-balance and tuning of a level, or just that character we can’t decide if it will have a hat or not.

Also there can be other type of problems, from an artist eating a crayon, or a programmer with index finger cramps, up to an alpha-tester obsessed with a single level refusing to test the rest of the game. Because all of that we have been very careful to take into account a little extra time and resources to deliver the game on time and without bugs and errors. You deserve the best experience while playing this game you made real!



Are you a game reviewer, youtuber,  press member, blogger, twitter star or or just want to know more about the game? Download the detailed press kit from www.pizzabrave.com and, if you publish something about the game, drop us a message and tell us where we can read it!


Can't make a pledge? Just don't want to? Well, that's ok!! Any kind of help is important, so, if you don't feel like helping us out with a pledge, but still want Pizza Brave to happen, you can always help us by sharing our campaign on your social networks, and voting us on Steam Greenlight.


Playerbit is a company located in Argentina, dedicated entirely to video game development, formed by game industry veterans with more than 10 years of experience.

Learn More about us or get in contact at www.playerbit.com

Collect as much coins as you can and use them to hire more Delivery Braves!Many other surprises are waiting just across the street! Here are the ones we are planning to include if we reach the next goals:When this stretch goal is reached we'll make the game available also for iOS and Android devices. Now you can play Pizza Brave ANYWHERE!If the campaign reaches this stretch, we will work on amazing extra content including a webcomic, exclusive media, More Wallpapers, Delivery Braves’ avatars, Animated Gifs and much more! All of them will be available at the game’s website www.pizzabrave.comAlso, just because, we will channel our pop-culture powers and call in some of the mightiest heroes from the movies and cinema world to aid you on this adventure!Including the Mighty Mozza Brave Rangers Team to be available on the first week of release.We will make the Inner Volcano Complex World Available on the first week of release!Also accompanied by a High Fantasy Inspired pack of Delivery Braves to delve in this dangerous dungeon with style!If we somehow manage to raise $17,800, as soon as we regain our composure, we’ll give birth to a new world, in SPACE!And to congratulate the community for reaching this achievement we will make available a Videogames inspired pack of Delivery Braves Available on the first week of release!“Pizza Brave” is a widely known pizza delivery franchise with many establishments in various points of planet Earth and nearby solar systems. Nobody knows exactly when or where the company was created, but rumors say its origin can be traced back to the beginning of Egyptian civilization. Although their HQ can be found on Earth, several branches have been placed on populated planets to keep control on the company’s expansion through the galaxy.According to the intergalactic committee of food critics, the company is rated number one on the “Milky Way's top list” of popular food chains, and third on the Local Galactic Group's list of most popular franchises, right after BoomBoomCandy Corp. and KokeKola. Its success can be attributed to two main factors: its willingness to localize their products for the taste of the local customers, and the hard work of their carefully trained delivery forces: known as the “Delivery Braves”The Pizza Brave ClientsMino T. AurusA friendly surfer who lives on a tropical paradise. He’s a cool guy who is always ready for a party.Mr. YetiAlways stressed, this grumpy businessman hates wasting time. Be fast on your feet or forget about your tip.The company takes pride on the efficiency of their delivery service, upholding their motto of “Be Brave, Face the Risks, Keep the Tips”. It’s for this reason that the aspiring future deliverers are provided with obstacle training and courage tests to evaluate and improve their performance (and they have to like cats too, for some reason). The explosive success of the company on the Milky Way has attracted lots of attention from the population of planets with less popular gastronomy (whoever controls the food controls the universe, after all), and all kind of alien species have traveled to Earth, the home planet of pizza, to prove themselves worthy of working for such prestigious company. While the company continues its seemingly unstoppable expansion across the galaxy, its employers compete among themselves to be the fastest, strongest and bravest of them all, dreaming with the day they could win the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity of becoming the employee of the month.Martin BraveMartin and his twin sister Marlene left their little country house to look for adventures and opportunities in the big city. He is looking to prove his worth by becoming the employee of the month.Marlene BraveMarlene and her twin brother Martin left their little country house to look for adventures and opportunities in the big city. She is looking to prove her worth by becoming the employee of the month.FlameyFlamey is an “Ignus”, the only known species of the universe to inhabit a star. Her inner heat keeps the pizza warm, reason why she's known as one of the best Delivery Runners of the company, even when she sometimes burns the pizza box. However, her popularity doesn't stop her from reminding people that she's only working there half-time to pay for her studies on Nuclear physics.Tyrannosaurus Regina, Movie StarRegina was born in a closed jurassic community, located on an abandoned island. Even though her peers were happy living simple lives, she knew she was destined to greater things. Following her dreams of becoming a movie star, she moved to the continent and got the best job available for someone of her skills, saving money and performing auditions until her dreams can finally come true.Dr. Nado, Science ResearcherDr. Nado was a member of Pizza Brave’s research wing, the group in charge of creating new pizza flavors. After an accident resulted in a group of test animals earning self-awareness, the company demanded their researchers go through the security-awareness training taken by the runners. Dr. Nado enjoyed the experience so much he decided to become a Delivery Brave himself.Get to know more about Pizza Brave, the Delivery Braves, and more Clients at www.pizzabrave.comWe prepared lots of cool rewards to thank you for helping us! They go from getting early access to the full game, all the way to getting your own physical copy of Pizza Brave inside a neat old-school game box!$15 - Early Bird BackerSame as Basic Backer, but the first 100 get a discount!  $20 - Basic BackerYou will be the first to get the game on release date!  
Pizza Brave Digital Copy,
Exclusive Wallpapers,
Your Name on The credits!
$25 - Early Experimental BraveSame as Experimental Brave, but the first 200 get a discount! $30 - Experimental BraveEverything above plus: 
You get EARLY ACCESS to Pizza Brave Beta-test,
The Main theme song of Pizza Brave!
$50 - Brave KitEverything above plus: 
Get a T-shirt,
The Full Soundtrack of Pizza Brave!
$100 - Immortal Avatar Everything above plus: We will immortalize you in a pixel portrait! $200 - Boxed CopyEverything above plus:Get a physical copy of Pizza Brave inside a neat old-school game box! $500 - Be a BraveEverything above plus: We'll create a Brave based on YOU! Well, let's get into some more detail about each one of those nice perks:First of all, we will love you forever because you helped us! And we will share that love with the world by putting your name in the game's credits!A set of exclusive wallpapers for our backers! Great illustrations about Pizza Brave for your desktop or mobile. Will not be available anywhere else!This is why you are here! Get a digital copy of our full game as soon as it's launched! You will have access to Pizza Brave’s Main Theme Song! You can use it as a ringtone or just listen it all day long!You will have access to Pizza Brave’s complete soundtrack. Just press play and loop it forever to make your life a videogame with our amazing soundtrack!Test the game while it's still under development and start giving us feedback!As soon as we have a nice playable version with the most important features, we will release it to beta testers who will have early access to the game!You will get a shirt with an awesome Pizza Brave design to brag with everyone!Send us a nice picture of you and we will unleash our retro-art powers to turn you into a pixel Avatar that you can use anywhere
A Custom Pixel Avatar is not enough? Then how about an amazing Delivery Brave based on YOU!? Send us a nice picture and we'll make it into an amazing Delivery Brave to be featured in the game! You get to play as yourself on a game you made possibe! How Meta is That!?You will get a physical copy of Pizza Brave. It will come in a Pizza Brave Flash Drive, inside a collector’s edition box.         By now we have:
Segments of the first two levels
First two clients [dialogs and graphics]
5 delivery braves,
Concepts for the following worlds, clients and braves.
We want to dedicate and invest all the time and effort this game deserves to deliver a high-quality, engaging, fun and challenging experience on time.With this campaign we are aiming to:
Finish the music and SFX
Finish the two current worlds,
Add two more worlds for a total of 4
13 delivery Braves for a total of 18 on the release day
More coins, power orbs, clients,  test, test, test, and more test until Pizza Brave becomes 50% Challenge, 50% Pizza, and 200% Fun! 
This is how we will apply the resources of the campaignWe know that some delays and issues may arise while we are making this game. There’s always that untrackable bug, or the fine-balance and tuning of a level, or just that character we can’t decide if it will have a hat or not.Also there can be other type of problems, from an artist eating a crayon, or a programmer with index finger cramps, up to an alpha-tester obsessed with a single level refusing to test the rest of the game. Because all of that we have been very careful to take into account a little extra time and resources to deliver the game on time and without bugs and errors. You deserve the best experience while playing this game you made real!Are you a game reviewer, youtuber,  press member, blogger, twitter star or or just want to know more about the game? Download the detailed press kit from www.pizzabrave.com and, if you publish something about the game, drop us a message and tell us where we can read it!Can't make a pledge? Just don't want to? Well, that's ok!! Any kind of help is important, so, if you don't feel like helping us out with a pledge, but still want Pizza Brave to happen, you can always help us by sharing our campaign on your social networks, and voting us on Steam Greenlight.Playerbit is a company located in Argentina, dedicated entirely to video game development, formed by game industry veterans with more than 10 years of experience.Learn More about us or get in contact at www.playerbit.com

story:
English version near the bottom of the page.

The Perks are available in english and german, so you have to see, if you're choosing the right one ;)

Unfortunately they aren't sorted the right way, despite the right order in the edit screen. Sorry for that :(


Die Englische Version steht unten auf der Seite.
Die Belohnungen sind auf Deutsch und Englisch vorhanden, also achte bitte darauf, dass du das richtige für dich wählst ;)
Unglücklicherweise sind die Belohnungen nicht richtig sortiert, auf wenn sie es in meinem Bearbeiten-Bildschirm sind, dafür entschuldige ich mich schonmal :(


Deutsche Version:

Zusammenfassung

Chronicles ist ein Sammelkartenspiel, das in einer sich ständig erweiternden Fantasywelt angesiedelt ist. Jedoch ist es anders, als andere Sammelkartenspiele. Es wird kein umfangreiches Ressourcenmanagement benötigt. Es ist reine Strategie mit ein wenig Glück.
Du kannst dich komplett auf das Spielen konzentrieren.
Die Hauptaufgabe in Chronicles ist es den gegnerischen General zu töten. Allerdings verfolgt der Gegner das gleich Ziel.
Jetzt geht es darum, die Karten, die man zieht taktisch klug auf das Feld zu legen, um den entscheidenden Vorteil gegenüber dem Gegner zu erlangen.
Das Spielfeld jedes Spielers besteht aus 2 Reihen mit je 5 Feldern. Auf jedes dieser Felder kann eine Einheit gelegt werden. Wenn die Kampfphase beginnt, fangen die gespielten Einheiten an, in ihrer Spalte auf die Seite des Gegners zu marschieren und alles auf ihrem Weg anzugreifen. Wenn die Spalte leer ist, geht der Angriff auf den General und er verliert Lebenspunkte. Ist die Spalte nicht leer, wird die erste Einheit in dieser Spalte angegriffen und der Schaden geht auf diese Kreatur über.
Allerdings besitzen die Karten auch noch zahlreiche Sonderfertigkeiten, die sie besonders werden lassen. Manche vergiften den Verteidiger, andere wiederum schlagen zurück, wenn sie angegriffen werden.

Ein kleiner Ausflug in die Geschichte

Damit du weißt, was sich in den einzelnen Fraktionen abspielt, habe ich ein paar Informationen aus den Chroniken gesammelt:

Drachill, einst gegründet von einem Drachen, Ayia, ist sowohl eine Stadt des Friedens als auch ein Königreich in seinen stärksten Tagen.
Die Priester herrschen Seite an Seite mit der Kaiserin und verbreiten das Wort Ayias.
Drachills Heere bestehen aus Rittern, Soldaten, Priestern und Heilern.


Morlea war einst ein Teil des Königreichs von Drachill.
Aber der Bruder der Kaiserin wurde von einer unheiligen Macht korrumpiert.
Nun herrscht er über das Königreich von Morlea, einer Welt aus Dunkelheit und Tod.
An seiner Seite, seine treuen Nekromanten. In seiner Armee, Zombies, Dämonen, Vampire und Ketzer.


Du gibst, also sollst du bekommen

Das gespendete Geld wird in das Design und den Druck des Spiels gehen. Aber du als Spender sollst natürlich nicht leer ausgehen.

Neben einem Dankeschön von ganzem Herzen erwarten dich verschiedene Pakete, die im Bezug zum Spiel stehen, z.B. Komplettpakete mit allen Karten und Fraktionspakete.


Hürden

Das Einzige, was der Verwirklichung noch im Weg steht, ist ein kleiner Tritt in die richtige Richtung.

Und für diesen Tritt brauchen wir deine Hilfe, mit deiner Spende hilfst du uns, das Spiel fertig zu stellen und schlussendlich in den Druck zu geben.


Was wäre wenn?

Was wäre wenn nicht genügend Geld zusammen kommt? Nun, das ist ganz einfach, dann sind unsere finanziellen Mittel um das Spiel zu realisieren ganz einfach geringer und wir müssen unter Umständen umplanen.

Was jedoch nicht passiert ist, dass wir uns mit dem Geld dann einfach aus dem Staub machen.

Du wirst deine Belohnungen für die du gespendet hast bekommen.


Andere Wege

Falls du keine Sammelkartenspiele spielst, oder aus anderen Gründen nicht spenden kannst oder möchtet, so kannst du uns dennoch mit anderen Mitteln helfen, unser Ziel zu erreichen.

Es gibt auf dieser Welt viele Leute, die Sammelkartenspiele spielen und gerne neue Spiele ausprobieren, also hilf uns, dass möglichst viele Leute von diesem Spiel erfahren. Teile diese Kampagne auf Facebook, Google+, Twitter, oder sonst wo.
Lass möglichst viele Leute von dieser Kampagne erfahren.


Vielen Dank im Voraus für deine Aufmerksamkeit und Hilfe,
Jendrik


English version:


Summary

Chronicles is a trading card game, set in an ever expanding fantasy world. But it's different from other trading card games.
There is no complex resourcemanagement, it is pure strategy (with a little bit of luck).
You can sit down and fully concetrate on your strategy.

Your maintask in Chronicles is to kill the enemies Commander. But he will try to do the same.

No, it is improtant to play the cards in a tactical manner, onto the battlefield, to gain an advantage over your enemy.

The battlefield of every player consists of two row with 5 Fields each. On each of those fields you may play a unit. In the battle phase, your units will attack the enemies units, that are directly in front of them. If there are no units in front of them, the attack will hit the commander and he will take damage. If there are units in front of them, the unit on the front takes the damage instead.

But the cards have special abilities to make them unique. Some will poison the Defender, others will hit back, if they are hit.


A little trip through history

I thought you should know a little bit about the current factions, so i gathered a little bit of information from the chronicles.


Drachill, once founded by a dragon, Ayia, is not only a town of peace but also a kingdom in it's most glorious days.
Priests rule side by side with the empress and spread the word of Ayia.
It's army consists of knights, soldiers, priests and healers.

Morlea once was a part of the Drachill Empire.
But the brother of the empress has been corrupted by an unholy force.
Now he reigns over the Kingdom of Morlea, a world of darkness, death and decay.
At his side, his loyal necromancers. in his army, zombies, demons, vampires and heretics.

You give, so you shall get

The money from this campaign will be used for designing and printing the game. But you dear Backer, shall not stand there with empty hands.
First of all, we will thank you with all our hearts. But you will also get Packs from this game. For Example a pack with all of the available cards.

Obstacles

The only thing, that is missing from completing this game, is a little kick in the right direction.

And for this little kick, we need you. With your pledge, you will help us, realizing this game and fulfilling one of our dreams.

What if...?

... there are not enough backers for this project. Well, it's simple, we will get the money, we will print the game with the money, we will get an you will get your rewards.
No need to fear that we will take the money and you won't hear a single word from us. I promise you, you will get your rewards.

Other ways to help

If you don't play trading card games, or you can't pladge due to other reasons, it's fine. But, you can help me in other ways.
Spread the word of this campaign. Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, print it on a sheet of paper an throw it in every mailbox you find, but please, let the world know, this game is about to exist.

Thank you in advance for your patience and your help,
Jendrik
