story:
Hello guys!

Before anything, thanks for watching the video.

Now that you've got an overview about our project, It's time to give you more details.

The games will be free to play and downloadable on PC and MAC, using a full 3D graphics engine and playable in full screen with a controller or a keyboard.

We intend to make the most realistic game as possible in terms of tricks and places. Meaning you'll be able to perform real tricks like rodeos, corks, flatspin... tons of grabs and rail riding in realistic backcountry, urban and parks environments.

Know this: we already started to work on the game. The BETA version will be available in November; from now and ever we can assure you that a first public version of the game will be released in January 2013. 

Ride urban maps.

 

Basically we have tons of ideas surging through our mind everyday, that’s why we have divided the whole project into steps.

We came up with the following road map but keep in mind we are an independant development studio, we are free to do, undo, change, improve, anything we want, anything you want including the order of the steps and add new ones.

Missing something? Feel free to send us your ideas and suggestions on the YouRiding Forum.

Check regularly the news on Facebook: YouRiding FREESKIING and YouRiding SNOWBOARDING.

 

Pre-order now!

+ For only $15 you can become the YouRiding “Grom”. This package allows you to reserve your ingame name as soon as the funding campaign is over, access the private forum & get some YR Cash for the game. The YR Cash is the virtual money that let you buy virtual items or unlock features faster in the game.

+ Then, for $20 you’ll definitely be the YouRiding “Rookie”. In addition to the benefits of a “Grom”, you will also have an access to the BETA. Nice isn't it?!

+ Thanks to $50 the "Premium Rider" status will be yours. It grants you 50% XP and Coins bonus, with also exclusive content in the hardgoods shop (boards + bindings + boots) and softgoods (jackets, pants, goggles...).

+ Got $100? Great you’re now part of the YouRiding "Pro Rider" elite. This pack enables you to get the whole fan pack in addition to all the items described above!

The fan pack includes: one exclusive tshirt, the official poster of the game, one wooden keyring and plenty of stickers.

TShirts are available in black or white for snowboarding and freeskiing.

 

You can also choose another career, let’s say, more corporate! If you want to support us at a whole new level the perks below might be for you! Moreover they are available for skiiing and for snowboarding, it’s up to you!

+ $250 makes you a YouRiding “Tech. Designer”. It means that you get the opportunity to work with our team to design a pair of skis or a snowboard that will be playable by everyone!

+ $500 makes you a YouRiding “Product Manager”: you will work with our team to design your own style, including pants, jacket, hat, goggles and gloves, and it will be available for every other players in the game.

+ $1,000 makes you the YouRiding “Shaper”: it means that you will work with our team to design a section of the map. Your name will be written on it and the line will be playable by everyone in the game! How great!

 + $10,000 makes you the “Avatar”: in addition to all the previous packages, we will create an avatar based on the style you want. This avatar will be integrated in the game and will interact with all the players to give day advices, to challenge them and even more!

 Freeride maps.

 

Our know-how, Your decision.

There is no realistic games of freeskiing and snowboarding as complete and smart as we can do. We are making 100% CORE games since 6 years!

We started with surfing and bodyboarding games and it was an immediate success in the community. In 2009 we added a freeskiing and snowboarding game made with Flash technology. And finally, last November we've launched a new improved version of our surfing and bodyboarding games with 3D graphics.

With you, YouRiding has got the know-how, the knowledge, the desire and the talent to create THE perfect games. Your investment can help to achieve amazing projects, to promote the games or to complete it.

Snowpark maps.

 

Make some noise!

Please, get the word out! As we said, we're an independent studio so we need any kind of help you can provide! A simple Tweet, Facebook post, carrier-pigeon mail can make the difference! These games can really be amazing to finally become the games you ever dream for...

Never Stop Riding!

Thanks,
Mike - YouRiding C.E.O.
story_txt:
Hello guys!
Before anything, thanks for watching the video.
Now that you've got an overview about our project, It's time to give you more details.
The games will be free to play and downloadable on PC and MAC, using a full 3D graphics engine and playable in full screen with a controller or a keyboard.
We intend to make the most realistic game as possible in terms of tricks and places. Meaning you'll be able to perform real tricks like rodeos, corks, flatspin... tons of grabs and rail riding in realistic backcountry, urban and parks environments.
Know this: we already started to work on the game. The BETA version will be available in November; from now and ever we can assure you that a first public version of the game will be released in January 2013. 

Ride urban maps.
 
Basically we have tons of ideas surging through our mind everyday, that’s why we have divided the whole project into steps.
We came up with the following road map but keep in mind we are an independant development studio, we are free to do, undo, change, improve, anything we want, anything you want including the order of the steps and add new ones.

Missing something? Feel free to send us your ideas and suggestions on the YouRiding Forum.
Check regularly the news on Facebook: YouRiding FREESKIING and YouRiding SNOWBOARDING.
 
Pre-order now!
+ For only $15 you can become the YouRiding “Grom”. This package allows you to reserve your ingame name as soon as the funding campaign is over, access the private forum & get some YR Cash for the game. The YR Cash is the virtual money that let you buy virtual items or unlock features faster in the game.
+ Then, for $20 you’ll definitely be the YouRiding “Rookie”. In addition to the benefits of a “Grom”, you will also have an access to the BETA. Nice isn't it?!
+ Thanks to $50 the "Premium Rider" status will be yours. It grants you 50% XP and Coins bonus, with also exclusive content in the hardgoods shop (boards + bindings + boots) and softgoods (jackets, pants, goggles...).
+ Got $100? Great you’re now part of the YouRiding "Pro Rider" elite. This pack enables you to get the whole fan pack in addition to all the items described above!
The fan pack includes: one exclusive tshirt, the official poster of the game, one wooden keyring and plenty of stickers.


TShirts are available in black or white for snowboarding and freeskiing.
 
You can also choose another career, let’s say, more corporate! If you want to support us at a whole new level the perks below might be for you! Moreover they are available for skiiing and for snowboarding, it’s up to you!
+ $250 makes you a YouRiding “Tech. Designer”. It means that you get the opportunity to work with our team to design a pair of skis or a snowboard that will be playable by everyone!
+ $500 makes you a YouRiding “Product Manager”: you will work with our team to design your own style, including pants, jacket, hat, goggles and gloves, and it will be available for every other players in the game.
+ $1,000 makes you the YouRiding “Shaper”: it means that you will work with our team to design a section of the map. Your name will be written on it and the line will be playable by everyone in the game! How great!
 + $10,000 makes you the “Avatar”: in addition to all the previous packages, we will create an avatar based on the style you want. This avatar will be integrated in the game and will interact with all the players to give day advices, to challenge them and even more!

 Freeride maps.
 
Our know-how, Your decision.
There is no realistic games of freeskiing and snowboarding as complete and smart as we can do. We are making 100% CORE games since 6 years!
We started with surfing and bodyboarding games and it was an immediate success in the community. In 2009 we added a freeskiing and snowboarding game made with Flash technology. And finally, last November we've launched a new improved version of our surfing and bodyboarding games with 3D graphics.
With you, YouRiding has got the know-how, the knowledge, the desire and the talent to create THE perfect games. Your investment can help to achieve amazing projects, to promote the games or to complete it.

Snowpark maps.
 
Make some noise!
Please, get the word out! As we said, we're an independent studio so we need any kind of help you can provide! A simple Tweet, Facebook post, carrier-pigeon mail can make the difference! These games can really be amazing to finally become the games you ever dream for...
Never Stop Riding!
Thanks,Mike - YouRiding C.E.O.

story:
Believe in the Potential ...

 

Disclaimer : Please don't judge us if you see some english mistakes, because we  usually speak french.
For the game, we will have a professional translator in the team. Thanks.


___________Technical Notes :


  •  Release date : 16th June 2014.
  • Supports : PC (Windows XP, Vista(WTF??), 7, 8), XBoxLiveArcade.
  •  Number of players: 1 (success online)
  • Language : english, french and others if we get more funds.
  •  Estimated gaming time : 20h-30h of epic moment !! (no boring farming included guys...)



Kiro'o is coming from the word  « Kiroho Maono » in Swahili which means « spiritual Vision ».

Hi everyone,

Since 10 years I (Madiba) works to create the perfect RPG. Perfection lies on the emotion and inspiration the game will provides to players.
So I decided to build myself on the following areas :

  • Improve and master my programming skills at the university
  • Become a good narrator : I wrote a novel
  • Learning how to create an innovative gameplay but within the limits of feasibility.
  • Become a team leader : I create a company in my country.

In 2003, I started this journey with the game project AURION, which had several versions since. I preferred to improve the same project to keep the soul of the game and give the player a masterpiece when ready.

Many people have taken part in this journey, wonderful people who gives themselves to my dream. Today, a professional team of 20, is finally ready to create this great game based on African myths.

 All we need now, is someone special, the last member of the kiro'o team: YOU.

 

                                  Story  Pitch:

Enzo Kori-Odan, prince of Zama, undergoes a putsh from his brother in law on the day of his crowning and marriage with Erine Evou. Enzo and Erine are then exiled by the traitor.

The Weeding and crowning of Enzo and Erine

 The young fallen couple decides so to travel the world to acquire the Kori-Odan’s warrior Legacy in order to regain their throne.
In their quest, they will realize the existential and geopolitical dilemmas behind the putsh they have faced.

 

Beyond the fact to reclaim their place as King and Queen, they must  find their answers. Their answer to ensure the destiny of Zama against the ideological conflicts of their world.

                                  The World :

The world where the game takes place is called Auriona (yes we like it simply lol). It's formed by six continents. Antoria The Enzo’s continent was spared by the geopolitical game that maintains a delicate balance between all the others… until now.

 

Every nation suffers in his own way the consequences of a widespread selfishness and their cultures will put Enzo and Erine in face of ideological dilemmas that constitute their initiatic path to maturity.

                                  Aurion :

The Aurion is both a mystery and evidence on the planet Auriona. This energy appeared long ago, and it manifests itself in many ways in daily life (combat, crafts, etc.).

 

Enzo gathering his Legacy throught the 1st AURION. 22 Aurionic states will be available

Those who use it in combat can increase their strength and have access to unprecedented fighting techniques for a brief moment.
However, these techniques seem to "come from somewhere else." The Warriors hear voices of their ancestors in combat, so the fighting art of the Aurion is called Legacy.

The Aurion can be seen as a living form of energy which exists on another astral plan.

An Aurion comes from the sum of emotions and thoughts of one or more individuals, and can be completed in, progressively generations by generations of the same family. That is the concept of Legacy.

 

                                  Gameplay (Gamer spirit Design !!) :

Our goal is to create an Action RPG in high definition  2D graphics. We are inspired by “tales of destiny” in the form but we will provide plenty of innovation and dynamism :

 - Horizontal Exploration in beautiful scenery with possible vertical movement (as in the classic beat them all of Snes)

  • Walk, run
  • Jump, wall jump, climb
  • swim
  • Feed your characters while respecting their culinary tastes to make them evolve faster.
  • etc.

 

-  Epic and strategic Real-Time Fighting!!

  • Facing enemies with Enzo and the support of Erine
  • Visual evolutive Combos !!
  • Several allies to recruit during  your journey
  • Gather your Legacy ,merge the Aurions,  to create new (22 aurionical transformations can be done !)
  • Touching duels with immersive fighting dialogs.
  • A new generation of events that will surpass the classic QTE: The Cognitives Battles Event

 

 

 

-  Many great secondary activities !!

  • One guild for secondary quests
  • loot and item crafting
  • Hunt rare monsters and create your equipment with their aurionical essences.
  • And so many other cool stuff!!

 

 

 

We arrived so far as the Spartans (as you can see in the video). We use paper and old …no, very old PC (and we prefer to not explain you how we make our lightened table…).

So it is becoming important for us to raise funds to equip and work under normal conditions. Imagine what we will be able to create !!

                                  The budget :

The Main investment of the studio is on the good way by venture capital. During this month of August many private investors have started to give funds to garantee the release of the game.

You can also check that we are selected on the investment fundraising website there for exemple:

 So there is what we need from the campaign now to give a best quality to the game

 

  The Rewards you will earn !!!

There you can have a look on some of these cool Rewards stuff you will have






                                  Beyond the Game :

Beyond a simple game, it is a part of video game history that you will write with us: the birth of Kiro'o.

Years ago young geniuses have created the manga, comics. Others created the space opera, science fiction, etc. and nothing since.

 We want to create the new Eldorado of the imagination by defining through our games a new graphic, audio and even narrative benchmark: the kiro'o tales.

Support us and when history will talk about this, you will say :  

“I was there when it started. I am one of those who carried this 10-year story on the final meters.”

 We really hope that you will be with us for this last step to ensure that we offer the masterpiece for which we gave everything.

 

 

 Check all the perks details below:

Consider you are now at the gates of Zama, the next step of your story depends on your move.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you can't back us, you can however support us by sharing our campaign near you. Bring everyone there.

Thanks, #Kiro'o Team

 

  PRESS RELEASE ON US :

There you can check all the press release on the project

>> Gaming Press

  • A Good Preview in indiestatik
  • An interview on BattleclubGaming
  • A good preview in RPGFrance(french)
  • A News on 1ndieworld(Polish)

>> General Press (french only


  • A complete Page in LE MONDE !!
  • Interview on ExcelAfrica
  • An interview on Journal Du cameroun
  • OUR PRESSBOOK ONLINE

                                  Some links :

Check our facebook page there

Check the founder LinkedIN there

Check video of the 1st AURION (2003)

Check video of the second AURION (2012) (english subtitles)

Check Video with all the team speaking about the project (english subtitles)

 

# UPDATE 1:

You can ask question about the project on crowdfundingforum in our thread there, thanks to them to help us with this very helpfull tools.



                                  FAQ :


Question 1: Why there is not a trailer with in-game phase?

If you watch our Pitch video with the studio's story, you will understand that the studio is in creation process. The new team is pre-recruited but they will be available at full time when the physical studio will be set-up with all the equipment.

We have done all this works with no equipment, without even a graphic tablet. It is impossible to make good animation for our game engine in these conditions

But we have already wanted to share our works and concepts and get feedbacks before starting the real crunching works. You can say that we are at the early stage development.

That's why the team produced fixed screenshots, but by following real gamedesign process. All the materials were done to be available for the real game.


Question 2: But if the studio is not set-up yet, how will you be able to create this game, with this gameplay in 9 month?

I dedicate this answer to my friends of JOL. As you have seen in the pitch video of our studio's story we have created 2 versions of the game before

Each previous versions of AURION had a purpose on our gamedesign "training" process to be sure to have what it takes, to create the 1st pro version of AURION.

As described in this pictures above, consider that AURION in 2014 will be a HD graphical conversion of the amateur version AURION that we were coding since 2 years. We were amateur only because we were using graphics of others games. But we already have all the project management and game programmation experience (for  2D games)

Our previous versions was playable, and a demo was released and tested by our fans in february 2013. There were not combats, but the conceptions was already ok, and we were on the coding phase before we decided to jump on pro stage.

story:
UPDATE: 

The favorite question - Why $100K - is answered by the investment plan.

Hi!

We are Pi-Dev - a team of indie developers. We are 3 students, and we are interested in high-tech stuff and, very strongly, in game development.

We started our "carreers" with small hobby 2D game projects, musicmaking, web development and design. Togehter, we made a tetris remake, a Mario remake and similar sort of small games. We primarily used middleware game creation tools for this purpose.

But with the time we gained experience. And we decided that the tools we use do not give us enough flexibility. That bored us and we just decided to start developing a game engine that offers the flexibility we need. We started studing how a game engine works and analyzing what kind of games exist and what a decent game engine not tied to particular game actually needs.

Then we started the project pi|engine.

pi|engine is a game creator for you. It’s fast, it has its own development environment, and the games from it will work on your desktop, your macbook, your smartphone and even your game console. It has been a secret for two years, now we are ready to go public and amaze you. Oh, did I mention it’s not just a planned thing, but an actual, almost-working set of programs? 

pi|engine is different than most other game creation software and engines. Instead of producing funky kinds of data that the runtime interprets, pi|engine’s CREATOR IDE is a high-level code generator. And that’s a good thing – it will make everything run rapidly.

Now, let's get just a bit more technical than that.

Graphics, scenes and object classes are stored in a native XML-based file format. A language exporter runs and converts the project file to an actual programming language, such as C++ or JAVA and then passes the code to the real compiler for compilation. Then it runs your game.

The development itself is based on the haXe programming language and some kind of visual programming will come up later. Import the assets - graphics, sounds, models, build object classes and place these in scenes.

There will be different kind of pre-made object templates that will help creation of common types of functionalities: FPS behaviors, artificial intelligence, inventories, shooting, physics simulations - just to name a few.

Empty classes will be allowed for any kind of usage for any custom object types, that makes pi|engine usable for development of any kinds of games – be it RPG, FPS, sidescroller or just a solitaire.

While pi|engine targets mostly 2D game development at its early youth, 3D features will definitely appear in the future, making it fully-functional multi-purpose 2D and 3D game engine. And the most important part: Not tied to any specific genre!

Help us bring the Gaming world to every single last one of you.

Claim your perk now!

Why do we need the funding?

To live, to concentrate our efforts on this project, and to hire another developer or two. 

...also, to buy some stuff:

  • Adobe software licenses (We can't live without Photoshop)
  • Autodesk (3DSMax/Maya) licenses
  • Microsoft Windows licenses
  • Android cellphones and tablets
  • iPhone, iPad + development licenses
  • XBox console + development licenses
  • Promote ourselves at some conferences

Why $100K? Isn't this too much?

Again, read the bullet points above. Also check the investment plan - it is published into the gallery above!

If we don't reach our monetary goal...

It will be slower, but eventually we're still gonna get there. The project is for all of you, but it's for us as well.

If you don't want to donate, you can still help!

Check the bullet points above. We need to buy some stuff, and we might also accept hardware donations. It's a bit tough, because of the laws in our country, but do get in touch and let us figure that out.

Oh, and... make some noise!

Visit the Pi-Dev site here: http://pi-dev.com

story:
Introduction

The World of Nathakra has been more than a project for the past couple of years - it has been my passion. Creating a new fantasy world from scratch has been a dream of mine for as long as I can remember.  I have been writing a book, designing a board game and a trading card game (TCG).  I have designed maps for the realm, created brand new races and formed back stories.  Furthermore I have created it all entirely from my imagination.

The TCG is something I have played with friends and family (printed on plain white paper with no graphics or art) and they have given me nothing but praise regarding it.  Now I am ready to try and market a full-fledged game; locally and online first and then hopefully it will expand from there. It is my ultimate dream.

Through your support and funding, all the money raised will go towards custom game pieces (such as the custom-made dice it requires and the cards themselves), website design and especially artwork, some of which I have completed already and can be seen below.

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about.  There is nothing I am more passionate about than this idea.  It is my hope that 20 years from now, my world will stand among the greats such as Krynn, Middle Earth or the Forgotten Realms, to name a few.

 

 

What I Need & What You Get

The bulk of the funding needed is for the artwork; artists can be costly to hire and it can take quite a while to complete the pieces. Being able to hire 2 or 3 artists at once would speed up the process and offer more variety in the game.

Another huge chunk would be used for getting the cards themselves printed.  This is another large expense as often orders require a minimum order of 2000-10000 cards.

If my entire goal is not reached, the funds raised will still go directly to my hired artists and the printing of the cards, bringing me that much closer to my dream.

I will not lie; a creation this complex will not be complete in a flash. There are many factors to take into account.  This means that even after my campaign ends, there still may be a lot of work to do. The good news is, the 12 cards I prize most above the rest are complete and are simply awaiting an order to print.  These cards will be rare, limited cards and will be included in my featured perks.

$5000

Will allow me to complete the artwork for all cards, cover art and packaging.

$2000

More will allow me to complete the custom dice, order the needed tokens and print the manuals

$1000

More will allow me to create a custom made website with card databases, online shops and all the little costs them come with making a game such as this such as advertising.

Any support goes a long way.  Contributing any amount at all will earn a special thank you at the end of the completed manual!

Along with a thank you in the manual, this perk will earn you a set of 15 random cards from the first completed set of the TCG.  With over 150 cards ready for artwork, who knows which amazing cards you could receive!

Along with a thank you in the manual, this perk will earn you a set of 15 random cards from the first completed set of the TCG.  With over 150 cards ready for artwork, who knows which amazing cards you could receive! 

But that's not all, you will also receive a complete set of dice for the game.  That's 5 "Dice of Fate" and 8 attack/defense dice!

Along with a thank you in the manual, this perk will earn you a set of 45 random cards from the first completed set of the TCG.  With over 150 cards ready for artwork, who knows which amazing cards you could receive!  It also comes in a tuck box with fantastic art on it!

Along with a thank you in the manual, this perk will earn you a set of 45 random cards from the first completed set of the TCG.  With over 150 cards ready for artwork, who knows which amazing cards you could receive!  It also comes in a tuck box with fantastic art on it!

But that's not all, you will also receive a complete set of dice for the game.  That's 5 "Dice of Fate" and 8 attack/defense dice!

Are you a die hard fan of trading card games? Then this is the perk for you!  Along with an amazing thank you in our manual, you will receive one 15-card booster pack, 1 45-card booster box (tuck box included), a complete set of dice and my 12 ultra rare cards which will only be printed in limited amounts!

 

The Impact

Why fund "The World of Nathakra: TCG"?  It is a unique game unlike any I have ever encountered.  It uses the same basics as many other card games but adds more strategy, cunning and luck to the fold.  This is achieved by adding dice into the card game.

Players build custom decks choosing a minimum of 60 cards from a large range of options such as creatures, spells, equipment and more.  They then cast their spells and summon creatures using either relic points (represented by tokens within each player’s possession) or by rolling the "Dice of Fate".  The harder the spell, the lower your chances of success (for instance, a black die has a 1/6 chance of succeeding).

Players clash until their opponents are either reduced to 0 life or they cannot draw any more cards from their deck.

The other great thing about my fantasy realm is that Greek mythology is woven into the story. This means that many of my cards feature Greek mythological creatures or events complete with details straight out of the legends themselves. You can learn while you play!

Lastly, my realm and story leaves massive room for expansion.  I already have future plans to expand into Egyptian, Celtic, and Nordic mythology, as well as the vast world of fantasy (i.e. Dwarves, Elves, Orcs, etc.)!  The possibilities are almost endless!

 

Break down of the game

The World of Nathakra TCG is a new type of card game. It introduces even more strategy, risk and chance into this type of game than ever before.  It does so by introducing dice into the card game, four different types of dice to be exact, all with different odds assigned to them.

  • RED dice which have a 50% success rate
  • GREEN dice which have a 83% success rate
  • BLUE dice which have a 66% success rate
  • YELLOW dice which have a 33% success rate
  • BLACK dice which have a very low 16% success rate

Each player has a custom-made deck of cards which adhere to the standard rules of card games; these will be explained later on in this booklet.

Each player begins the game with 15 life and 5 Relic Power points (RP) which are represented by 5 counters that each players receives.  Each player shuffles their deck and then draws 5 cards from the top of their own deck.  The game then proceeds with players casting spells, summoning creatures etc. They do this by using a combination of RP and rolling the Dice of Fate until there is only one left standing, the Nathakra Relic Master.  A player loses either by having his or her life reduced to 0 or has no more cards to draw from his or her own deck. 

****

The fate of The World of Nathakra lies in the balance.  Will you save it from the ever approaching evil? Or will you leap forward into the darkness bringing the entire Realm with you…

The Relic Master is the only one who can determine the answers and he alone will determine the fate of all...

****

 

A Preview of Completed Artwork

     

Can't chip in right now? There Are Other Ways You Can Help

Spreading the word of my idea is an invaluable source to me.  The more people know about the game and are interested in it, the better chance it has to succeed.  Posting it on Facebook, Twitter, or other sites like it is of great help to me.

Anything you can do to help me reach for my ultimate dream would be unbelievable.  It truly is my passion.  Comments, feedback, suggestions even plain old criticism can be sent via my website www.nathakra.com or e-mailed directly to rmgpstudios@gmail.com

Thank you so very much for taking the time to help me possibly achieve what was once thought to be nothing more than a "what if".

story:
About us


Meiko Miniatures is a small company producing miniatures for Fantasy Football. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams. To achieve this we always work with the most talented sculptors.

You can see our previous Meiko Indieogogo campaigns: Lizardmen and Kaos Dwarves. All the packages of these two campaigns were shipped in less than 3 months after the campaign ended up, accomplishing the estimated shipment dates stated on the campaign descriptions:

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/meiko-miniatures-lizardmen-fantasy-football-team

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/meiko-miniatures-chaos-dwarf-fantasy-football-team

Currently, we are also running another Indiegogo campaign, the Meiko's Undead - Necromantic Fantasy Footbal Team:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/meiko-s-undead-necromantic-fantasy-football-team/x/2362463


Why crowdfunding?

After the release of the ultimate Lizardmen Team and the ultimate Kaos Dwarf Team, Meiko Miniatures new project is the ultimate Ratmen Team. We have been showing the initial greens of this team. All these greens received good reviews from our customers, so we decided to go on with the project. This team will include: 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers, 4 Linemen, 1 Rat Ogre and 5 Star Players: Hamflek with Two Heads, Klark Smash with Strength 4 and three optional Claws, Fechglitz with Ball and Chain, Skipper the Assassin and the Rat Ogre Headsmasher. Also, this campaign will include several more items: racial Turn Counter, Ratmen Plastic Gaming Mat, racial Range Ruler, racial d6 Dice, racial Football, Ratmen Mutation Sprues… 

The sculpting of most of these miniatures has already been made. But we need your help to speed up the casting process. That way, we will be able to release the Meiko Ratmen Team much sooner than what was initially planned. Using Indiegogo as a platform to rise funds helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures and other interesting items, obtain feedback from our customers and it gives us confidence to keep working on. In exchange you will get some cool rewards.

All the miniatures will be casted in metal, including the Ratmen Turn Counter. The master moulds will be made by Miniaturas Alemany, the mouldmaker of other successful Fantasy Football Indiegogo campaigns like the Chaos Team and the 2 Halfling Teams of Willy Miniatures.

Pedro Ramos (a.k.a. Poncho) is the skilled sculptor of all the miniatures of the Meiko Ratmen. He has also sculpted the Ratmen Turn Counter and the Ratmen football, two great accessories for a great team. Pedro Ramos is currently considered by many Fantasy Football fans as one of the best Fantasy Football sculptors worldwide. His sculpting style specially fits with the Ratmen race, since he has a special gift to give shape to the Ratmen minis that we all have in mind.

How do these Ratmen look like?

How can you support this team?


NEW LEVEL !!!! FOUR STAR PLAYERS LEVEL

25 EUR

You will receive one Star Player Hamflek with Two Heads, one Star Player Klark Smash with Strength 4 and three optional Claws, one Star Player Skipper the Assassin and one Star Player, Fechglitz with Ball and Chain. In addition you will receive one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included.

LEVEL 1 

4 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get one Metal Turn or RR Counter. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 7 or higher.

LEVEL 2 

4 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Set of 2 Ratmen Dice. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 7 or higher.

LEVEL 3 

7 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Star Player  Hamflek with Two Heads. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 7 or higher.

LEVEL 4

7 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Star Player Klark Smash with Strength 4 and three optional Claws. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 7 or higher.

LEVEL 5 

7 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Star Player, Skipper the Assassin. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 7 or higher.

LEVEL 6

7 EUR

If you are already a contributor to this campaign, you can claim this perk to get a Star Player, Fechglitz with Ball and Chain. It will be shipped together with your other perks of Level 7 or higher.

LEVEL 7

14 EUR

You will receive one Rat Ogre. In addition you will receive one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included.

LEVEL 8 

29 EUR

You will receive a Ratmen Plastic Gaming Mat and a Ratmen Range ruler. Free shipment included.

This Range Ruler is made of flexible plastic and is 1 mm thick. That is the same thickness than a plastic Credit Card.

The Ratmen Plastic Gaming Mat is printed in oilcloth, so it’s waterproof and you will be able to easily roll it for a comfortable transportation.

The Gaming Mat includes 2 Dugouts with their 3 sections: Bench, Unconscious and Dead-Injured. Also includes Re-roll, Turn and Score Counters, two Throw-in templates and two Quick Reference Lists with all the possible results of the Kickoff, 2 printed toothet wheels where players usually throw the kickoff, a colored Table to establish Ranges when throwing the ball, and  a Weather Table and a Scatter template.

LEVEL 9

60 EUR

You will receive the whole Meiko Uderworld Expansion Set. This set includes one Underworld Troll and 10 Underworld Goblins: 7 Goblins with no mutation and 3 Mutated Goblins: one with Two Heads, one with Horns and one with Multiple Arms and Tail.

This level will allow you to complete a whole Underworld Team combining the miniatures included on this set with the Ratmen miniatures of this campaign.

The Underworld Troll and the 10 Underworld Goblins are sculpted by Franarcilla, sculptor of the successful Meiko Kaos Dwarf Team, among many other Meiko teams.  

In addition you will receive one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included.

LEVEL 10 (only 30 available)

65 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Ratmen team of 12 Players. Each Team includes 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers and 4 Linemen. All miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included. (only 30 available) 

LEVEL 11 

70 EUR

You will receive one Ratmen team of 12 Players. Each Team includes 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers and 4 Linemen. All miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included.

LEVEL 12 (only 30 available)

75 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Ratmen team of 13 Players. Each Team includes 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers, 4 Linemen and 1 Rat Ogre. All miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included. (only 30 available) 

LEVEL 13

80 EUR

You will receive one Ratmen team of 13 Players. Each Team includes 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers, 4 Linemen and 1 Rat Ogre. All miniatures are different from each other. In addition you will receive one one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included.

LEVEL 14 (only 30 available)

90 EUR

(EARLY BID) You will receive one Ratmen team of 16 Players. Each Team includes 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers, 7 Linemen (two lineman nº1, two lineman nº2, two lineman nº3 and one lineman nº 4) and 1 Rat Ogre. In addition you will receive one one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included. (only 30 available) 

LEVEL 15 

95 EUR

You will receive one Ratmen team of 16 Players. Each Team includes 4 Gutter Runners, 2 Blitzers, 2 Throwers, 7 Linemen (two lineman nº1, two lineman nº2, two lineman nº3 and one lineman nº 4) and 1 Rat Ogre. In addition you will receive one one Ratmen Football. Free shipment included.


STRETCH GOALS and REWARD GOALS


If we reach 3.500 EUR All contributors will get a Star Player Rat Ogre Headsmasher for just 16 EUR, adding the Strech Level for it. This Strech Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 4.500 EUR, all contributors of Level 9 or higher will get a Meiko Ratmen Cheerleader nº 1 for free. This miniature is sculpted by Pedro Ramos (a.k.a. Poncho).

If we reach 5.500 EUR All contributors will get a Mutation Sprue for standard size Ratmen for just 7 EUR, adding the Strech Level for it. This Strech Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 6.500 EUR, all contributors of Level 9 or higher will get a Meiko Ratmen Cheerleader nº 2 for free. This miniature is sculpted by Rykar.

If we reach 7.500 EUR All contributors will get a Mutation Sprue for Big Guys for just 9 EUR, adding the Strech Level for it. This Strech Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 9.000 EUR, all contributors of Level 9 or higher will get a Meiko Ratmen Bloodweiser Girl for free. This miniature is sculpted by Pedro Ramos (a.k.a. Poncho).

If we reach 10.000 EUR All contributors will get a Ratmen Coach for just 7 EUR, adding the Strech Level for it. This Strech Level will be created once the campaign reaches the amount stated above.

If we reach 12.000 EUR All contributors of Level 9 or higher will get for free a human size miniature (7’95 EUR retail price or lower), from the whole Meiko Miniatures catalogue, except on new realeased miniatures (the ones that have been released after this Ratmen campaign started).

Estimated shipping date: November 2014

story:
My name is Csaba Marosi. I’m a 23-year-old college student in Budapest. I’ve been developing ’Defend Your Kingdom’ for circa six months, and this is my first project for commercial use. I designed the graphics and wrote the code all by myself. The creation consumes a lot of time, energy and money; that’s why I’m asking for your help. 

My dream is that once I will establish my own indie gaming company, The Burning Pick Entertainment. Your donation would help to that dream come true.


’Defend Your Kingdom’ is a unique fantasy mobile game where you need skills of dexterity, strategy, and stamina! In this software I tried to unite popular puzzle games and strategy defence games.

The screen is divided into two parts. The bigger lower part is a simple puzzle game; basically we can interact with the game and control our hero on this surface. The task is to build a big triangle out of four same-coloured stones. After that, the four same coloured stones merge into one stone that is more powerful.

                     

On the upper part, there is a constant wave of evil creatures trying to kill your wizard. With these triangles, your wizard can cast spells to attack or set back the forces of hell. On higher levels, you can combine the stones for stronger spells. 

                            

                           Example: Earth +Fire + Life = Stone Guardian

The game ends when the wizard dies. The main objective of the game is evolving. When you reach higher levels, you can unlock more abilities, gears, and allies to help you set back the enemy for a longer time.

The Stages

Jungle, Northern Sea, Desert, and Mystical swamp. From the lowest dungeon to the highest peak, fight with your mage against the hordes of evil.

The game includes 10(+1 tutorial) stages, where you will need different tactics for victory. To unlock the next stage you have to survive for a given time. It never will be easy.  Fine tactics, dexterity, and the proper level of the mage will be necessary to win.

Enemies and allies            

The waves of enemies will ensure you to never use the same strategy since every stage has new opponents with diverse abilities to threat the peace of the realm. 

          

Luckily, you are not alone in this epic war. With your magic power, you can summon skeletons, stone giants or even mesmerize enemies to attack their own. First of all, your most loyal companion is Fenrir, the direwolf.     

During the adventures, you have to learn a lot. Killing monsters and perform powerful spells gives you experience points.

After reaching a level, you receive an upgrade point. There are 40 talent points in total; you can use it in a talent tree to Learn new spells, upgrade previous ones, or you can also spend them on your direwolf.

              

You can loot not only experience but also gold during the battles. Use it to expand your weapon arsenal and your wardrobe. Every piece of clothing, weapon and magic staff bear new abilities, which are more deadly in a set.

After you completed the campaign, start over on nightmare difficulty, and unlock all 25 achievements.  

                      

The game probably will be release in the first half of 2015 first place on Android, then iOS, and Windows Phone. Furthermore, if there is a demand, on PC, Mac, and Linux via Steam Store.

 

  

Perks

  • 1 € or more

The investor receives my gratitude and my acknowledgement in email.

  • 5 € or more

The investor receives the right to download the complete game to any platform, which will chosen by the investor.

The investors will have the access to the Beta test, if there would be any.

  • 10 € or more

The investor receives the full soundtrack and a digital artwork of the game.

  • 25 € or more

I list your name on the Facebook, Google Play, Apple and Windows Store pages of the application.

  • 50 € or more

The investor receives the right to download the complete game to even all platform. (+ Beta releases, if there would be any) 

  • 100 € or more

I list your name in the credits of the game.

  • 1000 € or more

I put your logo on the Splash screen of the game. 

I am grateful for every donation, no matter how small or big it is. If I can do anything for you guys, please write your ideas or requests. 


                                 

                       

The future is very unpredictable. If the project will be successful, you can count on some mobile and much more, and bigger PC games. On request, I’m planning to make a sequel to Defend Your Kingdom:

Defend Your Empire would combine elements from the Asian culture and the steam punk world and Defend Your Galaxy would be placed in a sci-fi universe.


                  

Thank you for reading my project, in return, here’s a dragon.

story:
Hi, I'm Adrian, I'm an iOS & Android App Developer!

I develop for iPhone, iPad, Android Phones, and Android Tablets with over 5 years experience.  And right now, I'm using my knowledge and experience to build a framework that makes it easier for the not-so-tech-savy person to develop apps for iOS and Android, at the same time AND without writing a lot of code.

I've been doing well with just working with the Asus Transformer Prime and my HTC Evo (the original 4G version), and it's gotten to the point where in order to continue developing properly for the iOS, I actually need iOS tools to work with, instead of using an emulator.

So for the next 4 days, I'm asking the IndieGoGo community to help with my one small request: To help me get the development tools needed to continue developing my framework for iOS and Android, so that aspiring developers can finally have a way to develop apps without the hassle of learning multiple programming languages.

Every little bit helps, so whatever amount you can contribute will be extremely helpful.

So please help a developer out by helping him get the tools he needs to keep working on a framework that benefits everyon aspiring to develop apps!  Donate and get other developers involved by spreading the word!

Thank you all! :)

story:
We spent this year redesigning the Nintendo Switch dock, making it smaller and smaller until it eventually disappeared. It's essentially an invisible dock hidden covertly in an inconspicuous, but sleek charger. 

You can display your game onto the big screen in its full 1080p docked mode glory with just a Covert Dock - leaving all the additional docks, chargers, and/or dongles connected at home.

 

One of the secrets behind making Covert Dock so powerful without the bulk is thanks to Gallium Nitride, or abbreviated to three magical letters from the periodic table, GaN:

 

By using the latest GaN technology, we get incredible efficiency gains that run cooler enabling us to surpass the limits of last generation silicon chargers. Take a peek inside:

When we say it's compact, we're pretty serious about it - we got rid of all the un-necessary bulk. It's 1/10th the size of the original dock, or put it another way, 90% smaller!

And if you compare it to the original charger alone, it's 22% smaller and does way more. We're not even including the extra space those inconvenient prongs take up when packed.  

Countless times we wished our chargers had foldable prongs. When they stick out they snag onto things and can even scratch our precious screens. During our design, we found out that it’s really difficult to make a charger that is both small and have foldable prongs. 

The Covert Dock is designed for the Nintendo Switch, but it's actually quite robust and works with a lot of USB-C devices - you'll want to take it every time you leave the house.  

 

The tiny port on the top is basically your trusty USB-C port designed to work to the standard charging profiles of the Nintendo Switch. But unlike other chargers, it also grabs the display data from the USB-C device so that it can be processed for the HDMI display output.   Beyond just matching the Nintendo Switch charging profiles, the Covert Dock complies with the latest PD 3.0 protocols meaning you can fast charge smartphones (250% faster) and tablets, and even power hungry laptops, including the latest USB-C only MacBooks. 

Unlike other chargers that have two ports, our USB 3.1 port actually passes data as well, so you don't just charge your controllers you can actually connect your accessories whether it's a wired controller, ethernet adapter, Genki Audio, or whatever crazy accessory you're packing. It also works with tablets and computers so if you have one of the fancy systems without USB-A ports, you'll be able to hook up your flash drive, wireless mouse or a presentation clicker in a pinch.  

 

 

Getting down to the last port, we come to the world's first HDMI port built into a charger, ever.  It's designed to work with the custom display profile for the Nintendo Switch but additionally supports the DisplayPort standard so you can broadcast whatever you want, wherever you want; from showing off your latest PowerPoint presentation skills to binge watching Stranger Things (or Dark).

 

Covert Dock is ready to go, take it with you to your favorite bar, taco truck, dorm room, game/comic convention, hotel lounge, office meeting space, friend's house, friend's friend's house, and maybe even when visiting the family - we can't wait to see where you'll take the fun. 

When developing the passthrough charging for our previous Genki Audio adapter, we learned a lot about how power is managed by the Switch and how important it was to choose reliable components for peace of mind. 

Our engineer, Andrew wrote up a in-depth article on the causes of bricking and has even been picked up by Ars Technica, essentially it's caused by poor components overloading the  M92T36 chip which manages the docking and power of the Switch. When damaged, the Switch cannot be charged, but fortunately the chip is replaceable and your save progress is unharmed. 

We’ve selected premium components and are getting global certification for complete protection for you and your devices. We have a dedicated chip to manage and prevent over current/voltage production, overheating, overpowering, and short circuits. Additionally, we’ve made it possible to update the firmware so that we can maintain compatibility in the unlikely event that the Switch docking protocol changes through firmware updates and new hardware revisions.
story_txt:
Thank you everyone for your support here on Indiegogo.  We are excited to announce we are officially out in the wild and in stock and will be selling it directly on our website at www.genkithings.com, happy gaming!
  We spent this year redesigning the Nintendo Switch dock, making it smaller and smaller until it eventually disappeared. It's essentially an invisible dock hidden covertly in an inconspicuous, but sleek charger. Nintendo Switch Dock + AC Charger = Covert Dock
Let’s tackle the obvious here though. The Switch does not actually sit directly on the Covert Dock, but it does have docking capability. So how does it connect? Glad you asked: Step 3: ProfitYou can display your game onto the big screen in its full 1080p docked mode glory with just a Covert Dock - leaving all the additional docks, chargers, and/or dongles connected at home. One of the secrets behind making Covert Dock so powerful without the bulk is thanks to Gallium Nitride, or abbreviated to three magical letters from the periodic table, GaN: By using the latest GaN technology, we get incredible efficiency gains that run cooler enabling us to surpass the limits of last generation silicon chargers. Take a peek inside:It's like carrying your very own save crystalWhen we say it's compact, we're pretty serious about it - we got rid of all the un-necessary bulk. It's 1/10th the size of the original dock, or put it another way, 90% smaller!All fighters are drawn to scaleAnd if you compare it to the original charger alone, it's 22% smaller and does way more. We're not even including the extra space those inconvenient prongs take up when packed.  You had one job
How else does it measure up? Well its somewhere between Genki Audio and an individual Joy-Con (without that pesky analog stick poking out).     Countless times we wished our chargers had foldable prongs. When they stick out they snag onto things and can even scratch our precious screens. During our design, we found out that it’s really difficult to make a charger that is both small and have foldable prongs. You're welcome. Now you don't have to think twice about packing it.The Covert Dock is designed for the Nintendo Switch, but it's actually quite robust and works with a lot of USB-C devices - you'll want to take it every time you leave the house.   The tiny port on the top is basically your trusty USB-C port designed to work to the standard charging profiles of the Nintendo Switch. But unlike other chargers, it also grabs the display data from the USB-C device so that it can be processed for the HDMI display output.   Beyond just matching the Nintendo Switch charging profiles, the Covert Dock complies with the latest PD 3.0 protocols meaning you can fast charge smartphones (250% faster) and tablets, and even power hungry laptops, including the latest USB-C only MacBooks. Unlike other chargers that have two ports, our USB 3.1 port actually passes data as well, so you don't just charge your controllers you can actually connect your accessories whether it's a wired controller, ethernet adapter, Genki Audio, or whatever crazy accessory you're packing. It also works with tablets and computers so if you have one of the fancy systems without USB-A ports, you'll be able to hook up your flash drive, wireless mouse or a presentation clicker in a pinch.    Getting down to the last port, we come to the world's first HDMI port built into a charger, ever.  It's designed to work with the custom display profile for the Nintendo Switch but additionally supports the DisplayPort standard so you can broadcast whatever you want, wherever you want; from showing off your latest PowerPoint presentation skills to binge watching Stranger Things (or Dark). Covert Dock is ready to go, take it with you to your favorite bar, taco truck, dorm room, game/comic convention, hotel lounge, office meeting space, friend's house, friend's friend's house, and maybe even when visiting the family - we can't wait to see where you'll take the fun.  
When developing the passthrough charging for our previous Genki Audio adapter, we learned a lot about how power is managed by the Switch and how important it was to choose reliable components for peace of mind. Our engineer, Andrew wrote up a in-depth article on the causes of bricking and has even been picked up by Ars Technica, essentially it's caused by poor components overloading the  M92T36 chip which manages the docking and power of the Switch. When damaged, the Switch cannot be charged, but fortunately the chip is replaceable and your save progress is unharmed. 
To maximize reliability, we made sure not to skimp on parts. We've configured the Covert Dock to use only standard Switch charging profiles when used with the console and conform to PD standards for other USB-C devices. We've worked closely with experts in this field, including producers of the official Switch AC adapter, engineers of various docks in the market (including Insignia), and the developers behind reputable PD and GaN technologies (Navitas). We’ve selected premium components and are getting global certification for complete protection for you and your devices. We have a dedicated chip to manage and prevent over current/voltage production, overheating, overpowering, and short circuits. Additionally, we’ve made it possible to update the firmware so that we can maintain compatibility in the unlikely event that the Switch docking protocol changes through firmware updates and new hardware revisions.

story:
Create History

Welcome to one of the most ambitious massively multiplayer online games currently under independent development. A game of total freedom - and its consequences. Set in a low-fantasy medieval world (similar to Game of Thrones), Might & Fealty offers you tense battles, the building of great cities, and political intrigue and betrayal that will decide the fate of nations. Equal parts strategy, roleplaying, and sandbox, this game has a world that will be shaped by its players and their choices, and a history that will be created by them as they play.


Updates:

We are currently running a closed alpha test for all funders. If you become a funder, you will get an invite key to join the alpha. See the updates tab or the forum (link at the bottom of the page) for details.

Budget details have been added below.



Gameplay and Setting: Freedom and Consequences

In Might & Fealty, players take the role of one or more nobles, all of whom are active in one persistent sandbox world similar to that of our own Middle Ages. You will march, form armies, conquer villages, build them into towns or cities; swear fealty to and fight alongside a large number of other players and possibly even create kingdoms. The point where other games end is the point where Might & Fealty really begins:

This game is all about empowering you to play as you want to play, and allowing you to make infinite choices. But every choice comes with consquences. Choosing to be a hero to some, might make you a villain to others. Natural resources are inherently limited, so choosing to expand your villages will mean someone else gets less. Choose to be a loyal friend or choose the path of betrayal. Choose to spread your holdings by sword, - or by trade and diplomacy. Choose to be a loving spouse or an unfaithful lover. Infinite choices, but always with consequences.

Play as a landless knight who wanders the world, a small-time lord, or the monarch of a huge kingdom. Get married, have children, and see your family stretch through generations. Choose any path you want, and it all depends on your skills and nothing else. Might & Fealty will never block your ambitions - but other players might! Interaction with other players is the core of the gameplay, and they all have their own ambitions and choices to make. Best of all, every player will create their own unique story as they play and that will be recorded in the game world. There will be a living, evolving, history that is made by the players as they play.




Highlights

  • Economy
    Manage villages, towns, and cities with options to construct more than 30 unique building types, including weaponsmiths, archery schools, mines, alchemists, town halls, temples, and more! Trade and build within an economic system designed to balance itself so you don't need to constantly micro-manage everything. Defend your towns by constructing walls, towers, and castles. Will you be happy with wooden palisades or will your goal be the mighty stone castle?
  • Evolving History
    Everything that happens shapes the game world, and it's all recorded on an in-game history.  Your actions in the game become part of the history of the world, and that history is never lost. Sophisticated options allow research into the past of characters, cities, or Empires.
  • Military
    From recruitment to funeral, your army is more than a collection of statistics, and it will travel the world with you. The game models individual soldiers, down to them having names and a home to return to when their tour of duty is over. Want to know how Hans fared in the last battle? This game will tell you. Total freedom to customize every soldier with a combination of different types of weapons and armour, including swords; axes; spears; shields; javelins; bows; leather, scale, or plate armour; and the feared warhorses. Recruit NPC specialists to your warband, such as scouts, spies, prospectors, heralds, merchants, and more - each with unique abilities.
  • Politics
    An entirely free-form hierarchy system unlike anything you've ever seen before: built around oaths of fealty entered into by nobles of different players - or even between those nobles you yourself control. Build your relationships with other players in any way you want: You will need others to fight beside you - or to fight for! Have your holdings form a county, a duchy, a barony, a kingdom or an empire with hundreds of other players as your vassals. Plot, scheme, fight, or marry your way to power! Your social skills will be as important as your gaming skills if you want other players to support your ambitions.
  • Sophisticated Maps
    Might & Fealty uses one of the most powerful mapping systems you've ever seen in a game. It uses real geography and there is huge scope for players to make it their own - rename towns, build roads, bridges, and watchtowers. Or destroy them! Explore a huge world that features multiple different terrain types, such as grasslands, scrublands, mountains, and deserts.
  • Educational Value
    While Might & Fealty is not a medieval simulation, the politics and diffuse relations between acting parties come much closer to real history than most other games. Teachers and even professors have shown an interest in the predecessor (BattleMaster), and Might & Fealty will be even deeper as a tool to understand diplomacy and politics in a setting where real ambitions and proper constraints force even the kings hand.
  • Multi-Lingual
    The game is designed from the ground up to be both playable in several languages and also allow interaction between players who don't speak the same language. I don't consider language barriers to be barriers at all, but something to be integrated into the gameplay. Recruit an NPC translator and you can send automatically translated messages to other players.

 

Gameplay
The game is turn-based with every turn representing one day in the game world and every real-life day having 4 turns/days of game time. The actions you can take fall into three broad categories, each with dozens of possible actions within them.

Some actions are simply resolved immediately, such as sending messages or disbanding troops. Some actions are started immediately, but take time to complete, such as the construction of buildings or the recruitment of new troops. And finally, some actions are queued and resolved at the turn, mostly those that potentially conflict with other players, such as battles or plundering your enemies villages.



Turn-based gameplay was picked intentionally to remove the need for being "always on" to react to enemy actions. In addition, the game is getting a sophisticated reaction system where you can specify how to react to events without the need of clicking the button yourself. For example, you can define a list of enemies that your troops will attack if they move into attack range. This way, the enemy can not sneak past you while you are asleep in real life.

A deep event system informs you about events that happened to your characters as well as within settlements under your control or realms you are a member of. You will also be able to get important events sent to you outside the game (via email currently, other notification systems may be added in the future).

 

Who am I ?
I'm a computer security expert with an internationally renowned reputation. Creating games has been a passion of mine for most of my life, and I've created several board, roleplaying and computer games. Most importantly, I created a browser game that is the spiritual predecessor of Might & Fealty, and I've been successfully running it for over 12 years now. It's called BattleMaster, and it's been enjoyed by thousands of players all over the world.

I have over 15 years of experience with free-form gameplay like this, and Might & Fealty is the dream project I've wanted to create for the last two decades. Now, both the technology and my personal development have met at a point where it can finally be made. Might & Fealty will be a commercial game because a proper budget allows me to pay for the graphics artists, user-interface designers and additional coders that are needed to make a game of this scale a reality.
Crowdfunding is the solution to the investor problem - I have a clear vision for this project and I don't want it to be compromised for corporate marketing or portfolio reasons.


Current Status

An alpha prototype version of Might & Fealty has already been through two early testing phases, with over a hundred volunteers forming realms, waging wars and marching armies across a small test map with just 600 villages and towns. I've been working on this game for more than half a year already, and it is getting close to beta status.


That is why the campaign has a flexible target. I'm so passionate about this game that it will happen even if I have to fund it myself over the course of years. But this is my dream project and I want you to be able to play it this year. That's right! Given successful funding here, I have plans in place to launch in (late) 2013.

The current development focuses on gameplay, not graphics. The initial game client will be browser-based for two reasons. Firstly, this allows for the most rapid development; and secondly, it's a good stepping stone towards a full 3D standalone client as the current game client can later be turned into the server backend for the standalone client.

I've assembled a small team of supporters who help with everything from forum moderation to video editing, and I have two graphics artists who are already looking forward to working on the game.



Funding and Budget Plans
My first goal is for 40 000 €, which is the money I need to continue development at full-time speed as well as for graphics and user interface design, some software licenses and a bit of marketing.

This is the seed money for the project. A game of this size and complexity is not complete in a few months. I plan to keep adding features and improving gameplay after launch for years to come. My other project BattleMaster proves this development model.

Here is how the funding is intended to be spent:

As you can see, the 40k goal allows for a proper project including money of overhead and administrative costs as well as a buffer for unexpected costs.

If the goal should not be reached, I have two reduced budget plans, for 20k and for just 10k:

As you can see above, this will mostly result in tolerances being reduced as well as reduced money for my own living expenses so I cannot focus full-time on the project, meaning everything will slow down. There are some costs that simply can not be reduced like the costs of running the game servers or money that has already been spent like the Campaign Promotion costs. Finally, items like translations or thematic artwork may have to be done away or by volunteers.


Should the goal be exceeded, additional money will be spent mostly on graphics and marketing.

Starting at 100 000 €, there will be enough in the budget to begin development of a 3D standalone client using the Unity 3D engine. I have some experience with this engine and I've used it in a number of smaller projects already. It is well-suited and can deliver to all platforms I want (PC, Mac, iOS, Android and soon Linux).


Might & Fealty is an ambitious sandbox game unlike anything you've played before. Do you want to create history? Do you want to experience total freedom and its consequences? Do you want to be those consequences for other players?


Then join me and make Might & Fealty a reality. Spread the word and support my crowdfunding. Check for the cool perks I have lined up and decide upon your level of contribution.


Thank you.
story_txt:
Create HistoryWelcome to one of the most ambitious massively multiplayer online games currently under independent development. A game of total freedom - and its consequences. Set in a low-fantasy medieval world (similar to Game of Thrones), Might & Fealty offers you tense battles, the building of great cities, and political intrigue and betrayal that will decide the fate of nations. Equal parts strategy, roleplaying, and sandbox, this game has a world that will be shaped by its players and their choices, and a history that will be created by them as they play.

Updates:
We are currently running a closed alpha test for all funders. If you become a funder, you will get an invite key to join the alpha. See the updates tab or the forum (link at the bottom of the page) for details.
Budget details have been added below.
Gameplay and Setting: Freedom and ConsequencesIn Might & Fealty, players take the role of one or more nobles, all of whom are active in one persistent sandbox world similar to that of our own Middle Ages. You will march, form armies, conquer villages, build them into towns or cities; swear fealty to and fight alongside a large number of other players and possibly even create kingdoms. The point where other games end is the point where Might & Fealty really begins:This game is all about empowering you to play as you want to play, and allowing you to make infinite choices. But every choice comes with consquences. Choosing to be a hero to some, might make you a villain to others. Natural resources are inherently limited, so choosing to expand your villages will mean someone else gets less. Choose to be a loyal friend or choose the path of betrayal. Choose to spread your holdings by sword, - or by trade and diplomacy. Choose to be a loving spouse or an unfaithful lover. Infinite choices, but always with consequences.Play as a landless knight who wanders the world, a small-time lord, or the monarch of a huge kingdom. Get married, have children, and see your family stretch through generations. Choose any path you want, and it all depends on your skills and nothing else. Might & Fealty will never block your ambitions - but other players might! Interaction with other players is the core of the gameplay, and they all have their own ambitions and choices to make. Best of all, every player will create their own unique story as they play and that will be recorded in the game world. There will be a living, evolving, history that is made by the players as they play.

Highlights


EconomyManage villages, towns, and cities with options to construct more than 30 unique building types, including weaponsmiths, archery schools, mines, alchemists, town halls, temples, and more! Trade and build within an economic system designed to balance itself so you don't need to constantly micro-manage everything. Defend your towns by constructing walls, towers, and castles. Will you be happy with wooden palisades or will your goal be the mighty stone castle?



Evolving HistoryEverything that happens shapes the game world, and it's all recorded on an in-game history.  Your actions in the game become part of the history of the world, and that history is never lost. Sophisticated options allow research into the past of characters, cities, or Empires.



MilitaryFrom recruitment to funeral, your army is more than a collection of statistics, and it will travel the world with you. The game models individual soldiers, down to them having names and a home to return to when their tour of duty is over. Want to know how Hans fared in the last battle? This game will tell you. Total freedom to customize every soldier with a combination of different types of weapons and armour, including swords; axes; spears; shields; javelins; bows; leather, scale, or plate armour; and the feared warhorses. Recruit NPC specialists to your warband, such as scouts, spies, prospectors, heralds, merchants, and more - each with unique abilities.



PoliticsAn entirely free-form hierarchy system unlike anything you've ever seen before: built around oaths of fealty entered into by nobles of different players - or even between those nobles you yourself control. Build your relationships with other players in any way you want: You will need others to fight beside you - or to fight for! Have your holdings form a county, a duchy, a barony, a kingdom or an empire with hundreds of other players as your vassals. Plot, scheme, fight, or marry your way to power! Your social skills will be as important as your gaming skills if you want other players to support your ambitions.



Sophisticated MapsMight & Fealty uses one of the most powerful mapping systems you've ever seen in a game. It uses real geography and there is huge scope for players to make it their own - rename towns, build roads, bridges, and watchtowers. Or destroy them! Explore a huge world that features multiple different terrain types, such as grasslands, scrublands, mountains, and deserts.



Educational ValueWhile Might & Fealty is not a medieval simulation, the politics and diffuse relations between acting parties come much closer to real history than most other games. Teachers and even professors have shown an interest in the predecessor (BattleMaster), and Might & Fealty will be even deeper as a tool to understand diplomacy and politics in a setting where real ambitions and proper constraints force even the kings hand.



Multi-LingualThe game is designed from the ground up to be both playable in several languages and also allow interaction between players who don't speak the same language. I don't consider language barriers to be barriers at all, but something to be integrated into the gameplay. Recruit an NPC translator and you can send automatically translated messages to other players.

 
GameplayThe game is turn-based with every turn representing one day in the game world and every real-life day having 4 turns/days of game time. The actions you can take fall into three broad categories, each with dozens of possible actions within them.
Some actions are simply resolved immediately, such as sending messages or disbanding troops. Some actions are started immediately, but take time to complete, such as the construction of buildings or the recruitment of new troops. And finally, some actions are queued and resolved at the turn, mostly those that potentially conflict with other players, such as battles or plundering your enemies villages.
Turn-based gameplay was picked intentionally to remove the need for being "always on" to react to enemy actions. In addition, the game is getting a sophisticated reaction system where you can specify how to react to events without the need of clicking the button yourself. For example, you can define a list of enemies that your troops will attack if they move into attack range. This way, the enemy can not sneak past you while you are asleep in real life.A deep event system informs you about events that happened to your characters as well as within settlements under your control or realms you are a member of. You will also be able to get important events sent to you outside the game (via email currently, other notification systems may be added in the future).

 
Who am I ?I'm a computer security expert with an internationally renowned reputation. Creating games has been a passion of mine for most of my life, and I've created several board, roleplaying and computer games. Most importantly, I created a browser game that is the spiritual predecessor of Might & Fealty, and I've been successfully running it for over 12 years now. It's called BattleMaster, and it's been enjoyed by thousands of players all over the world.
I have over 15 years of experience with free-form gameplay like this, and Might & Fealty is the dream project I've wanted to create for the last two decades. Now, both the technology and my personal development have met at a point where it can finally be made. Might & Fealty will be a commercial game because a proper budget allows me to pay for the graphics artists, user-interface designers and additional coders that are needed to make a game of this scale a reality.Crowdfunding is the solution to the investor problem - I have a clear vision for this project and I don't want it to be compromised for corporate marketing or portfolio reasons.Current Status

I've been working on this game for more than half a year already, and it is getting close to beta status.
That is why the campaign has a flexible target. I'm so passionate about this game that it will happen even if I have to fund it myself over the course of years. But this is my dream project and I want you to be able to play it this year. That's right! Given successful funding here, I have plans in place to launch in (late) 2013.
The current development focuses on gameplay, not graphics. The initial game client will be browser-based for two reasons. Firstly, this allows for the most rapid development; and secondly, it's a good stepping stone towards a full 3D standalone client as the current game client can later be turned into the server backend for the standalone client.
I've assembled a small team of supporters who help with everything from forum moderation to video editing, and I have two graphics artists who are already looking forward to working on the game.Funding and Budget PlansMy first goal is for 40 000 €, which is the money I need to continue development at full-time speed as well as for graphics and user interface design, some software licenses and a bit of marketing.
This is the seed money for the project. A game of this size and complexity is not complete in a few months. I plan to keep adding features and improving gameplay after launch for years to come. My other project BattleMaster proves this development model.
Here is how the funding is intended to be spent:
As you can see, the 40k goal allows for a proper project including money of overhead and administrative costs as well as a buffer for unexpected costs.
If the goal should not be reached, I have two reduced budget plans, for 20k and for just 10k:


As you can see above, this will mostly result in tolerances being reduced as well as reduced money for my own living expenses so I cannot focus full-time on the project, meaning everything will slow down. There are some costs that simply can not be reduced like the costs of running the game servers or money that has already been spent like the Campaign Promotion costs. Finally, items like translations or thematic artwork may have to be done away or by volunteers.
Should the goal be exceeded, additional money will be spent mostly on graphics and marketing.
Starting at 100 000 €, there will be enough in the budget to begin development of a 3D standalone client using the Unity 3D engine. I have some experience with this engine and I've used it in a number of smaller projects already. It is well-suited and can deliver to all platforms I want (PC, Mac, iOS, Android and soon Linux).
