The POINTS (Personal Outdoor Intelligent-Networked Tracking System) node is a personal, non-cellular, GPS tracking transceiver that will transmit your location, Emergency status, or give an audible indication to you from Base.  The POINTS node has been designed for outdoor activities ranging from civilian sports events, search and rescue, wide area damage assessment, and even training/deployment of military personnel.  With up-to-the-minute location reporting you will always know where your people are.
The POINTS node is the smallest, lightest real-time tracking node avail on the market.  And by using self-healing, sleep supported mesh networking; each node can also act as repeater gaining maximum range at minimal power consumption.  And without the need for external support systems, like cellular or satellite, there are NO MONTHLY FEEs and will work anywhere on the planet that GPS is avail.
POINTS nodes also have integrated Bluetooth to allow communication with Android smart phones running our POINTS Radar app.  This app allows for individuals in the field to “see” where other nodes are located as quickly as they update.  This can be instrumental in quickly finding lost/injured searches, coordinating team play, or conformation of movements.

 
 
 

POINTS Node Features

 

No fees – EVER
Since our system uses public frequencies, there are no fees (and no license required).  Plus even if you are in a location with no power, no service, or even no inhabitants, you will be able to locate and track all your nodes
Lightest GPS Node on the market
At 3.0oz, the POINTS node is, hands down, the lightest node avail.  And by using standard AAA batteries, you will never have to worry about not being able to find replacement batteries.
Smallest non-cellular Node
The POINTS Node was designed to also be small.  It easily fits in a shirt packet or the shoulder pocket of an Army ACU.  Plus with its industrial Velcro, it can be attached to any surface, including helmets and vehicles
Simple to use
For the most part, the POINTS Node is plug and play.  No setup is needed.  Just insert the batteries and place in your pocket.  The Base Station software will take care of the rest.
Long Range
Because we use a self-healing, sleeping mesh network, each of our nodes can act as a repeater.  This allows for a node's location to “hop” from one node to another until it reaches the base station.  Greater battery life and higher reliability means safety for the user.
Online or Offline
Our Base Station software supports both online system (using Google Maps) and offline system (using a pre-downloaded satellite image or a Crayon drawing for you SEALs).
Military Grid support
Once calibrated (about 30 seconds) the Base Station software can give you the exact military grid coordinate of any node on the map (fixed location online or pre-downloaded maps only).
Battery Life
Holy Cow!!  You never thought 2 standard AAA batteries could last so long.  But with low power transceivers, a sleeping mesh network, and ultra-low power electronics, you can go WEEKS without having to change batteries.
Multiple Networks
With up to 8 networks supported, you can have multiple teams operating in the same location and each have its own independent Network.  Great for Sports activities (paintball) where you don’t want the other team to know where you are
Emergency/Indicator
Each node is equipped with an Emergency button that reports the node's location back to the base station and all Bluetooth active nodes.  And each node is equipped with an auditory beeper that can be activated by the base station to signal the node.  There is also an option to activate the beepers on ALL Nodes on a network at the same time.
Development Kits Avail
For all of you that enjoy writing your own code, we support Developers with both our open source Base Station Software and our Open source hardware.  Although our hardware is protected by Copyright/Patent laws.
Bluetooth (POINTS Radar)
With our Smartphone app, each node wearer has the ability to know where all other nodes are located at a glance.

 

 
Applications
Outdoor  Sports:    Paintball, Airsoft and other outdoor sports activities have numerous players in the field.  This system would allow you know exactly where you buddies are.  Even Equip referees with nodes on a separate network to identify if any refs are grouping together…  Plus hunters are able to know exactly where their hunting buddies are; preventing accidents.
Search and rescue: While searching for lost or injured individuals, a command post must know where all of their searchers are.  And with the Emergency button on each node, if a searcher gets lost or hurt, they can call for help at any time.
Military/Police:      Training can be dangerous.  Especially during land navigation or wide area training.   Make sure you know exactly where your soldiers are to keep them safe and track their path to see how they can improve.
 
 

General Node Specs


Size 

1/2wv Ant - 2.5”(L) x 1.1”(T) x 6.2”(H
1/4wv Ant - 2.5”(L) x 1.1”(T) x 4.2”(H)

Weight – 3.0 oz (with batteries)
Battery Type – 2 x AAA batteries
Antenna – RPSMA
Independent networks avail – 8
Freq

Network 0 – 902.400MHz
Network 1 – 902.600MHz
.........
Network 7 – 903.800MHz


TX Power – 250mW
Range:  

Rural – 24miles (high gain ant)
Urban – 4miles (0.75mil per hop)

Max repeater hops - 7
Encryption – 128bit AES avail
LED status indicator:         

Waiting
Searching for GPS Lock
Transmitting Location
Emergency mode activated

Panic/Emergency button
Audible Indicator (call back/return to base)
Individual Node Serial numbers
Industrial Velcro for external mounting
Easily fits in Army ACU shoulder/LBE pocket
Battery life (standard Alkaline: Locate Rate - Battery life)

30sec - 36 hrs
90 sec (default) - 96 hrs
10 min - 14 days
2 hours - 3 months




Base Station specs

Supports up to 250 Nodes
USB Interface (VCP – 115200 Baud)
Mapping options:               

Live, Online Google maps
Pre-downloaded image

Update Rate: 30 – 7200 sec
Encryption: 128bit AES
Antenna distance from base station:            

USB direct – 10 ft
POE - 250 f
Local power – 4000ft


On-screen Military Grid support
ETA to next update
Displays current battery level for each POINTS Node
Network Modes

Node to Base
Node to ALL


See screen shot below:




 
 


 
 


 
 


 
 


 
 



Bluetooth Supported Smartphone App
 
 
Base Station Online Map
 
 
Base Station Offline (pre-downloaded map)
 
Mesh Network Diagram
 
 
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you aren't able to contribute, that's OK.  Please forward to any and all you think can help us to reach our goal..
 
Thank you!!

story:
Who We Are

We are Humanoid Interactive, an independent development studio based in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. 

Our small company consists of artists, animators and programmers. We work well together as a team and we hope to make a game that is not only fun to play, but also teaches people about Canadian and Aboriginal culture.

The Thule culture (pronounced Too-Lee) were the ancestors of all modern Inuit. They developed in coastal Alaska by AD 1000 and expanded eastwards across Canada, reaching Greenland by the 13th century. 

These people lived in incredibly harsh arctic conditions hunting Bowhead whales for survival. They used whale oil for burning, they made clothing from animal skins, they even built their houses out of whale bones using tools also made from whale bones. 

We decided to make this game not only to teach people about Aboriginal heritage but to incorporate Canadian culture as well. This game is about a seal hunter from Newfoundland in 1908 who finds himself lost in the North Atlantic after disaster strikes his sealing vessel. The first part of the game centers around rural Newfoundland life in the early 20th century.

People who contribute to the creation of this game are helping to spread Canadian culture to the whole world.

Visit us at:

www.humanoidinteractive.com

Like us on Facebook at: 

www.facebook.com/humanoidinteractive


Why We Are Fundraising

This game will cost $247,000 to develop for PC and Mac. Some of this money will come from this campaign, some will come from grants, most of it however, will come from our own pockets. This campaign is not a means to pay for the entire game.

The budget for this game is roughly 1/4 the budget of a similar quality game. There are three reasons for this:

  1. The game will be developed using the Unity engine. This game engine is low cost and has many prefabbed scripts, which drastically lowers programming costs.
  2. Most of the concept, writing and game design work was done for free by the game's creators.
  3. The people working on the game have multiple talents. Your average game studio would have each person assigned to a specific task. Each member of our team is responsible for multiple different types of tasks. Less salaries means a cheaper game.


Game Details

Bowhead will be developed for Microsoft Windows  and Apple OSX using the Unity engine. This powerful game engine allows for multiple styles of gameplay. In Bowhead you will regularly switch between first and third person view depending on your environment. Unity also allows for extensive graphics card options, which allows you to make the game look as good as possible on your computer.


Mobile Plans

We plan to port Bowhead to Android and iOS if we can raise $350,000


T-shirts Available at $40 Perk

Specify whether you would like black or white and your size (S/M/L/XL)


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can’t help:

  • Tell your friends about our campaign.
  • Share our campaign on social networks.
  • If you know 3D artists who would like to help, get them to contact us.
  • If you represent a company or organization that would like to sponsor the development of this game, feel free to contact us.



MORE INFO COMING SOON!

story:
An Introduction: Team Combat - Hobart, IN

Team Combat is focused on providing an experience like no other! If you've played on one of our battlefields in the last few years you'll know we bring an intense video-game experience to life with our immersive technologies!

Founded by father and son, Jack and Wylan Swets in 2011, Team Combat has pushed the envelope in Tactical Laser Tag. New vision, new technology and new experiences are the constant goal of the creative team.

  • Team Combat has been providing and honing a Tactical Laser Tag Experience for 5 years here in NW Indiana. We have been in 3 locations during this time but have now settled at our permanent indoor location. Our business as grown by over 6 times thanks to guests like you!
  • We are upgrading our laser tag weapons to a wireless, real-time integrated system with no physical (wired) connection to the vest! Your investment will help this happen much sooner than we could otherwise offer.  This will launch us into the Next Generation of high-tech laser tag gear we've worked so long and hard to develop.
  • Completely Wireless, Built-In Simulated Recoil, Vibration Feedback when hit, Enhanced Sounds, Holographic Scope, Folding Stock
  • Upgrade to the new equipment should be completed and deployed on our battlefield for the public by Late-March, 2017.

Introducing Project Arma

This new tagger equipment is the first step in a series of advancements we have been developing for over 4 years and we look forward to unleashing it's awesomeness on you!
 

What We Need & What You Get

We need the capital to purchase the components and build all the new gear now! We've been developing and secretly testing our new tagger technology on our battlefield for a while and now we are ready for the full-scale release! We want you, our guests and friends to experience the new tech on our own battlefield first!

  • We need to raise $28,750 to pay the Indiegogo platform fee, Credit Card Fees, provide the perks and purchase the raw materials to manufacture 32 sets of the new taggers and vests.

So how are we going to entice you to help us?

Perks!

With a range of contribution levels, you'll receive exclusive experiences and items that are available only here on Indiegogo and only for the duration of this campaign. Don't wait! Choose a contribution level now!

 

What's The Impact?

Helping us to bring the next level of Tactical Laser Tag to you helps us continue to employ our awesome staff, expand our business opportunities so we can employ even more local talent! This is just the first step to unleashing the awesome, crazy ideas in our heads!

  • You know you already like the experience we offer, now help us raise the bar!
  • Help local business like ours continue to operate, innovate and make a name for NW Indiana!

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? That's Okay...help us spread the word!

  • Share us on all your social media, help us spread the word about this campaign and Team Combat as a local, unique, fun and challenging experience...right here in NW Indiana!
  • When sharing, use the Indiegogo tools so your friends can find our campaign easily.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
About

Wheel of Fate (WOF) is the first chapter of our single player RPG with turn-based combat.  Our goal is to bring back this incredible genre with a unique, modern twist. We have taken pieces we love from classic turn-based RPGs and added next-generation features, such as an artificial intelligence wheel. Our team has always wanted to create an RPG that adapts to player choices.  We want each playthrough to feel drastically different.  We need your help to get in as much content as possible to achieve that goal! 

 
 

In the ancient world of Providence, a hero must rise. The battle to save the universe from the Affliction will be fought in the backwater town of Kismet’s Fall and the Wheel of Fate has chosen you as its Avatar.  Explore a world that changes around you with each spin of the wheel. Defeat a foe ancient as time itself. Wheel of Fate is the RPG that will alter your reality! How will you spin your destiny?

 

Play through a unique story affected by the Wheel and your choices.

 

Watch your world change with the elements. What will the Wheel land on next?

 

Explore the dungeons, collect loot and fight your enemies!

Go on an A.I. generated dungeon crawling adventure, collecting loot and battling enemies! There are many weapons, armors, trinkets and secrets to find.

 

Battle enemies with our exciting turn-based combat system!

A fun and simple, yet deep battle system using active player skills and timeline combat, wrapped in turn-based mechanics.

 

Create a character with races not seen in many RPGs!

Ashar: Curious, open-minded and industrious, the "Scattered People" can be found all over Providence carving out a prosperous future for themselves side by side with other mortal races.

Ikara: An avian species with brightly-colored feathers, the "People of the Skies" observe the  world of Providence from the top of their mountain kingdom; waiting for the right moment to play their part in the coming events.

Rovar: Survivors who have endured endless hardships, the "People of the Plains" are peaceful and wise; but threaten the sanctity of their homeland and the beast within is unleashed, ready to strike at their foes with uncanny brutality.

Veikar: With a history lost in the mists of time, the "First People" are a proud and strong race, the steadfast defenders of ancient legacies and unbridled freedom.

Champion:  Deadly melee warriors that can unleash devastating combos and AOE attacks. These warriors of Fate are there for one goal, decimate the enemy. Sub-classes: Duelist, Barbarian, Hex-blade 

Arcanist: A master of all things arcane these mages are powerful ranged attackers meant to take out all enemies before them. Sub-classes: Wizard, Warlock, Spellsword 

Chosen: These chosen of Fate are tough, nearly impossible to kill, can help their team in numerous ways and deal Fate’s holy wrath to boot! Sub-classes: Paladin, Cleric, Templar 

Ranger: A hunter specialized at dealing deadly ranged abilities that can take down an enemy or prey.  Rangers are hearty and tough, ready to help their team in an instant. Sub-classes: Rogue, Archer, Druid 

 

Mix and match your gear to suit your style with billions of possible combinations.

Use any weapon and armor freely, but make sure you know the strengths of your class!

 

Build your town and upgrade the buildings!

Upgrade your buildings to fortify your defenses and repair when necessary!

Defend the townsfolk!

Some events may jeopardize the people of Kismet’s Fall

 

Explore the town of Kismet's Falls and uncover the secrets of Fate!

 

Experience an array of events that affect the destiny of your world!

 

Wheel of Fate is filled with events that change every time the Wheel spins.

 

Replay the game for a new experience every time! Where will the Wheel of Fate take you?

With the Wheel spinning throughout the game, you can expect an altered story and sequence of events each time!

 

 

How does the wheel's AI Work?

The "all-seeing eye" of the wheel watches everything! Enemies you defeat, loot you pick up, dialogue choices, and much more are fed into the artificial intelligence powering the Wheel of Fate.  The wheel then sifts through all those choices and upon spinning, delivers decisions about what should happen next. When we say your choices matter in Wheel of Fate, we mean your choices decide: side quests, branches in the main quest, the dungeon theme, elemental effects, enemies, loot, and more. Will friends or foes appear at your gates? Only the Wheel of Fate knows.

 

Ring 1 - Force

The force ring sets the prevailing "theme" that is in effect within the world it has 5 segments:

Knowledge - Knowledge will lead you down a path where using lore, your wits, and your skills to prove your mental acuity can overcome anything!

Conflict - Conflict will lead you down a path of aggressiveness, fighting, and using your might to crush the bones of your enemies beneath your feet!

Fortune - Fortune will lead you down a path of subtlety, opportunity, and using your shrewd nature to always come out ahead!

Industry - Industry will lead you down a path of productivity, efficiency, and using your resources to build your empire as a shining beacon of progressiveness!

Adventure - Adventure will lead you down a path of well.. a little bit of everything! You go where the winds take you and no one can deny your wanderlust!

 

Ring 2 - Rank and Quality

This ring tells you what to expect in terms of loot, shops inventory, difficulty of enemies in the dungeon, scale of quests.  If you see Rank 5, be prepared! What you face will be difficult and expensive. With great risk, comes great reward!

 

Ring 3 - Zodiac (Element)

This ring is the "spice" ring.  It changes the ambiance, lighting, available lore, elemental buffs and debuffs, and types of enemies.  As a player, when you choose a zodiac at the beginning of the game, you are choosing to align with a specific element.  On days where your element matches the zodiac, you are buffed! On days where your element is opposite to the element of the wheel spin, you are debuffed.  Let's just say... "Avatar of Fate" isn't used lightly!

With each Chapter of Wheel of Fate we release the A.I will be smarter!  We will work with our players to create intelligence where it's desired. We have started exploring incredible features like fortune telling, intelligent chat bots for NPC's, Game wide A.I decisions based on player choices, etc.  The possibilities are very exciting and we can't wait to explore them with you!

Some people call it luck; others call it destiny. But on the world of Providence, Fate's presence was felt everywhere. Fate is the central force that combines Creation, Destruction and Change, which brought the universe into existence.  That is, until The Affliction appeared. Born out of people's disbelief, the Affliction cut off living beings from Fate's influence, turning them Fateless. The Fateless were defeated in the Zodiac War, but then the world itself was removed from Fate's influence, as the Temple, the Wheel and the Avatar of Fate vanished into thin air.

One thousand years later, Fate, the Fateless and the Zodiac War are nothing but legends, mostly forgotten. Until one day, a lone adventurer reawakens the Wheel of Fate, and the legends of old are realized true. The nearby village of Kismet's Fall becomes the center of the world, as all the races of Providence converge on this sleepy backwater town. The Fateless are poised to reclaim the world that had evaded their grasp. All that stands between them and their victory is one adventurer; the protector of Kismet's Fall and the Avatar of Fate. 

Click to listen

All our music is completely original and incredibly done!  We have a veteran of the music industry and a rock-legend helping us produce the best music for our game!

Terry Brown is the legendary producer of Rush.  He's also worked with Jimi Hendrix, The Who, and more! Terry will be working directly with Derek Atherton to mix and produce some of our songs!

Derek Atherton is a veteran of the music industry for over 25 years. He has performed all over the world, composed, mixed, mastered, engineered, and everything in between. A connisseur of music production and a master of his craft, Derek is the guiding "ears" of our game!

 

 

 

 

When Daniel played RPGs with his twin brother as a child. As many kids did, they had 1 TV and 1 console to playon.  When one of them would get ahead it would spoil the story. This ruined the fun! As a result, he was fueled by a desire to create a single-player RPG where players could have their own stories. Daniel had to find a way to make a dynamic game. Fast forward many years later, and he was heavily modding a player made Neverwinter Nights world called The World of Avlis.  The experience as a player, dungeon master, level designer, writer, and coder helped to cement what would become Wheel of Fate. Daniel then went on to work heavily with random number generators and probability. This led to his “AHA!” moment while he couldn’t recreate the DM experience, he saw a way to emulate it. Combining RNG knowledge from previous work with new machine learning techniques is how Wheel of Fate was born. From that moment onward, UDX Interactive has had many fateful moments which has lead us here and fueled our desire to make rich games filled with excitement and endless fun!

 

We are a company that crafts games we LOVE to play. We’re passionate about original games that are made by players, for the players. Our team consists of experienced individuals that love gaming and as a company, we are committed to building a community. Our motto is to “Think Inside Out”. Thinking outside the box is not enough. We want to take what exists in the world and transform it into something entirely fresh. We are innovating our games in ways that haven’t been done before, while still using game mechanics that are familiar.

 

Our development partner for Wheel of Fate: Chapter 1, is Game Pill.  Owned by our producer, Mike Sorrenti, Game Pill is an awesome studio of experienced and creative developers, designers, and artists.  They have delivered games such as the Mech League Series which includes Mech League Smash.  Game Pill is a powerful group of companions to have with us in our adventuring party!

 

Why Indiegogo InDemand?

After competing to win separate government and private funding in Canada, we have enough to build our base game.  Wheel of Fate will be released. With crowdfunding, we can fill the world with Events, Loot, Enemies, Quests, Easter Eggs, Stories, and everything in between so each player has their own gameplay experiences to discover. The systems are in place and the framework is ready but we need your feedback, your suggestions, and your passion to build a role-playing game that shines.    Helping us build Chapter 1 keeps us accountable to the players. Help us roll-in a new era of single-player narrative RPG's where the story mixes outstanding narrative with modern AI to create a truly dynamic experience. Because any good campaign requires player input, feedback, and engagement. Those campaigns are the best gaming experiences we’ve ever had and we want to share those experiences with you. We need your help to get it done!

We are supported by the incredible:

 

We are committed to building a community around our game. We’re very open with our game development process and want to take you along with us! Check out the articles on Screen Rant and VentureBeat!

Become a part of our Steam community and add Wheel of Fate to your wishlist! We will be giving out Steam codes to our beta-testers!

Join our Discord to get the most EXCLUSIVE content drops and access to in-depth game design discussions!

Keep up with the latest news about Wheel of Fate on Twitter!

Follow us on Instagram for day-to-day studio updates and visually striking posts!

Follow our Facebook page and stay connected with all-things Wheel of Fate!

Subscribe to our YouTube channel to get the most exciting game highlights!

Risks and challenges

Creating a role-playing game is a risky endeavor. RPG's are difficult to make which is why we chose to go single player and PC only first. It allows us to focus on delivering a great game and then porting or adding multiplayer later. We have a veteran passionate team that is willing to push really hard to see Wheel of Fate completed.

We further mitigate the risk of making a big RPG with an extensive story by breaking Wheel of Fate into chapters. Releasing a chapter at a time tests a smaller segment of the game, learn what our players like and dislike, and grow from the experience. You can choose to pick up a chapter at a time, reducing your upfront cost. This allows us to build content based on each chapter's feedback. We want to make our relationship with players as mutually beneficial as possible.

Building a game that is tied to your choices, then having an A.I dynamically deliver the content and build the world based on those choices is a risk. We have mitigated this risk in 3 ways:

1) We have an incredibly experienced team including a PHD in Cybernetics who helped us develop the A.I.

2) We have contained the world to known variables it's a town and a dungeon. So the A.I doesn't have to account for infinite points of data. Fixing the size of the world helps us lower our risk. This also allows us to focus on dynamic content that delivers the most exciting parts of Wheel of Fate.

3) This was the first challenge started when envisioning the game years ago, giving us time to work through what it meant to create this innovation.

We are open and honest about issues and address them directly with the community. This has been our mantra from the very beginning of development through our social media and discord channels.

When we start testing phases we may have to change design, systems or methods in order to deliver a truly fun experience. Our goal is to make a game that we all love to play. While we can't change everything or make every person happy we will do our best to make gameplay, story, and value-added choices that benefit all of us. We will also explain those choices as clearly and openly as possible. We are gamers that love this genre and we are our very hard on ourselves. However, we need your input to make sure we are heading down the right path.

We are confident we will overcome any challenge because of the great team we have to make it happen. We will release Wheel of Fate no matter what happens. However, to truly deliver the full experience we want for our backers and ourselves, we need to expand what's available. We are looking to Crowdfunding to make it happen.

Here's what we promise to our backers:

- We will include our fans, backers, and players feedback in the development of each chapter of the game. Each chapter we put out will focus on growing Wheel of Fate to higher degrees of quality and new, different, and interesting content. Your feedback is vital to making that a reality.

- Where we are not able to release the first installment of the project on a digital marketplace we will refund our backers.
story_txt: AboutWheel of Fate (WOF) is the first chapter of our single player RPG with turn-based combat.  Our goal is to bring back this incredible genre with a unique, modern twist. We have taken pieces we love from classic turn-based RPGs and added next-generation features, such as an artificial intelligence wheel. Our team has always wanted to create an RPG that adapts to player choices.  We want each playthrough to feel drastically different.  We need your help to get in as much content as possible to achieve that goal!   In the ancient world of Providence, a hero must rise. The battle to save the universe from the Affliction will be fought in the backwater town of Kismet’s Fall and the Wheel of Fate has chosen you as its Avatar.  Explore a world that changes around you with each spin of the wheel. Defeat a foe ancient as time itself. Wheel of Fate is the RPG that will alter your reality! How will you spin your destiny? Play through a unique story affected by the Wheel and your choices. Watch your world change with the elements. What will the Wheel land on next? Explore the dungeons, collect loot and fight your enemies!Go on an A.I. generated dungeon crawling adventure, collecting loot and battling enemies! There are many weapons, armors, trinkets and secrets to find. Battle enemies with our exciting turn-based combat system!A fun and simple, yet deep battle system using active player skills and timeline combat, wrapped in turn-based mechanics. Create a character with races not seen in many RPGs!Ashar: Curious, open-minded and industrious, the "Scattered People" can be found all over Providence carving out a prosperous future for themselves side by side with other mortal races.Ikara: An avian species with brightly-colored feathers, the "People of the Skies" observe the  world of Providence from the top of their mountain kingdom; waiting for the right moment to play their part in the coming events.Rovar: Survivors who have endured endless hardships, the "People of the Plains" are peaceful and wise; but threaten the sanctity of their homeland and the beast within is unleashed, ready to strike at their foes with uncanny brutality.Veikar: With a history lost in the mists of time, the "First People" are a proud and strong race, the steadfast defenders of ancient legacies and unbridled freedom.Champion:  Deadly melee warriors that can unleash devastating combos and AOE attacks. These warriors of Fate are there for one goal, decimate the enemy. Sub-classes: Duelist, Barbarian, Hex-blade Arcanist: A master of all things arcane these mages are powerful ranged attackers meant to take out all enemies before them. Sub-classes: Wizard, Warlock, Spellsword Chosen: These chosen of Fate are tough, nearly impossible to kill, can help their team in numerous ways and deal Fate’s holy wrath to boot! Sub-classes: Paladin, Cleric, Templar Ranger: A hunter specialized at dealing deadly ranged abilities that can take down an enemy or prey.  Rangers are hearty and tough, ready to help their team in an instant. Sub-classes: Rogue, Archer, Druid  Mix and match your gear to suit your style with billions of possible combinations.Use any weapon and armor freely, but make sure you know the strengths of your class! Build your town and upgrade the buildings!Upgrade your buildings to fortify your defenses and repair when necessary!Defend the townsfolk!Some events may jeopardize the people of Kismet’s Fall Explore the town of Kismet's Falls and uncover the secrets of Fate! Experience an array of events that affect the destiny of your world! Wheel of Fate is filled with events that change every time the Wheel spins. Replay the game for a new experience every time! Where will the Wheel of Fate take you?With the Wheel spinning throughout the game, you can expect an altered story and sequence of events each time!  How does the wheel's AI Work?The "all-seeing eye" of the wheel watches everything! Enemies you defeat, loot you pick up, dialogue choices, and much more are fed into the artificial intelligence powering the Wheel of Fate.  The wheel then sifts through all those choices and upon spinning, delivers decisions about what should happen next. When we say your choices matter in Wheel of Fate, we mean your choices decide: side quests, branches in the main quest, the dungeon theme, elemental effects, enemies, loot, and more. Will friends or foes appear at your gates? Only the Wheel of Fate knows. Ring 1 - ForceThe force ring sets the prevailing "theme" that is in effect within the world it has 5 segments:Knowledge - Knowledge will lead you down a path where using lore, your wits, and your skills to prove your mental acuity can overcome anything!Conflict - Conflict will lead you down a path of aggressiveness, fighting, and using your might to crush the bones of your enemies beneath your feet!Fortune - Fortune will lead you down a path of subtlety, opportunity, and using your shrewd nature to always come out ahead!Industry - Industry will lead you down a path of productivity, efficiency, and using your resources to build your empire as a shining beacon of progressiveness!Adventure - Adventure will lead you down a path of well.. a little bit of everything! You go where the winds take you and no one can deny your wanderlust! Ring 2 - Rank and QualityThis ring tells you what to expect in terms of loot, shops inventory, difficulty of enemies in the dungeon, scale of quests.  If you see Rank 5, be prepared! What you face will be difficult and expensive. With great risk, comes great reward! Ring 3 - Zodiac (Element)This ring is the "spice" ring.  It changes the ambiance, lighting, available lore, elemental buffs and debuffs, and types of enemies.  As a player, when you choose a zodiac at the beginning of the game, you are choosing to align with a specific element.  On days where your element matches the zodiac, you are buffed! On days where your element is opposite to the element of the wheel spin, you are debuffed.  Let's just say... "Avatar of Fate" isn't used lightly!With each Chapter of Wheel of Fate we release the A.I will be smarter!  We will work with our players to create intelligence where it's desired. We have started exploring incredible features like fortune telling, intelligent chat bots for NPC's, Game wide A.I decisions based on player choices, etc.  The possibilities are very exciting and we can't wait to explore them with you!Some people call it luck; others call it destiny. But on the world of Providence, Fate's presence was felt everywhere. Fate is the central force that combines Creation, Destruction and Change, which brought the universe into existence.  That is, until The Affliction appeared. Born out of people's disbelief, the Affliction cut off living beings from Fate's influence, turning them Fateless. The Fateless were defeated in the Zodiac War, but then the world itself was removed from Fate's influence, as the Temple, the Wheel and the Avatar of Fate vanished into thin air.One thousand years later, Fate, the Fateless and the Zodiac War are nothing but legends, mostly forgotten. Until one day, a lone adventurer reawakens the Wheel of Fate, and the legends of old are realized true. The nearby village of Kismet's Fall becomes the center of the world, as all the races of Providence converge on this sleepy backwater town. The Fateless are poised to reclaim the world that had evaded their grasp. All that stands between them and their victory is one adventurer; the protector of Kismet's Fall and the Avatar of Fate. Click to listenAll our music is completely original and incredibly done!  We have a veteran of the music industry and a rock-legend helping us produce the best music for our game!Terry Brown is the legendary producer of Rush.  He's also worked with Jimi Hendrix, The Who, and more! Terry will be working directly with Derek Atherton to mix and produce some of our songs!Derek Atherton is a veteran of the music industry for over 25 years. He has performed all over the world, composed, mixed, mastered, engineered, and everything in between. A connisseur of music production and a master of his craft, Derek is the guiding "ears" of our game!    When Daniel played RPGs with his twin brother as a child. As many kids did, they had 1 TV and 1 console to playon.  When one of them would get ahead it would spoil the story. This ruined the fun! As a result, he was fueled by a desire to create a single-player RPG where players could have their own stories. Daniel had to find a way to make a dynamic game. Fast forward many years later, and he was heavily modding a player made Neverwinter Nights world called The World of Avlis.  The experience as a player, dungeon master, level designer, writer, and coder helped to cement what would become Wheel of Fate. Daniel then went on to work heavily with random number generators and probability. This led to his “AHA!” moment while he couldn’t recreate the DM experience, he saw a way to emulate it. Combining RNG knowledge from previous work with new machine learning techniques is how Wheel of Fate was born. From that moment onward, UDX Interactive has had many fateful moments which has lead us here and fueled our desire to make rich games filled with excitement and endless fun! We are a company that crafts games we LOVE to play. We’re passionate about original games that are made by players, for the players. Our team consists of experienced individuals that love gaming and as a company, we are committed to building a community. Our motto is to “Think Inside Out”. Thinking outside the box is not enough. We want to take what exists in the world and transform it into something entirely fresh. We are innovating our games in ways that haven’t been done before, while still using game mechanics that are familiar. Our development partner for Wheel of Fate: Chapter 1, is Game Pill.  Owned by our producer, Mike Sorrenti, Game Pill is an awesome studio of experienced and creative developers, designers, and artists.  They have delivered games such as the Mech League Series which includes Mech League Smash.  Game Pill is a powerful group of companions to have with us in our adventuring party! Why Indiegogo InDemand?After competing to win separate government and private funding in Canada, we have enough to build our base game.  Wheel of Fate will be released. With crowdfunding, we can fill the world with Events, Loot, Enemies, Quests, Easter Eggs, Stories, and everything in between so each player has their own gameplay experiences to discover. The systems are in place and the framework is ready but we need your feedback, your suggestions, and your passion to build a role-playing game that shines.    Helping us build Chapter 1 keeps us accountable to the players. Help us roll-in a new era of single-player narrative RPG's where the story mixes outstanding narrative with modern AI to create a truly dynamic experience. Because any good campaign requires player input, feedback, and engagement. Those campaigns are the best gaming experiences we’ve ever had and we want to share those experiences with you. We need your help to get it done!We are supported by the incredible: We are committed to building a community around our game. We’re very open with our game development process and want to take you along with us! Check out the articles on Screen Rant and VentureBeat!Become a part of our Steam community and add Wheel of Fate to your wishlist! We will be giving out Steam codes to our beta-testers!Join our Discord to get the most EXCLUSIVE content drops and access to in-depth game design discussions!Keep up with the latest news about Wheel of Fate on Twitter!Follow us on Instagram for day-to-day studio updates and visually striking posts!Follow our Facebook page and stay connected with all-things Wheel of Fate!Subscribe to our YouTube channel to get the most exciting game highlights!Risks and challengesCreating a role-playing game is a risky endeavor. RPG's are difficult to make which is why we chose to go single player and PC only first. It allows us to focus on delivering a great game and then porting or adding multiplayer later. We have a veteran passionate team that is willing to push really hard to see Wheel of Fate completed.We further mitigate the risk of making a big RPG with an extensive story by breaking Wheel of Fate into chapters. Releasing a chapter at a time tests a smaller segment of the game, learn what our players like and dislike, and grow from the experience. You can choose to pick up a chapter at a time, reducing your upfront cost. This allows us to build content based on each chapter's feedback. We want to make our relationship with players as mutually beneficial as possible.Building a game that is tied to your choices, then having an A.I dynamically deliver the content and build the world based on those choices is a risk. We have mitigated this risk in 3 ways:1) We have an incredibly experienced team including a PHD in Cybernetics who helped us develop the A.I.2) We have contained the world to known variables it's a town and a dungeon. So the A.I doesn't have to account for infinite points of data. Fixing the size of the world helps us lower our risk. This also allows us to focus on dynamic content that delivers the most exciting parts of Wheel of Fate.3) This was the first challenge started when envisioning the game years ago, giving us time to work through what it meant to create this innovation.We are open and honest about issues and address them directly with the community. This has been our mantra from the very beginning of development through our social media and discord channels.When we start testing phases we may have to change design, systems or methods in order to deliver a truly fun experience. Our goal is to make a game that we all love to play. While we can't change everything or make every person happy we will do our best to make gameplay, story, and value-added choices that benefit all of us. We will also explain those choices as clearly and openly as possible. We are gamers that love this genre and we are our very hard on ourselves. However, we need your input to make sure we are heading down the right path.We are confident we will overcome any challenge because of the great team we have to make it happen. We will release Wheel of Fate no matter what happens. However, to truly deliver the full experience we want for our backers and ourselves, we need to expand what's available. We are looking to Crowdfunding to make it happen.Here's what we promise to our backers:- We will include our fans, backers, and players feedback in the development of each chapter of the game. Each chapter we put out will focus on growing Wheel of Fate to higher degrees of quality and new, different, and interesting content. Your feedback is vital to making that a reality.- Where we are not able to release the first installment of the project on a digital marketplace we will refund our backers.

story:
The gameplay background is based around terrible consequences of Extraterrain Invasion in a form of parasitizing biological specimen hacking the Human Genome.

You have no guns for a good reason. Aliens almost immediately can tame your consciousness with their brain waves. The only hope for humanity, not to get enslaved, is the Resist.

Resist is super intelligent group of engineers, stalkers and scientists hiding in secret labs. Their strategy is creating of authonomous battle robots, insensitive to alien's waves. They ugently need to find as many Data Engineers and Data Scientists as possible to acomplish this plan.

And here is your role: beginning Data Scientists who needs to embark on crash course of Machine Learning using Python programming language.

The brain is your main weapon and strength, quadrupled by deep networks forecasting the future.

To dilute the depressing flow of the scenario, some weak points of Aliens were discovered. For example, their brain waves, usually deadly for humans, can be effectively reflected by a small dog of Pug breed. The secret is hidden in the structure of Pug’s brain which operates as a shortcut (absolute zero of Intelligence) for sophisticated brains of Aliens. So as a RPG player, your first task will be finding a Pug and keeping him happy with dog food artifacts. Also don’t miss AID artifacts, as they come handy. Stay away from Aliens Machines Lights - they are harmful.

 

In complete realization of our Game we are planning to have 3 episodes guiding you from most basic knowledge to pretty sophisticated level.

>>>First episode: joining Resist.

You approach the sector A, fully controlled by Aliens. The reason why you are here is Education Corner - a computer, installed by Resist in StarPugs cafe. This computer includes crash course of Python, REST and Data Engineering as well as statements of your 3 tasks for this level.

You have to visit this Education Corner 3 times - each time learning some knowledge and applying earned codes to the game world.

Remember, at the initial level, you are defenseless against the searchlights of Aliens machines. But you can domesticate a Pug whose brain waves can hide you from Invaders.

To keep the Pug near you - you have to feed him with dog food, hidden across the sector area. . If you don`t do this, your faithful defender will run down.

You will have 3 educational lessons on this level. Each lesson has a sequence of Python commands to be performed in Google Colab - the top notch online Python editor with pre-installed Machine Learning tools. In the result of each lesson you will receive a secret code stored on your Virtual Tablet. This code should be applied to some specific object inside the gaming world - like citylight or ATM machine.

The first episode covers the following 3 topics from our Machine learning agenda:

Lesson 1. Intro to coding in the Gaming World.

Lesson 2. Quick intro to Python - the main modern language used for ML

Lesson 3. How to manipulate your Data with Pandas, visualize and analyse them with Matplotlib.

Your BASIC learning path is comprising from 3 big episodes:

- Basic Data Engineering

- Classic ML

- Deep Artificial Neural Networks

This journey was chosen with the aim of quick understanding of main concepts in modern Machine Learning.

Basic Data Engineering gives you through the understaning of your tools: Python language and its usage for sending commands to the Game objects, downloading large datasets, data browsing and visualization. 

Classic ML will guide you through beautyful landscape of Machine Learning based on simple Math models. You will learn two classic applications of Supervised Learning:

- Classification

- Regression

Deep Artificial Neural Networks (DNN) will show you how the edge ML technologies work. DNNs are built as a models of biological brains. We'll start with simple one-layer network of fully connected perceptrons (artificial neurons) and finish with professional Convolution Deep Neural Networks.

 

In case we will collect some fund triesholds, we will open additional Extended educational levels. We call them Hidden Levels. They are:

- Retraining of DNNs

- Cloud ML

- ML for Robot behaviours

You are not alone in your intelligent fight against Aliens. Actually you will be backed by our Learning Support Team. Or Experts by short.

When you are studying in your Colab project and have some questions or desire to get deeper into ML problems, you can initiate 1-to-1 chat with Expert. During this chat Expert can jump into Pair Coding session just inside your Colab page.

To initiate the session with Expert you have to go to Profile and click Chat with expert.

At the final schene of the 3rd episode, you will end up with huge set of achivements.

In the game world you will:

- reach the title of Leutenent Of Military ML in the Army of Resist,

- collect 3 medals (Young Data Faighter, Classic ML Warrior, Deep Networks Rocky).

In the real world you will:

- accumulate solid practical Knowledge of the Core of modern Macine Learning,

- collect working Jupiter Books with code samples in your own Google Drive,

- share each achivement on your FB and Instagram pages,

- add a couple of catchy points to your CV

Machine Learning vs Aliens is by far not a quiet place! Just jump to your Profile and look at Users chat!

You can see who is playing now, who gets asked and answers some questions.

Meet your new friends, the young army of Machine Learning superstars!

We have flexible goals to provide as much useful product as possible in real financial conditions.

This is mean that if we'll collect $5K, we will deploy production version with the first part of BASIC Learning Path, PLUS 2 additional lessons which will wrap-up our short course about Machine Learning.

Starting from $10K we'll provide Native Android and iOS versions of the Game.

If we will collect $30K, we will roll-out full-blended Basic ML Clourse with 2 additional lessons on each of 3 virtual scenes.

Full sequence of our goals you can find below.

Episode 1 Web && Desktop Version.

The first episode covers the following 3 topics from our Machine learning agenda:

Lesson 1. Intro to coding in the Gaming World.

Lesson 2. Quick intro to Python - the main modern language used for ML.

Lesson 3. How to operate with Data using Pandas, visualize and analyse them with Matplotlib.

Lesson 4: Additional lesson.

Lesson 5: Additional lesson.

Expected Release Date: September 2019.

Episode 1 Web && Desktop && Mobile (iOS, Android) Version.

Expected Release Date: November 2019.

A specially design limited edition ML vs Aliens t-shirt!

story:
Whats the Sitch?

Hey there! Thanks for taking the time to check this out! Now, you may be wondering why I made this. The answer is simple, my computer that was built 4 years ago died a horrible death yesterday :[. 

Over the past two years, I have been reviving my computer back to life for various reasons such as a bad power supply, old fans, dead hard drives and various other issues. However, this time it seems everything needs to be overhauled to make sure everything is compatible with each other. 

I currently work full time 6 days a week (I'm working right now on Thanksgiving) in order to make ends meet and sadly I do not have the budget at the moment to be able to afford a computer. My computer is a very special part of my life. When I am not at work I am on my computer, sleeping or taking the occasional shower :P 

Does That Mean We'll Get More Mikamunster Shenanigans?

YUSS! I have been working my buns off so I haven't been able to stream and make youtube videos as much as I would have liked. However, together with your generosity and my willingness to not sleep ever again, I WILL produce weekly and possibly daily content! 

Will This Change The World?

Well, that depends on what you consider "changing the world" to be. My goal since I started being an internet personality is to make peoples day a little brighter :]. I believe that one person can change anothers life in even the smallest way. 

For example, my domo toast video may have inspired someone to make Domo toast for their uninspired sad Uncle Joe. The toast made Uncle Joe happy which then inspired him to invent a gun that shoots katanas just in time for the zombie apocalypse, thus resulting in thousands of lives saved. You can't make this shit up people. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute funds, there are other ways to help! Please share this page with your friends, neighbors, Uncle Joes or that dude you work with that needs a shower. Thank you :]


Goals

$600 Not the full price of the computer I'm building but definitely a big chunk of it!

$900 Wait we got past $600??! What is this witchcraft and who are these generous humahns?! This tier pays for the full price of my computer!!

story:
My name is Andreas Propst; I am a mid-twenties artist and designer of board and card games from a rural part in Upper Austria. Initially I studied social work but had to discontinue my studies after a severe tropical illness contracted during a practical placement with an Indian development agency in 2008. A crisis can be a chance so they say, and that has become true for me. Due to my utterly changed life situation I was able to commit myself fully to what I am most passionate about: Designing tabletop games. 

For about 7 years now I have put tremendous thought, effort, time and also money into a game project of mine going by the name of Elemental Clash. 

Elemental Clash is a fantasy-themed, non-collectible yet highly customizable card game. What was the result of one long night's epiphany back in 2006 has seen ups and downs, has been tended with care, evolved tremendously and developed with passion and commitment. What you see now in the Elemental Clash card game, is the result of an odyssey. With my own, meager financial resources I gave the game, which I had illustrated myself before, a total visual makeover in 2012. After several unsuccessful Kickstarter campaigns I was able to release "Elemental Clash: The Master Set" on www.thegamecrafter.com featuring about 100 exciting cards with professionally done illustrations. Parallel to that, a crafty crew of software developers from Indonesia teamed up with me to take Elemental Clash to your Mobile Device in the form of an App for Android and iOS (You can download the free trial version for Android right now, but more on that later).

Now in the middle of realizing the first, full, 100 cards-strong expansion set to Elemental Clash: The Master Set...

...sadly, the Elemental Clash project, which is my beloved "brain-child", has come to a halt more or less, since my life's savings are spent quite literally. I have countless cards and expansion sets all planned out and the only limiting factor is the financial aspect, specifically the art budget. And this is where I would need YOUR assistance. Please read on as I explain why this is important to me and how you could profit, at the very least in an idealistic sense. I will also showcase some of the grand artwork and the terrific reviews the game has received from renowned games reviewers.

Funding a customizable card game with state-of-the-art illustrations is not easy to accomplish for a single person. Reviewers have said Elemental Clash: The Master Set can compare to popular CCGs like Magic: the Gathering and others when it comes to visuals - and to gameplay. I am proud what I achieved with the Master Set. Now the first expansion, Legendary Legacy, is in the middle of being realized and this is where you come in.

The sole goal of this campaign is to get the artwork for the Legendary Legacy Expansion fundend. 

I have previously announced that I plan on releasing the expansion towards the end of the first quarter of 2014. 

I am NOT raising money for getting a larger print run funded - Elemental Clash: Legendary Legacy will be available via print-on-demand on www.thegamecrafter.com. 

However I would need approximately $2500 USD for the creation of the second half of the expansion set artwork. The first half of the art is already finished but alas I have run out of money and this is why I am reaching out to you, dear friend of fantasy customizable card games, to get the job done!

For your information: One high-quality artwork of the likes of what you have seen so far costs me $50 UD on average. The expansion set will feature  over 100 exciting, new cards and, as mentioned before, about half of the artwork is already done and paid for. That means I would be needing another $2500 USD for the rest of the artwork.

The main goal of this campaign is to raise the remaining money needed to fund the art for the Legendary Legacy expansion.

The secondary or "stretch goal" for this campaing would be to make $5000 USD, which would mean my previous and future expenses for the expansion would be covered. 

In any case I can assure you that 100% of the money you kindly donate will go towards the furthering of the Elemental Clash Project as a whole, being invested in art for future sets or into the development of add-ons and updates for the Elemental Clash Mobile App for example.

If you should decide to support the Elemental Clash project, your rewards shall be bountiful!

I am offering some very unique rewards which will be bestowed on you for any donation starting at as little as 5 dollars and with no upper limit. 

Literally every dollar counts in this campaign.

If you decide to support Elemental Clash with just 5 or 10 dollars, you will get nice desktop wallpapers featuring the unique and awesome artwork from Elemental Clash: Legendary Legacy or the Elemental Clash Master Set and Legendary Legacy Expansion digital version in PDF format for your print-and-play pleasures.

If you think Elemental Clash is something you would like to play with your friends and family, back the project on the intermediate levels which will get you professionally printed copies of the game.

If you deem the project worthy of considerable montetary support and if you ever wanted to be in or contribute to a fantasy CCG, the higher levels might be something for you to consider. At these levels you will get the chance to design 1 or even 2 cards yourself, to be included in the upcoming Legendary Legacy Expansion as well as a huge package of goodies such as copies of the game and a poster featurnig amazing artwork right out of the game. You can either have yourself "immortalized" on an Elemental Clash card, have a friend or loved one immortalized, which would make for a great surprise or gift for any card gamer, or design any card you can think of, to be included in the expansion. 

Here are some samples so you see what my artists are capable of when it comes to depicting the likenesses of supporters of the game:

If this project does not reach its goal of $2500 USD, any funds raised will go 100% towards creating the artwork for the Elemental  Clash: Legendary Legacy expansion.

So again, quite literally every dollar counts and is direly needed to release the expansion set on The Game Crafter towards the end of 1st Quarter 2014.

Here's some "Cool Factors" that may help you decide if you want to give your support or not:

  • Get an amazing, indie Customizable Fantasy Card Game!
  • Support the Elemental Clash Project as a whole!
  • Ensure the future of the Elemental Clash Project!
  • Actively contribute to Elemental Clash with your card idea(s)!
  • Immortalize yourself on a card!
  • Play the game on your mobile device!
  • Grab some exclusive Elemental Clash goodies!

Elemental Clash is looking back at a 7 years history and is, as a whole, very dear to me and to a loyal core of long-term supporters. The Mobile App will make the game accessible to a wider audience.

With your contribution, no matter how small or how great, you will do your part to ensure the future of the Elemental Clash card game and all that is related to it. 

Furthermore, I am giving you the unique opportunity to contribute actively and considerably to my project, by means of designing cards for it.

All in all I think both, you and I can only profit from this and the Elemental Clash project will, through your support, have a bright future.

Again, as much as it saddens me, I have to emphasize once again that the only limiting factor to the growth and wellfare of Elemental Clash is the monetary aspect. My ideas are boundless and plentiful and I have thousands of cards in the form of a dozen expansions or so all planned out. Now I am asking for your assistance in making this real. 

Together we are strong!

Here's some more information on the game itself:

If you want to know more about the Elemental Clash card game, please visit the official website at www.elementalclash.com.

Here you find the game rules.

Here is a visual card spoiler of the Master Set.

And here the partial spoiler for Legendary Legacy (new cards are being added regularly).

And here is what the reviewers have to say:

Cyrus "Father Geek" Kirby gave Elemental Clash his seal of approval. Read the full review here.

Andrew M. Lloyd of Left Hand Reviews about the Elemental Clash Master Set:


And here is an amazing teaser video of the Elemental Clash Mobile App:


If you own an Android device, you can download the free trial version of the Elemental Clash App from Google Play anytime. This way you can check out the game before you commit to supporting this campaign.

For regular art and card previews as well as deck and strategy articles on Elemental Clash, I would like to refer you to my games blog at www.andisgamesrealm.wordpress.com.

And lastly, here are some videos of my humble self talking about decks you can build with just one copy of the Elemental Clash Master Set:

 

Thank you very much for having read this far! I hope you had an interesting read and thank you very much indeed for considering to support the Elemental Clash project!

If you cannot support the project in a monetary way, for whatever reason, please do spread the word about this campaign on social media or by word of mouth. Anything helps!

If you have any questions regarding Elemental Clash or this campaign, do not hesitate and contact me anytime at andreas.propst31@gmail.com!

Thank you for your time and consideration!!

Sincerely yours,

Andi


P.S.: A Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2014 to all of you!

story:
Wouldn't it be great to be a part of history? Nik Wallenda achieved his lifelong dream of walking across the Grand Canyon untethered and doing so, strong in his faith and conviction. His message was to inspire others to dream and achieve the impossible and to always keep trying.

This is our chance to be part of chess history:

Coach Mike Hoffer is my son's chess teacher. We are here to support his dream of competing and winning the World Chess Open this July. He has been training National Champions since 1994 and now it is his turn to claim his spot at this prestigious venue. Throughout his coaching career he has been devoted to training young children of all ages, nationalities, and abilities to pursue their interest in chess and hone it into a winning skill while mastering good sportsmanship. My family has seen what his coaching can do turning our shy 8 year old son into a winning competitor locally in a matter of a few months. Our fundraising efforts are our way of saying "Thank You Coach Mike!" 

If you were wondering about his track record, he has been a Chess Correspondence Champion for many years, 1989 TCC North American Correspondence Champion, undefeated with 62 wins & 9 draws, clear 1st place in all 10 events, is rated 2800+ Internet Chess Club, & has won many USCF events.

His achievements are highlighted on Yes2Chess.com, yet I would like to share something that you will not read there. Coach Mike was recently diagnosed with diabetes & sleep apnea. His strong work ethic and devotion to his family and chess students took center stage through his career and his health suffered. He dropped 70 pounds after the diagnosis and has since been learning how to manage his diabetes through proper nutrition and exercise. He is now again ready for competition and we think he deserves every chance possible of getting to the World Open.

If you are still reading, thank you, and please consider contributing $25 or more, but any amount will be most appreciated. The real target goal is $1200 to cover fees, hotel, gas, and food. This is a short campaign as Coach Mike needs to arrive in DC by July 3, so time is of the essence and that is why the goal stated is $500. 

And reaching that goal is important because the fee will only be 4% if it is reached, it becomes 9% if it does not. It's wonderful that many who have read this campaign have donated directly to Coach Mike, but if you haven't yet please consider doing so on this campaign. 

The quickest and easiest way to donate is through PayPal. You do not need a PayPal account to use their service. It's quick, easy and painless and Coach doesn't have to wait till next week for the funds, it's instant. 

We understand that this may find you unable to contribute and we hope that things look better for you soon. Could you please help us by passing this on to your FB friends and contacts? If you are able to help out "THANK YOU" for helping one man live out his dream and proving to himself that he still has it in him to compete. 

To sweeten your contribution our online company fivestarskin.com is giving perks for contributions. Thank You in advance!

Much success and happiness to you,

Marie Tannus

Chess Mom & Enthusiast

story:
Expand your Farm!

In this game you'll play as a newcomer farmer in a semifuturistic setting who must build up from modest beginnings and progress to success through strategic planning, resource management and lots of fun with the NPC's!

I'm a guy who loves BE, cowgirls and games. I'm a wacky programmer and dedicated expansion story writer who loves to get great things done. I've participated in other visual novel projects such as Minddrone and Choun Yurr own Adventure, and with your help, I'd like to develop an in-depth, interesting and visually awesome game. A Cow Girl Farmer game. If you can help me out a bit, we can make this experience a reality. Here is what its all about:


Gameplay:

The game has two main parts:

 

  • Part 1: Social Interaction: Your relationship with the NPCs is very important, and it will be mainly done through a Visual Novel-like experience. Discover the lives and unique personalities of your fellow farmers and friends as you delve into quests and explore the unique personalities of cowgirls as you develop your bonds. And who knows, maybe you just might find something special :3. Romance is included in the game, in the form of "Scenes" - intense sentimental moments. Important desicions will be made as this segment will be choice-heavy. Will you ask an NPC out with a sly joke or will you just ask her directly? Everthing counts - make the most of your memory and skill to achieve your conquest! 
  • Interrupt function: Unlike conventional Visual Novels, CGF allows you to interrupt the flow of events at any time to make an intervention. Maybe you want to have more details on a certain issue or maybe you need to give a little push to a shyer character. Interrupt lets you do precisely that.
  • Stats & Predisposition: Characters have different, unique personalities. The game uses two stats to measure your relation with others: Intimacy (how much they have "Opened up" to you) and Love (Romantic interest). The progress of these stats are influenced by each characters predisposition - a shy character will have a hard time raising her Intimacy with others wereas a lovestruck one will have an easy time raising her Love stat. However, the players interaction with the NPC's will ultimately decide which course thier relation take.


   

  • Part 2: Strategy and Management: Scheduele your livestock's timetable with different activities and decide the proper diet. Contact different companies and individuals to get hold of clues, special products (foods, pills, equipment), and more profit. Analyze, decide and grow!
  • Scheduele: You have three timeslots per livestock. Each slot can be filled with a different activity that can be progressively improved as a skill.
  • Diet: They have to eat! Nutrition is important, and depending on your diet choices, growth and progress will occur in one area or another.
  • Emails: Contacting your allies is important. Negociate, make buisness and get info on the latest changes in the market so that you don't get left behind.


The cows are procedually generated. What does this mean? Given its amount of "pieces", the system sensibly tailors a co. As of now, there should about about millions of different permutations, considering personality details, innate talents and appearance traits.

The cows appearance (including thier growth) will be generated from the pieces, similarly how other Girl Maker games work, but in 2D. In order to get the pieces and to make the graphics accurate, I need to make a collaborative effort between artists (who need to be comissioned) and myself (coding) 


Day by Day

Gameplay itself will be segmented into days, in a dating sim-like structure. At the beginning of each day, you will check and plan (scheduele, dieting) your day, as well as answer and deliver emails. After that, you will play the day itself.

Playing the day will be like playing a visual novel (Like Katawa Shoujou) - but much more interactive. You will be presented with a novel-like storyline and events that occurr according to your schueduele. However, you may interrupt the flow to make an intervention - and even the NPCs will sometimes do the same too!

Here is the interesting part:



Every dialogue, every text description and action will take into account its context, and create the story with generative grammar. What does this mean? Not only does this mean that gameplay experience will have millions of possibilities, If you're talking to a fat NPC who giggles a lot, the system will take that into account and modify the descriptive narration accordingly, by "filling in" the gaps that have been pre-set as sentance syntax - which will take one form or another (Deep/Surface) depending on what the NPC is thinking and wants to say, or what is appriopriate for the narrator to describe, in the line of the giggling fat NPC in this example. Not only will the narration adapt to the enviroment, it will also mutate to create different phrases, adding to a more colorful and engaging experience.

Within this, each character has thier own personality, mannerisms and vocal patterns. One character may use "I like strawberries" in one situation whereas another would use "In my opinion, strawberries are great". Context-free grammar is just awesome!


Stretchgoals:

  • 7,501: Game released on ANDROID too! 
  • 8,500: Full, detailed human NPC graphics!
  • 10,000: Game fully translated to Spanish!


FAQ

  • On what platforms will it be released? Only Windows, initially.
  • Where will the funding go? About 25% goes to paying taxes and Indiegogo. 30 Cow piece-sets (to make the cow-maker system) and 8 Neighour NPC's plus 8 Companies (each with an Official company NPC, and two affiliated NPC's) are planned. Of the amount left for work, 30% will go to art comissions, 60% to story writing + coding in the syntax along it, 10% will go to pay the rest of the gamecode. The goal is for the 100% game, full questlines and full characteristics. If the goal isn't reached, the game with content proportional to the raised amount will be released (50% raised means half the quests, NPCs and artwork, for example). Game music will be taken from free music licenses.
  • How and when will I get my perks? How: Right after the campaign ends, I'll contact and thank the backers and sort out any particular perk case. When: You'll have your perks delivered within the first to second month after the campaign finishes (wallpapers and similars), or when the game is released (custom in-game perks and the like).

(Game assets may change and improve during development)


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Get the word out of this campaign! Politely post in forums, chatrooms, and tell your friends!.
  • You may use the Indiegogo Shareing tools too! They're pretty nifty.
