Part 2: Strategy and Management: Scheduele your livestock's timetable with different activities and decide the proper diet. Contact different companies and individuals to get hold of clues, special products (foods, pills, equipment), and more profit. Analyze, decide and grow!

Scheduele: You have three timeslots per livestock. Each slot can be filled with a different activity that can be progressively improved as a skill.

Diet: They have to eat! Nutrition is important, and depending on your diet choices, growth and progress will occur in one area or another.

Emails: Contacting your allies is important. Negociate, make buisness and get info on the latest changes in the market so that you don't get left behind.



The cows are procedually generated. What does this mean? Given its amount of "pieces", the system sensibly tailors a co. As of now, there should about about millions of different permutations, considering personality details, innate talents and appearance traits.
The cows appearance (including thier growth) will be generated from the pieces, similarly how other Girl Maker games work, but in 2D. In order to get the pieces and to make the graphics accurate, I need to make a collaborative effort between artists (who need to be comissioned) and myself (coding) 

Day by Day
Gameplay itself will be segmented into days, in a dating sim-like structure. At the beginning of each day, you will check and plan (scheduele, dieting) your day, as well as answer and deliver emails. After that, you will play the day itself.
Playing the day will be like playing a visual novel (Like Katawa Shoujou) - but much more interactive. You will be presented with a novel-like storyline and events that occurr according to your schueduele. However, you may interrupt the flow to make an intervention - and even the NPCs will sometimes do the same too!
Here is the interesting part:





Every dialogue, every text description and action will take into account its context, and create the story with generative grammar. What does this mean? Not only does this mean that gameplay experience will have millions of possibilities, If you're talking to a fat NPC who giggles a lot, the system will take that into account and modify the descriptive narration accordingly, by "filling in" the gaps that have been pre-set as sentance syntax - which will take one form or another (Deep/Surface) depending on what the NPC is thinking and wants to say, or what is appriopriate for the narrator to describe, in the line of the giggling fat NPC in this example. Not only will the narration adapt to the enviroment, it will also mutate to create different phrases, adding to a more colorful and engaging experience.
Within this, each character has thier own personality, mannerisms and vocal patterns. One character may use "I like strawberries" in one situation whereas another would use "In my opinion, strawberries are great". Context-free grammar is just awesome!


Stretchgoals:


7,501: Game released on ANDROID too! 

8,500: Full, detailed human NPC graphics!
10,000: Game fully translated to Spanish!



FAQ


On what platforms will it be released? Only Windows, initially.

Where will the funding go? About 25% goes to paying taxes and Indiegogo. 30 Cow piece-sets (to make the cow-maker system) and 8 Neighour NPC's plus 8 Companies (each with an Official company NPC, and two affiliated NPC's) are planned. Of the amount left for work, 30% will go to art comissions, 60% to story writing + coding in the syntax along it, 10% will go to pay the rest of the gamecode. The goal is for the 100% game, full questlines and full characteristics. If the goal isn't reached, the game with content proportional to the raised amount will be released (50% raised means half the quests, NPCs and artwork, for example). Game music will be taken from free music licenses.

How and when will I get my perks? How: Right after the campaign ends, I'll contact and thank the backers and sort out any particular perk case. When: You'll have your perks delivered within the first to second month after the campaign finishes (wallpapers and similars), or when the game is released (custom in-game perks and the like).


(Game assets may change and improve during development)





Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Get the word out of this campaign! Politely post in forums, chatrooms, and tell your friends!.
You may use the Indiegogo Shareing tools too! They're pretty nifty.

story:
Why Are You Here? 

We need your help to launch Grabble With Words coming out to app stores soon! 

We are almost finished, but we need additional funds to set up the multiplayer servers so we can all challenge each other for word game supremacy!

What is Grabble?

(Dont want to read all this...watch our video :)

Grabble is a FUN social, 3D word game for mobile devices with a unique twist on classic favorites. Grabble’s design is centered around single 6 sided cubes, that fall one at a time from the top of the screen to the bottom.  Each side of the cube has a single, double or triple letter group ( like ER, LY, and ING). By flicking your finger across the screen as the cube falls you can rotate the cube. This rotation allows you to choose the side of the cube with the letter/letters that will help you create words at the bottom of the screen. By placing your finger on the cube you can then navigatie it left or right as it’s falling to the location that will help you most. When you are ready to spell words, you can tap or swipe your finger over letters to spell words for big scores. As the screen fills up with cubes, they can be cleared away by hitting the Grabble button at the top of the page. This will allow room for the cubes falling from the top. The game ends when the timer runs out or the cubes fill the entire screen. 

 Whether you are playing against yourself or have challenged a friend by email or facebook, Grabbe With Words offers both a single player and multiplayer modes. 

A Free version of the game will be available as well as a paid version. Like most free apps, the free version will have small banner adds that will pop up while in the main menu but not during game play. 

Tokens and how they work for you.  Tokens allow players to unlock special advanced cubes, locked features like different background colors as well as power ups to enhance gameplay. The free version will distibute 1 free token every 20 mins, where as the paid version will award 1 free token every 10 mins. A maxium of 15 free tokens can accumulated at any given time.  Players may also earn additional tokens for spelling words from a word list provided in the games main menu called "Grabble Me This".    

 

Who's Making this Super Word Game?

MoxieArts was founded by Eric Petersen who has over 20 years of game development and design experience.  After working for Electronic Arts and Midway Games, he was inspired to set out on his own to create an original word game that adds a twist on classic favorites. MoxieArts contracted ARB Studios, based on their success of multiple mobile apps, to develop Grabble.

How can you Help?

(You're help is invaluable :)

PLEASE...Tell your friends about Grabble and this campaign.

 Make a contribution and enjoy one of our Perks Packages!

 

What We Need...

Here's the nitty gritty details.....We need the additional $10,000 to buy computer servers and test the game so its as perfect as possible for everyone to enjoy.  We are all making this game from our homes and our personal computers so our budget has been limited to say the least.  We have people donating their personal time and equipment because they believe in the game and want to see it's success. Your help will ensure the completion of Grabble and our future to publish our game in other languages

...What You Get!

You get to be a part of the coolest word game since the alphabet was invented!

 

*Perk Package 1

 

RAFFLE ME

For less than a cup of coffee ($2), you will be entered into a raffle for one our 3 Grabble shirts! You will also put a wag in our tail and a smile on our face today! 5 Shirts will be raffled off.

 

 

*Perk Package 2

If you have a little more to give ($5) we will send you the app to download and 144 tokens to give you the upper hand when your friends challenge you to play!

 

*Perk Package 3

 

If you watched our beta game play, and you started making a list of people you wanted to humble with your word crafting ability... we will send you the app to download and 500 tokens to gain every unlockable advantage for you to dominate your friend and foes ($10)

 

*Perk Package 4

For the smart phone afectionado, we offer the app, 500 tokens AND this handy dandy MicroBuff Mini Phone Screen Cleaning Cloth with a repositionable sticky pad for only ($15)!!! But wait, there is more...you will also receive a personalized thank you and autographed picture of The Grabbler and Grabble Girl!

 

*Perk Package 5

 

For ($20) you become one of our Prestigious Players. When you play the game your screen name will be highlighted in a unique way and everyone will know you are the SHIZZNIT!  Receive that "collectable" autographed thank you picture and get Grabble with 500 tokens!! What a bargain, right?!

 

 *Perk Package 6

What can a ($25) contribution to our cause get you?...The Game, 1000 tokens and a Grabble logo t-shirt...oh, and don't forget that rare and hard to obtain thank you and autographed picture of The Grabbler and Grabble Girl!

 

 *Perk Package 7  (The Grabbler Package)

 

Yes, we are getting creative and naming packages now! Today is your lucky day! That’s right, For ($35) you too can own one of these striking Grabbler Tshirts for everyone to admire. You will also receive the game to download, 1000 tokens and...a partridge in a pear tree. Gotcha!

 

*Perk Package 7  (The Grabble Girl Package)

Even red heads can wear pink! For ($35) you can strut your stuff in your fabulous Grabble Girl Tshirt, download Grabble, and get 1000 tokens to challenge The Grabbler to a game!

 

*Perk Package 8 (Grabble Me)

Yes, you read it right! Challenge the world to a "word duel" with this funtastic "Grabble Me" shirt for a ($50) contribution, you become one of our Prestigious Players and receive a special thanks in the game credits, as well as a lifetime supply of tokens to help you beat the pants off your friends. and no, we won't forget to send you a personalized thank you and autographed picture of The Grabbler and Grabble Girl!

 

*Perk Package 9 (You're Our Hero Package)

Now it is your turn to be a Hero! We have several more movies planned for the future and want you to be in one. For ($100) you will have a feature role as a Grabble character in a movie coming out in 2013. You will also get the GrabbleMe Perk Package listed above! (You can give this role to a friend or family member as well)

 

*Perk Package 10 (You're Our SUPER Hero Package)

Not everyone can be a SUPER Hero! If you have the drive and the means ($1000) you could help us get where we need. On top of that warm and fuzzy feeling you will get with your good deed, you will receive 2 VIP invitations to the Grabble Gala Event in Cape Canaveral, Florida with The Grabble Models and Grabble Creators. (travel expenses not included) You will also get everything in the You're Our Hero Package listed above!

 

Other Ways You Can Help....

Don't worry if you cant contribute... you can help us immensely just by spreading the word about Grabble. We all love games of some kind, so if you know someone that is a word game junkie please be sure to send them our way with the links at the bottom of the page!

 

Thank you for your support!!!

story:
Donations will go towards this

Before we begin, I DO NOT EXPECT 500 DOLLARS FROM YOU GUYS! My goal is to raise 100 bucks so I can get my games on Steam Greenlight and have it so you guys can one day play my upcoming game on Steam. Anything pass 100 bucks is just friendly donations and will be used towards making the game itself. The higher the donation, the greater PERK you will get!

story:
We've been Greenlit! Thank you for your votes!

Divinum is an action side-scroller inspired by various hack and slash games currently in development for Windows/Mac/Linux. It's modern pixel art will immerse you in a dark fantasy world.

You take control of a maiden, who gets sacrificed by an evil deity's followers. For a mysterious case, she remains alive. Imbued with a dark curse, now she has to get out of the horrible deeps and seek revenge.

The game offers a dynamic combat system, giving the player a high variety of combos and skills. Besides fights, there will also be puzzles, traps, secrets and more.

The game's languages are English and Russian, but there can be more depending on how the campaign goes.

Feature summary

  • Combine many various attacks to break through the enemies with style.
  • Immerse in the dark fantasy world performed in authentic pixel art.
  • Explore seven hand-crafted levels saturated with monsters and mysteries, each containing a challenging boss battle.
  • Avoid traps, solve puzzles and uncover secrets.
  • Upgrade the character's powers and customize them to play the way you want.

No crafting, grinding or backtracking – push forward and become the fury!​

Despite there will be place for exploration, puzzles and obstacles, the main point of the game is the combat. We want to make it as diverse as possible, yet understandable, to give you a lot space for creativity and style. There will also be a leveling system, which we will show in later updates here.

Here's an example of a simple combo you can do:

Not every attack/combo will be good against different monsters. For example, you shouldn't use a slow charged attack against a quick monster or a group of them. What you can do is to knock them back first, or to not let them hit you by using something fast. Some of the harder enemies will require a unique approach, like those who are protected from the front, but vulnerable from the back, and, of course, every boss.

Meet some of the foes you will fight against:

Our main target is Steam, and the Greenlight campaign is up. Due to the upcoming changes to Greenlight, we need to hurry while it's still there, because the submission fee can get much higher than it is now. It's enough to just get greenlit now and we'll get a pass into the new system automatically.

By now, we are planning to release the game for PC, but we'd like to see our game on consoles too. If everything goes well, there's a good chance for Divinum to be there (some time after the PC release).

Once the campaign is close to success, we will reveal the stretch goals!

We are a team of three dedicated members. Besides that, a few contributors are helping us. We are working remotely residing in Russia, Kazakhstan and Ukraine.

Vladislav is a project leader, he's working on game design, programming and art; Anton is busy with art and story; Daniil does the marketing and many other things.

Our honorable contributors:

  • Alexey is very helpful with his ideas and critics, assuring the quality as no one else.
  • Ilya contributes to the code and design in his free time.
  • Alexander is a nice guy who helps us with website hosting.
  • Also we hire Ayrat to get the awesome music done.

Our story

We had a passion for gaming from our childhood and we spent a lot of time enjoying numerous games of various genres. At some point, we decided to make our own game. The work on Divinum began in fall 2016. Before that, we've done a large research on how to get into game industry and what it involves.

So far, we've been doing very well and we are increasingly improving in our fields. Now we know: that's exactly what we dreamed to be doing.

We need your support to make Divinum great. 

Feedback is very important in making any game better, and we would like if you shared your ideas and suggestions with us.

As main goal, we need just $1000. That would be enough to cover the most important expenses and let us release the game without a problem. There's a breakdown:

 

As you see, most of the money will go towards business and legal expenses. This includes copyright and trademark registration, business registration and running, website hosting and things like that. 

The marketing costs are actually a reserve. If we do well without paid advertising, as well as any extra money, it will be spent on refining the game to be as good as possible.

Overall, there's no real things that could stop us from finishing the game. Divinum will be complete whatever the campaign results would be, and you will still receive your perks, just the release date can change slightly.

In the worst case, if we don't get greenlit on Steam in time and  there is a huge submission fee in the new system, – the other shops would still be opened for us, or if this campaign goes well, we could still buy it right away.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us by telling your friends about our project and campaign. We would highly appreciate that! You can use the Indiegogo share tools for that.

Don't forget to follow us on social media:

  • Twitter
  • VK
  • Instagram
  • YouTube

...and check out Divinum's website. There you can subscribe for our email newsletter.

Thank you for reading! If you have any questions not answered here, feel free to contact us directly at mail@divinumteam.com.

Twitter
VK
Instagram
YouTube

...and check out Divinum's website. There you can subscribe for our email newsletter.

story:
Short summary
The Last Prince is a mobile-based game application, where players start up their own corporate by managing an item shop and sponsoring their very own superhero. 
The life or death of your Hero and the success of your corporation will all depend on your actions. The story slowly unfurls as you venture deeper into the wilderness or upgrade the town you are in. A hostile environment with judgmental town folks and savage monsters in a largely unexplored world, there will be few help on the way, 
Your only friend will be your sole-hope to bring back rare materials and legendary monster eggs from the wild.
You will need to capture your strongest adversaries, train them while hunting for legendary relics to forge legendary equipment with mysterious abilities to outfit your heroes!  (Youtube link: http://youtu.be/Av5g-0yL-9A )

About us & The Impact of this project

  • This is a game app for people on the move, running on the mobile platform, you can play it offline and online. Our company, Snowdrifts, is a family owned company solely setup to create this project and if it succeeds, The Last Prince 2 will also be beautifully made, having all your possessions from The Last Prince transferred over in various ways so any purchases made, and achievements unlocked will not be lost ever!
  • Our game design of The Last Prince, is made by Alan and a group supportive friends and family members who contributes their various skills to its development. The programming is outsourced to The Rocket Studio, a mobile app developer with many years of experience in mobile app development in Singapore
  • We have actively played games throughout the release of wonderful old school titles on various platforms like the famous FF7, Azure Dreams, Xenogear, Chrono cross, Suikoden 2 and Atelier, just to name a few, We grouped together to form our company, Snowdrifts, in order to create games that match or exceed the high-expectations of gaming quality in the mobile industry

About the game

  • Would you like to play a mobile phone game which you can immerse yourself into, just like reading a good book or playing an incredible game like FFVII? With this goal in mind, our team gathered to create an interesting game design, never seen before on this platform or perhaps even in the extensive history of gaming. With solid packed content and polished it over and over like fine art, we wanted to deliver an uncompromised piece of work for your entertainment. We are proud to present The Last Prince.

  • An action-packed, savage wilderness and greedy civilizations…. you are in the center of it all as a....Young merchant? Well, do your best but don't expect people to be kinder to you since you're only twelve. Join us in this exciting story filled with intriguing choices and strategy in which every path to what you desire must carved out by your own two hands.

    We bring to you a young noble, separated from his family by greed and entering the world alone, armed with only his wits.

    Enter into a savage world on your mobile device that requires heavy strategic planning on your part just to survive. You will need to raise funds, forge equipment, hunt for extremely rare eggs of fearsome monsters & demons that had given you pain and hatch as your companions, nurture them and they will serve you well. Solve puzzles, customize your adventurer and upgrade your town, your deeds will not go unrewarded!

    But do you desire more than just surviving? Then you have to decide your ultimate goal! Mold your own story for revenge on the world, or perhaps by your choice to look for Fame or Fortune. Maybe it is in your preference to build your empire or a wish to sit upon the throne? The world is yours for the taking, and you to decide what to do with it through your choices!

    But first, we have to start at the beginning. 

Gameplay

You will run an item shop, not too unlike your very own lemonade stall, where your popularity and success will greatly determine your profits. 
The game will place you in a similar role as the head of a corporation, and in-game mechanics will assist you in place of a company's accountant, pricing department or other valuable departments that you'll find in most companies.
Prices of items on display in your shop will be pre-determined by various factors, and you can fully immerse yourself with larger business decisions, investments and upgrading. Your only resources are time and money.
You will also take control of your hero; a partner to you, whom ventures into the wilderness. The play style is turn-based and revolutionized! Hostiles will not die when defeated, but turn into valuable friendly units for that battle, and the condition for winning is to convert all hostiles into your friends! Beware, you will be facing overwhelming enemies forces, be prepared or you'll lose your lives and items.
Please note that this game is geared towards a challenging difficulty, you will need to be ready for losses as all business encompasses risks, each venture into the wild could reap priceless rewards or spell the doom of your adventure...

Game Systems

Customization / Questing / Future Contents

- Your shop exterior and interior design will be customize by your choices and upgrades, improving your sales and items' selling price via system calculations (You do not need to worry about price haggling)
- Your main character is of noble birth with gender of your choice; cloth him or her in anime-style to show off to your friends (Facebook connection is required!)
- Your partner of opposite gender will also need to be properly cloth with outfits and equipment as he or she ventures out into the wild. Your partner will always stand by your side and will appear besides your main character to your friends!
- If you always wanted to dress up your characters in animal costumes, maid costumes, ballroom gowns, school uniform, swimwear, cowboy set, steampunk, dragon slayer, gothic dragon slayer, pauper with a giant mop, we will provide them all! And not only so, you will have two characters (Male & female) to dress up with! (Items can be acquired through hardwork or cash shop, please enjoy!)
- Pets will grow and evolve, able to acquire up to two skills to assist you in battle. You may bring up to two pets to battle, choose wisely as they may have offensive defensive or healing abilities that is specialised for your needs!
- Equipment will be worn by your adventurer. Investing into a good piece of equipment may result in wonderful effects and hidden ability!
- Monsters may ambush you during battle!
- IQ may increase while playing this game as a side effect. We apologise if this effect is undesirable!
- Future Content: Trade to your friends your additional materials, regardless your Adventurer's rank, it will serve to give you and your friend bonuses!
- Future Content: In-game chatting and socialising are planned to be implemented in future game version!
- Future Content: Friends may appear as your ally during battle!
- Future Content: Shop will eventually be opened to other players for them to visit and purchase stuff (Note: They will access your shop inventory at anytime and greatly improve the quantity sold, but the trade off is that they can purchase at a slightly discounted price for items you offer)

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our primary goals is to improve this game app and develop it onto other platforms.
  • While unfortunately, some of the game design cannot be implemented immediately due to funding limitations, with your support we will soon be able to!
  • We value art, music & storyline besides a good gameplay, and we will consistently be making effort to improve this with each and every updates
  • While our team are working on this for free right now, your donations will not only help us to get paid, we will be able to pay for better artists for developing this game, in regards to this we are excited to gift you valuable things when you start up and account with us once the game is launched!
  • Our project is already ready to be launched! However, some contents will need to be forfeited until more funds and support comes in, and unfortunately, this includes new artworks and music to the current game. We would also like to improve our users' access mediums to Android and other devices
  • The game is scheduled to launch around Mid 2015 (+/- 3 months) depending on the extensiveness we can advertise this! A little more is needed in order to get this up and running, and with your help we'll be able to make it come true
  • We are confident with The Last Prince The last  & Most important thing required is your support! We appreciate and thank you!


Where will your donations go?

  • Your donations will not result in a flawed or incomplete piece of work. The creation of this game has not been an impromptu decision, but a slow accumulation of dreams and ambition to craft a beautiful world in attempt for an incredible breakthrough we have visualised on the mobile platform and to match the famous titles in the history of gaming on the mobile device.
  • While we wish to introduce the game to all platforms and devices, we are sorely limited by our funds to only the iPhone. By donating, you will be helping us on our goal of re-programming this game onto the Android platform, the tablet and the iPad as well. Each are priced separately by our outsourced programmers.
  • Further donations or support from you will result in improved artwork and other languages besides the default English. As we have created this game through heavy effort and investment in good faith of the game's quality, and are left with very limited funds for translation. (Our goal is to translate the game into Spanish, Simplified Chinese, German, Italian, Japanese , but we are also willing to take any request for the language to be translated into)
  • Should we receive a surplus in the donation for the funding of the various platform and translating into the popular languages, the balance of your donations will go into back paying our company's employees and investors who have worked in good faith (No pay).
Here's how we will be using the funds:
  • The first 20k SGD will be used for Android programming (Our Goal!)
  • Following that we will require 5k SGD ~ 10k SGD for advertising design purposes, the more players that we can introduce The Last Prince to, the better this game may succeed!
  • Next, should our fundraiser raise another 20k SGD, it will be used for iPad
  • The next 20k SGD raised will be used for tablet
  • 5k SGD will be required to translate the storyline into various languages (The term and costing have yet to be solidified
  • Finally, should we have any surplus from our earnings or your donations, 20k SGD will be required to fully back pay our workers, as no one have received any pay for their dream as of yet
  • Any leftover funds or money raised that fall short of the closest goal will be funded into various advertising media, artwork, languages and back payment of salary. If you are willing to provide us with anime-style artwork with an European setting or your translation specialties please email us at snowdrifts.sg@gmail.com
  • Various updates will also require funds for artwork & music design, improve our servers and have new systems in place for managing your accounts in-game. This may take around 60k USD in our estimations to fully incorporate.

As SGD is not an available option, your donations will be in USD and necessary currency exchanged will be required. The exchange rate at the point of writing is rated at 1USD is equivalent to 1.25 SGD, therefore 20k SGD will be around US$16010.82 depending on fluctuation and before required exchange fees 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us!

Dear friends, if it is in your convenience, we will greatly appreciate if you'll:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about The Last Prince, coming out around June 2015. (+/- 3 months)
  • Use Indiegogo share tools to greatly support us!
  • Volunteer your art, programming or language skillz!
In return, we will reward you in the game without upsetting the balance of the game play while keeping it uniquely yours.
 If you are willing to provide us with anime-style artwork with an European setting or your translation specialties please email us at snowdrifts.sg@gmail.com

Risks & Challenge

  • The game design is mainly created by few individuals wishing to challenge the current game quality in the industry. To further the program, we screened through many game app developers with good app making experience before we decided to outsource the programming to The Rocket Studio Pte Ltd.
  • Furthermore, we have engaged several testers and done extensive research on their opinions of the game design, while the positive results boosted our confidence and assured us of the quality, we are still actively looking to improve and every fund/support we receive will go a long way in enhancing our entertainment value!
  • The main challenges we face is the heavy limitations of budgeting. Finding investors proved to be more difficult for a newly launched company, but with good faith in the entertainment quality of The Last Prince, we funded this project using various business loans and personal savings.
  • The primary obstacle is to fund the app developers to create the program, having convinced our developers of the potential of this game, they are willing  to work for us at a great discount and see this into a success!
  • The second biggest obstacle for this project is the advertising costs to let it be well-known and enjoyed! This is in fact the most important criteria out of our list to make this into a success. By reading this far, you are already helping us, and we greatly appreciate you more than you'll ever know. Thank you!!
  • To help us improve the awareness of this game, we will need to introduce it to the various platforms for more to be able to enjoy this game and also start various advertisement media resources that are pretty costly
  • Following this, game design can be improved and many future contents will be implemented!
  • The final hurdle is the game content itself, and very often we recognise that complacency is dangerous, if not fatal, to intellectual product developers. In Snowdrifts, we vow to continously improve our product to keep this game a challenge while never resorting to pay-to-win systems.
You will enjoy seeing our game's artwork, game design, game systems, story-plot and game balance  ever improving


Perk Warning

Should you donate multiple perks, you may find yourself with duplicate copies of equipment / pets! In this case we will not be able to send you additional copies as they will result in no further bonuses to you!

Instead, should this happen we will send you multiple copies of "Fan Support Perk" or "Fan Support Perk 2" to make up the value of your donation, in place of lower valued perks that are duplicated, at our reasonable best!

Please note, this may take some time for us to sort it out!


And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Short summary

The Last Prince is a mobile-based game application, where players start up their own corporate by managing an item shop and sponsoring their very own superhero. 
The life or death of your Hero and the success of your corporation will all depend on your actions. The story slowly unfurls as you venture deeper into the wilderness or upgrade the town you are in. A hostile environment with judgmental town folks and savage monsters in a largely unexplored world, there will be few help on the way, 
Your only friend will be your sole-hope to bring back rare materials and legendary monster eggs from the wild.
You will need to capture your strongest adversaries, train them while hunting for legendary relics to forge legendary equipment with mysterious abilities to outfit your heroes!  (Youtube link: http://youtu.be/Av5g-0yL-9A )
About us & The Impact of this project
 
This is a game app for people on the move, running on the mobile platform, you can play it offline and online. Our company, Snowdrifts, is a family owned company solely setup to create this project and if it succeeds, The Last Prince 2 will also be beautifully made, having all your possessions from The Last Prince transferred over in various ways so any purchases made, and achievements unlocked will not be lost ever!
Our game design of The Last Prince, is made by Alan and a group supportive friends and family members who contributes their various skills to its development. The programming is outsourced to The Rocket Studio, a mobile app developer with many years of experience in mobile app development in Singapore
We have actively played games throughout the release of wonderful old school titles on various platforms like the famous FF7, Azure Dreams, Xenogear, Chrono cross, Suikoden 2 and Atelier, just to name a few, We grouped together to form our company, Snowdrifts, in order to create games that match or exceed the high-expectations of gaming quality in the mobile industry

story:
➡ ➡ CUSTOMIZED HEADSETS ARE AVAILABLE IN VOLUME LEARN MORE ➡ ➡

Interact with our SketchFab Model of the SMARTvr DIY 3D Printed Kit!



 

Start looking left, right, up, and down as the experiences unfold in front of you. 



Experience sports highlights, live concerts, breaking news, video games, social media posts, adventurous trips, family events, awards shows, virtual tours, educational courses, movie trailers & more...like never before.








The pocket viewer opens up the VR experience to everyone by transforming any iOS or Android smartphone into an affordable virtual reality viewer.








First, download any number of virtual reality mobile apps onto your phone from Google’s Play Store or Apple’s App Store and then open one up. 


Unfold your SMARTvr viewer and place your smartphone in the phone slot. Then, flip the immersive lens cover over the top and hold the SMARTvr to your eyes as you would a pair of sunglasses. Look through the lenses and peer around your new location in 360°.


Fold it up and easily stash your SMARTvr away until your next experience.



     





Capture your life in immersive, interactive 360° video with freely available creation apps or 360 degree cameras that can be shared instantly on social media and relived fully in virtual reality.

Whether it’s reliving an exotic vacation, sharing special moments with loved-ones or posting to 360 videos to Facebook for the world to see, you can capture the world around you for all to see like never before.


It's easy to create, share and view this new era of content with your SMARTvr portable virtual reality viewer.


You can create your own virtual reality content now...just as easily as snapping a photo on your smartphone.
Take beautiful panoramic photos with depth and sound you can see and hear in VR by downloading any number of free smartphone VR Photo Apps to capture your own 3D Panoramic Virtual Reality experiences.

Capture breathtaking views and once in a lifetime moments in VR so you can relive always them. Hear the sounds as they happened and look around to see the scene in all directions. VR photos are 3D so near objects look near and far objects look far.

Capture life, share your experiences, or travel back in time to relive those special moments.

There is new, top-quality content being produced that is genuinely worth watching and experiencing first-hand. This is the very beginning of a revolutionary era in producing and consuming photo, video and immersive media content. 



There are VR tours of museums and stunning locations, heart-pounding skydiving jumps, jet-flying and car-racing adventures, and human-centric stories and short films to experience. Apps and short videos will put you anywhere from a seat in the audience of Saturday Night Live to a wetsuit as you dive into an ancient, shark-riddled shipwreck. 


SKY NEWS - Made in collaboration with Jaunt Inc. - the company known for its pioneering and cinematic virtual reality - the report below on the Migrant Crisis was filmed using their new Jaunt ONE: a state of the art professional grade VR camera.

NY TIMES - Through virtual reality, the New York Times puts you at the center of the stories that only they can tell: stories reported by a staff of award-winning journalists all told through an immersive video experience. The limits of their storytelling now stretch further than ever before imagined.


     


From the days of radio to black & white, color, and high definition television, the sports viewing experience has always evolved - feast your eyes on what's next:


Couldn't afford those premium tickets to see your favorite artist the 1 night they're in town? With the immersive SMARTvr, you can always make it to the front row: 



Experience the widest array of premium cinematic VR experiences with Jaunt's re-imagined fully immersive app. Paul McCartney (by Jaunt) gives a serious glimpse at the future of entertainment.
Starting out on stage,  sitting next to Sir Paul, you're then teleported to the front of the audience to watch a spectacular pyrotechnics display before returning to center stage to finish the song.



     




Take a ride on an insane roller coaster, record a world record lap time in a Porsche Panamera Turbo, or fly alongside the Blue Angels in an FA-18 fighter jet:

The possibilities are endless and growing exponentially. Get started by experiencing the world of virtual reality today... It's easy to get started with the SMARTvr pocket viewer.

Whether you want to create your own experiences or consume the 1,000's of free virtual reality experiences already waiting for you.


The 360° video community is expanding rapidly and there are a number of 360° video players available today.


Share your 360° videos on the most popular video sharing sites including YouTube,Facebook, Vrideo and Littlstar. Let your friends see everything in 360°.

  • YouTube - The worlds most widely known video sharing site now supports the 360° file formats. You will need to use our V.360° Video Converter which will convert your video into the YouTube 360 format. 

  • Littlstar - You can share both 360° video and panoramic photos on Littlstar. 

  • 360Cities - Upload your panoramic photos and share them with your friends and family. You can email a link and they can instantly see on their PC or Mobile device.

  • VRIDEO - New on the scene and supports our V.360° file formats. You can directly upload your video to the Vrideo site and the player will allow you to pan left or right with your mouse or keyboard.



  • Removable Microsuede Lens Cover

  • Cover converts to light shield in use, provides improved immersion

  • Field of View: approximately 100°

  • Large 34 mm biconvex lenses

  • Compatibility: all smartphones (Android/iOS)

  • Dimensions: 65.6 mm x 120.5 mm x 16.5 mm

  • Weight: 0.2 lbs, 3.2 oz, 90 grams (for reference, an iPhone 6S weighs 143 grams, so SMARTvr is 37% lighter than the iPhone)

  • Fits smartphones 6 mm to 12.5 mm thick (for reference, an iPhone 6S is 7.1 mm, Samsung S7 7.9 mm)



Virtual reality as a concept has been around for the last 40 years, but until recently it was more of a fantasy. Many of us had our interest piqued in 2012 with the Oculus crowdfunding project only to learn we would still be tethered to a supercomputer. In 2014, Google introduced ‘Google Cardboard’ and DODOcase became the first company to supply Cardboard VR viewers to the world. We pioneered the space with the capacity touch functionality of our V1.2 and the ease of assembly of our Pop Up series of viewers. We even invested over $60K in open source software development via our DIYVR campaign to try to accelerate web-based VR development tools for easier and more accessible content production. For the last two years, we’ve been a leader in the Works with Cardboard program selling viewers directly to consumers but also working with brands and advertisers such as The North Face, Elle Magazine, Conan O’Brien and 100s more to deliver customized VR experiences to their fans.


Working closely with dozens of industry professionals and with the experience of delivering 10,000+ consumer demos, we arrived at SMARTvr. We realized that as amazing as Cardboard VR is for your first taste of VR, in order to consume all the VR content that is pouring onto our smartphones, we needed something more portable and more durable. SMARTvr is the result of all these inputs. We wanted to build a product that would be your conduit to all the amazing content being created for your mobile phone.




Founded in 2010, DODOcase has been known globally for its tablet and phone accessories. In June 2014, DODOcase launched the first consumer Cardboard Virtual Reality headset and became Google's first partner in the Works with Cardboard program. We quickly became the source for quality Virtual Reality headsets and partnered with the world's premiere VR content producers. After 1000s of discussions with consumers and partners we developed SMARTvr. We can't wait to continue to define the smartphone VR market with you.







Where do I find Smartphone VR apps?

Search for apps in your favorite apps store (Google Play / iTunes). Below are some of our favorites.

Top Free Virtual Reality Apps:

  • New York Times VR (Experience the Streets of NY)

  • Discovery VR (Swim with sharks)

  • VRStories (Gannet Media) (Fly with the Blue Angels)

  • Jaunt VR (Rock climb with team North Face)

  • VRSE (Jam with U2)

  • RYOT (Become a global citizen)

  • Porsche VR (Drive a 911 on a private test track)

  • Cedar Point VR Roller Coaster (Experience a theme park ride)

  • Littlstar (Enjoy a library of videos)

  • River VR (Drive with a professional race driver)



What types of phones are supported by SMARTvr?

SMARTvr supports all Android and iOS (Apple) Smartphones (iPhone 5 and wider). Our experience is that VR apps run best on Android 4.2 or greater / iOS 7 or greater.


Can I leave my phone case on?

SMARTvr can accommodate most slim cases. We recommend you proceed slowly if you have any question as you do not want to bend the arms beyond their base.


Where are you based?

We are based in the Dogpatch Neighborhood of San Francisco. Yes, you are welcome to stop by.


Why don't you have a head strap?

By requiring users to hold SMARTvr to their faces, we engage the entire torso when swiveling around enjoying VR experiences. An engaged torso helps retain equilibrium when standing using your viewer. This allows SMARTvr to be enjoyed in any environment. This is also a mandate of the 'Works with Cardboard' certification program from Google.


Are you in the 'Works with Cardboard' program?

Yes, we were Google's first partner in the Works with Cardboard program dating back to 2014. We have a great working relationship with the Cardboard team which insures our products are the highest quality in the world.


What are your lens made from?

Our 34 mm biconvex lens are made from acrylic.


How do I install a neck lanyard onto SMARTvr?

You'll notice a slot in each of the metal hinges. Simply slot the cable through the hole and loop your lanyard through.


Where was this product designed?

SMARTvr was designed in San Francisco, CA with engineers from MIT and San Jose State with advise from an ex Apple engineer.


Can I create my own VR content?

Yes, simply phone apps like 'Cardboard Camera' can be used to great photo spheres. You may also use specifically designed 360 cameras such as 360Fly, Giroptic and Ricoh Theta to create content.


Who will enjoy this product?

In short, everyone. We see an explosion of uses of VR from professional to entertainment. SMARTvr is designed to travel with you everywhere so you can enjoy content wherever you go.


How do I hear the audio?

SMARTvr provides access to the audio port of your phone so you can enjoy sound via standard headphones or directly from your phone's speakers.


Is the lens cover removable?

Yes


How do I remove the lens cover?

Pinch the edge of the lens cover between your thumb and forefinger, pull up the corner slightly and slide the cover out either side. The cover sits in a U shaped slot on the top of SMARTvr. The slot has opening on either sides for removal. To reinsert, slot the cover rod into the U shape slot and slide across.


What does the lens cover do?

The lens cover serves two primary purposes. 1) When not in use, the cover protects the lenses from scratches when in your pocket or bag. 2) While in use, the lens cover provides a shield from ambient light entering from above which aids in the sense of immersion.


I'm planning on buying an Oculus, Vive or Playstation VR, why would I want this?

Smartphone VR is all about being on the go and being able to share experiences with friends. We love the high fidelity systems, but they will occupy a different part of the VR market and are designed for use in your home. SMARTvr will be your gateway to thousands of VR experiences and will allow you to show VR to friends and family with ease. Remember, the only way to explain VR is to try VR!
story_txt:
➡ ➡ CUSTOMIZED HEADSETS ARE AVAILABLE IN VOLUME LEARN MORE ➡ ➡

Interact with our SketchFab Model of the SMARTvr DIY 3D Printed Kit!

 Start looking left, right, up, and down as the experiences unfold in front of you. 
Experience sports highlights, live concerts, breaking news, video games, social media posts, adventurous trips, family events, awards shows, virtual tours, educational courses, movie trailers & more...like never before.


















The pocket viewer opens up the VR experience to everyone by transforming any iOS or Android smartphone into an affordable virtual reality viewer.










First, download any number of virtual reality mobile apps onto your phone from Google’s Play Store or Apple’s App Store and then open one up. 




Unfold your SMARTvr viewer and place your smartphone in the phone slot. Then, flip the immersive lens cover over the top and hold the SMARTvr to your eyes as you would a pair of sunglasses. Look through the lenses and peer around your new location in 360°.




Fold it up and easily stash your SMARTvr away until your next experience.







     








Capture your life in immersive, interactive 360° video with freely available creation apps or 360 degree cameras that can be shared instantly on social media and relived fully in virtual reality.

Whether it’s reliving an exotic vacation, sharing special moments with loved-ones or posting to 360 videos to Facebook for the world to see, you can capture the world around you for all to see like never before.


It's easy to create, share and view this new era of content with your SMARTvr portable virtual reality viewer.




You can create your own virtual reality content now...just as easily as snapping a photo on your smartphone.


Take beautiful panoramic photos with depth and sound you can see and hear in VR by downloading any number of free smartphone VR Photo Apps to capture your own 3D Panoramic Virtual Reality experiences.





Capture breathtaking views and once in a lifetime moments in VR so you can relive always them. Hear the sounds as they happened and look around to see the scene in all directions. VR photos are 3D so near objects look near and far objects look far.




Capture life, share your experiences, or travel back in time to relive those special moments.




There is new, top-quality content being produced that is genuinely worth watching and experiencing first-hand. This is the very beginning of a revolutionary era in producing and consuming photo, video and immersive media content. 



There are VR tours of museums and stunning locations, heart-pounding skydiving jumps, jet-flying and car-racing adventures, and human-centric stories and short films to experience. Apps and short videos will put you anywhere from a seat in the audience of Saturday Night Live to a wetsuit as you dive into an ancient, shark-riddled shipwreck. 





SKY NEWS - Made in collaboration with Jaunt Inc. - the company known for its pioneering and cinematic virtual reality - the report below on the Migrant Crisis was filmed using their new Jaunt ONE: a state of the art professional grade VR camera.




NY TIMES - Through virtual reality, the New York Times puts you at the center of the stories that only they can tell: stories reported by a staff of award-winning journalists all told through an immersive video experience. The limits of their storytelling now stretch further than ever before imagined.



     






From the days of radio to black & white, color, and high definition television, the sports viewing experience has always evolved - feast your eyes on what's next:




Couldn't afford those premium tickets to see your favorite artist the 1 night they're in town? With the immersive SMARTvr, you can always make it to the front row: 






Experience the widest array of premium cinematic VR experiences with Jaunt's re-imagined fully immersive app. Paul McCartney (by Jaunt) gives a serious glimpse at the future of entertainment.
Starting out on stage,  sitting next to Sir Paul, you're then teleported to the front of the audience to watch a spectacular pyrotechnics display before returning to center stage to finish the song.



     


Take a ride on an insane roller coaster, record a world record lap time in a Porsche Panamera Turbo, or fly alongside the Blue Angels in an FA-18 fighter jet:


The possibilities are endless and growing exponentially. Get started by experiencing the world of virtual reality today... It's easy to get started with the SMARTvr pocket viewer.Whether you want to create your own experiences or consume the 1,000's of free virtual reality experiences already waiting for you.



The 360° video community is expanding rapidly and there are a number of 360° video players available today.

Share your 360° videos on the most popular video sharing sites including YouTube,Facebook, Vrideo and Littlstar. Let your friends see everything in 360°.

YouTube - The worlds most widely known video sharing site now supports the 360° file formats. You will need to use our V.360° Video Converter which will convert your video into the YouTube 360 format. 
Littlstar - You can share both 360° video and panoramic photos on Littlstar. 
360Cities - Upload your panoramic photos and share them with your friends and family. You can email a link and they can instantly see on their PC or Mobile device.
VRIDEO - New on the scene and supports our V.360° file formats. You can directly upload your video to the Vrideo site and the player will allow you to pan left or right with your mouse or keyboard.






Removable Microsuede Lens Cover
Cover converts to light shield in use, provides improved immersion
Field of View: approximately 100°
Large 34 mm biconvex lenses
Compatibility: all smartphones (Android/iOS)
Dimensions: 65.6 mm x 120.5 mm x 16.5 mm
Weight: 0.2 lbs, 3.2 oz, 90 grams (for reference, an iPhone 6S weighs 143 grams, so SMARTvr is 37% lighter than the iPhone)
Fits smartphones 6 mm to 12.5 mm thick (for reference, an iPhone 6S is 7.1 mm, Samsung S7 7.9 mm)




Virtual reality as a concept has been around for the last 40 years, but until recently it was more of a fantasy. Many of us had our interest piqued in 2012 with the Oculus crowdfunding project only to learn we would still be tethered to a supercomputer. In 2014, Google introduced ‘Google Cardboard’ and DODOcase became the first company to supply Cardboard VR viewers to the world. We pioneered the space with the capacity touch functionality of our V1.2 and the ease of assembly of our Pop Up series of viewers. We even invested over $60K in open source software development via our DIYVR campaign to try to accelerate web-based VR development tools for easier and more accessible content production. For the last two years, we’ve been a leader in the Works with Cardboard program selling viewers directly to consumers but also working with brands and advertisers such as The North Face, Elle Magazine, Conan O’Brien and 100s more to deliver customized VR experiences to their fans.
Working closely with dozens of industry professionals and with the experience of delivering 10,000+ consumer demos, we arrived at SMARTvr. We realized that as amazing as Cardboard VR is for your first taste of VR, in order to consume all the VR content that is pouring onto our smartphones, we needed something more portable and more durable. SMARTvr is the result of all these inputs. We wanted to build a product that would be your conduit to all the amazing content being created for your mobile phone. 







Founded in 2010, DODOcase has been known globally for its tablet and phone accessories. In June 2014, DODOcase launched the first consumer Cardboard Virtual Reality headset and became Google's first partner in the Works with Cardboard program. We quickly became the source for quality Virtual Reality headsets and partnered with the world's premiere VR content producers. After 1000s of discussions with consumers and partners we developed SMARTvr. We can't wait to continue to define the smartphone VR market with you.










Where do I find Smartphone VR apps?
Search for apps in your favorite apps store (Google Play / iTunes). Below are some of our favorites. 
Top Free Virtual Reality Apps:

New York Times VR (Experience the Streets of NY)
Discovery VR (Swim with sharks)
VRStories (Gannet Media) (Fly with the Blue Angels)
Jaunt VR (Rock climb with team North Face)
VRSE (Jam with U2)
RYOT (Become a global citizen) 
Porsche VR (Drive a 911 on a private test track)
Cedar Point VR Roller Coaster (Experience a theme park ride)
Littlstar (Enjoy a library of videos)
River VR (Drive with a professional race driver)

story:
ARQ Treasure Quest

Imagine being part of a team of marine archaeologists as they pinpoint the location of a historical shipwreck. The excitement the diver experiences approaching this time capsule and finding his first artifact. Seeing how it can be restored to its original state and add another clue to our knowledge of human history.

Arqueonautas is a marine archaeological company that has been looking for and recovering ship wrecks for over 17 years.

Recently they have paired up with a team of young game developers that have been turning their day to day adventures into a challenging and realistic game.

The Game

In this game the player will experience all the joys and frustrations of leading a treasure quest. Through Arqueonautas extensive experience this game is going to be as real as it gets.

The game is being developed for PC and is intend to be released on multiple platforms

Expeditions are extremely expensive so in order to survive the cutthroat competition the player must manage his team and resources very well.

The player must hire his team, chose a location, get historical archival research, apply to government licenses, get financing, buy boats and buy equipment.

When the expedition is launched he must stock up on supplies, such as, water, fuel, food, spare parts and diving supplies that will enable him to search, find and remain the maximum time at the wreck location.

The player must survey the seabed and send down divers once the wreck is positively identified.

During excavations the player must manage his divers work by assigning tasks such as scanning with a metal detector, marking an area, excavating or lifting objects to the surface. He must also pay close attention to the air available in the tanks and decompression time.

Once you bring the artifacts to the surface you must assign resources to recovering them so that unique artifacts may later be donated to museums to gain prestige and repetitive cargo can be sold to cover costs and possibly profit.

The Production

We have spent the past six months in pre-production and setting up the art work needed to make a full working version of the game.

We have ready to be implemented:

  • 2D and 3D Menus
  • Characters
  • Harbor Location - Island of Mozambique (MOZ)
  • Boats
  • Tools and Equipment
  • Wreck Sites
  • Artifacts

Now We Need

We have a team of programmers that are going to start implementing all the ideas and art into a working version of the game.  

  • We need funding for programmers.
  • We need funding for 2D and 3D Artists
  • We need funding for Sound and Music

Arqueonautas and the team have been reaching into their pockets to bring this project forward at a risk.

We are fully committed to completing this project!

With your help we can improve the quality of the game and ensure it will be a huge success.

If we do not achieve the $25000 mark we will still put all the funding raised into the project and do what we can to come up with the best possible end product.

We are conceiving creative ways to expand this game over time and connect it as closely as possible to real life operations.

Perks

All donators will be thanked on our web site and social networks.

Due to the epic nature of the business we have some very cool exclusive art to give out signed by the artists.

Feel part of the adventure and get an exclusive Arqueonautas Mozambique Expedition T-shirt.â¶

Donate $1000 and we will mail you an authentic numismaticaly graded silver coin from one of the wrecks excavated by Arqueonautas. You will also be awarded the highest status in our forums.â·

Donate $2000 and send us your pictures, we will put a stylized 3D character named by you and that resembles you in the game. Plus we will send you an animated video of your character.

Our ultimate perk is to become an ARQ Explorer and join the Arqueonautas team at the Island of Mozambique and participate for 5 days on the expedition.â¸

 

â¶ All physical perks include normal mail delivery anywhere in the world. Any taxes that
might apply are to be paid by the receiver.

â· Coins include a certificate of authenticity and origin by Arqueonautas Worldwide

â¸ Dates to be arranged according to Expedition and lodging availability.

 

Saving World Maritime Heritage

Arqueonautas mission is to protect World Maritime Heritage in accordance with current professional standards of archaeological practice. 

Hopefully players will get captivated by the importance to protect the unique marine archaeological heritage and they will care and get related to the history, conservation and documentation of the artifacts and wreck sites.

We are going to create a direct connection between the players and Arqueonautas real life operations. Through the forum you can follow operations closely, interact with the crew and be informed of ways to support expeditions.

Every copy of the game that is sold brings money to protecting world maritime heritage.

 

Thank You for Your Help!

We hope you like our project.

 

Please share it with anyone that may be interested!

story:
Say Something in the press:

Practice your dating skills from the comfort of your home


We want to save men and women from awkwardness, eerie silences and bad conversations. SAY SOMETHING will turn confusing first dates into an enjoyable, fun play.

That's the promise of SAY SOMETHING, an iPhone app designed to introduce users to other singles, allowing them to practice their chat up lines and dating conversations. From the FIRST CONVERSATION all the way to a DATE. Its all completely anonymous so users never meet. We can proudly say this is the first app of its kind in the world! 


What is the Problem with Dating? 

  • 50% of all single adults now use online dating
  • 80% of these users have a terrible first experience
That's a BIG problem!


How do we know? We love facts - they tell the truth. So we analyse and study online and mobile dating behaviour or real people. By the way, we have just presented our latest Online Dating Deconstructed 2013 study at Google Campus.  


The reason?

The biggest reason for failed dates is lack of dating skills - awkward dates and boring conversations. 


We have the solution!


We want to stop people getting slapped on their first date!

The app allows men to practice their conversational and dating skills with real women. It presents a situation, for example, 'You're standing at a bar and she smiles at you', then asks the player to type what they would say. Female players can immediately give feedback, giving it thumbs-up or down. Then they also type their response, to which the men can provide feedback too. 

So SAY SOMETHING uses CROWD SOURCING to gather dating advice. In other words the more you play, the more valuable feedback you get.

There are two key premises:

  1. Dating practice is virtual, players will not meet in real life;
  2. No direct personal contact makes honest feedback possible.



Where the idea came from

A few years ago when I tried online dating, I send over 50 messages to potential dates only to see 2 responses. Including an 'out of office' auto reply. True story :) I asked a few experts for advice, but there gurus often contradicted themselves.

Then it hit me: Dating is personal and what works for one person, may not work for another. Dating advice MUST be personal!

It seems like a revolutionary idea. As a matter of fact, it is. It makes dating gurus obsolete. Luckily we don't need them anymore, because with SAY SOMETHING people can help each other just by playing a simple game.  


We are going for Gold!

We have already developed two other apps with over 23 thousand happy users. Sure, we learn every day and are humbled by our customers' feedback. Yet, this is not our first app project and we know how to make it happen. We know that when we say we will go live in Oct 2013, we will. That is our team's promise.



We are crazy about constructive feedback, it makes us work harder. We also like positive feedback and are happy to share it with you. Our prototype has been shortlisted for the Most Innovative Dating Service Award of 2013! This is the Oscars of the dating world! The deadline for final votes is Oct 31st, we will launch on Oct 1st. As you can see, we HAVE to launch on time. 


Meet the team behind SAY SOMETHING:


We are passionate about helping others help themselves. There is nothing more fulfilling in the world for us.

Marian Gazdik                                  Piotr Intres

Founder/CEO, Marketing/Product        Technology/IT


Maeva Bire                                         Patrick McCay 

Community/PR                                    Finance/Analytics


Ben Donkor, Social Media


Take a look at some of us in action:



Together We Are Stronger

We have already developed the app prototype, are finalising designs and preparing for the launch.

The £20k ($31k) we are raising with your support will allow us to: 

  • Finalise designs, 
  • Prepare in co-operation with World's leading dating experts World's unique contextual dating advisor,
  • successfully finish back-end and front-end development,
  • implement product testing and improvement,  
  • put the finishing touches to the product,
  • prepare for the launch and telling the world about it.

With your help, we will proudly make SAY SOMETHING available to you and the millions of single people and save the world from those awkward first conversations!

Other ways how you can you help? Share us with friends. 

Just click here now. 

Thanks, it means a lot!

Maeva Bire                                         Patrick McCay 
Community/PR                                    Finance/Analytics





Ben Donkor, Social Media



Take a look at some of us in action:



Together We Are Stronger

We have already developed the app prototype, are finalising designs and preparing for the launch.
The £20k ($31k) we are raising with your support will allow us to: 


Finalise designs, 
Prepare in co-operation with World's leading dating experts World's unique contextual dating advisor,
successfully finish back-end and front-end development,

implement product testing and improvement,  

put the finishing touches to the product,
prepare for the launch and telling the world about it.



With your help, we will proudly make SAY SOMETHING available to you and the millions of single people and save the world from those awkward first conversations!


Other ways how you can you help? Share us with friends. 
Just click here now. 
Thanks, it means a lot!

story:
Fish Astronaut is an original mobile game, from cuteness to adventurous. Help the Fish take the giant leap and fulfill his dream.

Fish Astronaut - Concept Art

What is Fish Astronaut?

Fish Astronaut came from an idea that big things can happen to little people if they put all their effort in it, even if it collides with nature.

Fish Astronaut - The Fish

The game itself will feature great graphics, retina display for the iphone, hi-def images for other platforms, with an original soundtrack being composed by a Puerto Rican composer with many years making good music.

Fish Astronaut - Rocket Transformations

The game will feature 3 main stages, Underwater, Air, Space. Each of these stages will have their own obstacles, feel and of course rocket; which also means different maneuverability for every rocket.

Fish Astronaut - Game Launch Pad and Some Obstacles

It will feature a "title" system in which the player has to do certain objectives according to which title he's got. And the higher the title the more score (multiplier) he's got.

Fish Astronaut - Early Launch Pad Concept

The stars you collet on the actual flight can be used to buy upgrades to the ship, to reach further and further every time you launch. Until you reach your destination, the Moon. High replay-ability value.

Fish Astronaut - Concept of the 3 phases. Underwater-Air-Space

We are very excited about Fish Astronaut and we want to make him launch as soon as possible, and so we need your help. Please Support Us.

Thank You,

Cami and Domi

Fish Astronaut - Fund Perks

story:
What You Get

All contributors receive 150% of there donation value in game currency on the final release of the game.

In addition we have Custom Art, T-shirts and Stickers.
These Feature " The Girls of SteamPunk ".
These are actual Models that we photographed to build some of the Coolest Non Player Characters in the game.



Model : Sarah Slaughter. Photographer : Daniel James www.herphotographer.com



Our Story

Rogue's Odyssey is a browser-based, free-to-play SteamPunk MMORPG currently in production.  Explore a vast world where the New British Empire is the sole world government. Current technology and electricity has been all but forgotten. A world that visionaries such as Jules Verne believed would exist throughout the ages, with a touch of magic. You play an individual who has rejected his title, what this current society considers a Rogue. As a Rogue you wish to rise above the position fate has placed you in life. And it's a very big world out there.
Good Luck !

Rogue's Odyssey uses the latest Unity 3D Technology(link) in conjunction with uLink (link) networking middle-ware. Players will be able to have all the social functions of a game like Second Life, combined with all the features of real time FPS combat.

There is always a Beta version (link) available for testing online as we build it.





The Impact

My name is Christian and I started an Artists Collective called Solo Projects Studios for aspiring creators of games and films. Since 2008 we have been self funded and slowly building up to going public. Currently Rogue has 4 people on it's crew and needs and additional 6 artists to complete it. On the 18th of April we were awarded the use of the HeroEngine(link) for a second project. This is one of the most powerful MMO engines in the world and a true opportunity to expand and help dozens of artists. At this point I realized that I could no longer fund all that was happening alone. Completing Rogue is critical in that it will contribute to profits, but it also opens the door for improvements on future projects. Nothing breeds success better then success. All Artists will receive a share of the profits for the entire lifespan of the game.
This is an unusual project in that it is always available to the public as we build it.
It already has :

256 Square miles of Terrain,
A Chat System,
A weather System,
The start of it's first village.

If you want some idea of the quality of the work, all of the images with the wizard are actual screen shots from the game's prototype. Since then we are toning down the magic and adding a SteamPunk Flavor.


 (Final Release of this title is scheduled for Fall 2011)


Story Prologue

One of the last memorable moments of the American Revolution was Benjamin Franklin’s invention of the“High Torque Gearbox." When asked what his inspiration was, he stated that it was an accidental discovery. He had originally planned on flying a kite during a lightning storm to test some theories but the storm dissipated. So instead, he stayed home and attempted to fix his broken clock. That was the moment when inspiration hit.

Sadly America’s history of ingenuity, hope, and independence   seems to have ended there. General Washington fled to parts unknown to avoid Prosecution for various High Morale crimes. Shortly after, the American Revolution was swiftly crushed.

The British Empire chose wisely to use the Americas as a base of operation to expand their influence worldwide. The Native population was used as a labor force and breeding stock to add to Britain’s population for the ever expanding campaign of land conquest.

In the final days of the campaign Russia and Asia were the last hold-outs. The Queen annexed Germany’s strongest troops (a group known as the S.S), and the Natives from the America territory, then hit Russia with a final deadly blow. It was just a matter of time after that. Asia fell in less then a year. To their credit, they were fierce enemies and the death toll was so large that decades later, Germany’s male population still has not fully recovered.

Today the world is in a perpetual state of Renaissance thanks to the Empire. Churches were unified into a single institution "The Royal Angelical Church”. As the protectors of Morality and Goodness they were put in charge of the arts and sciences. Under their control society maintains an acceptable moral balance. A few years after the war, the royal family pressured the church to accept the use of magic and alchemy. Under the Queen's steady pressure (and a few beheadings) the Church accepted these fields as sciences ordained by God. They are closely monitored by the church and are rumored to have increased the wealth of the Empire greatly.

Every individual is comforted by knowing their place in society. The class system has become accepted as the norm. Now a man can relax and spend his life working and caring for his family without the pressure to become anything beyond his means. Families prosper knowing that what they have today, they will have tomorrow. Of course there is some shifting of social and political power through marriage, but this is minor compared to the stable structure the Royal House was gracious enough to give to us all.

Do not fret citizen, the rumors of Rogues openly defying the Royal House are simply not true. These are fairy tales used to scare children. After all, who could know better then the Crown and the Church how every man should live his life.


What We Need

All funds received will go directly to :

_1_ Paying artists to complete 3D models. ( 65% completed at this time )

_2_ Paying programmers to finish the database code for storage of player records

_3_ Completion of combat coding. ( 85% completed at this time )

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word far and wide about our game. Going Viral would be a huge help. Also we always need skilled people all the time. Artists, Musicians, Story Editors, Programmers are always in demand here.


Feel free to contact me if you wish to participate : Christian@soloprojectsstudios.com

Feel free to contact me if you wish to participate : Christian@soloprojectsstudios.com

story:
SUMMARY

 

I  am Ida Byrd-Hill, Director of Automation Workz 4 U,  a Cisco Networking Academy that provides certification training for those  ages 16+ in the IT Professional Trades of computer networking, computer programming, cybersecurity, data analytics and quality.

 

Uplift, Inc. began AUTOMATION WORKZ 4 U December 2017

 

Uplift, Inc. registered 360 Detroit residents for Introduction to IoT and Intro to Cybersecurity class  -- 90% People of Color, 60% Women, 51% over the age of 40 and 12.5% below age of 18

 

Perplexed that we have  registered a few student ages 16-24 for our FREE IT certification training, I began to look for ways to attract them to our program. I asked a young person to sample the video game prototype we had just developed when the young person stated, "I wish school was like a video game."

 

 

eSports meets IT Training

 

 

HOW IT WORKZ

  1. Young people (ages 16-24) will engage in practice individually for 4 weeks at multiple Detroit Public Library branches. They will input Python code to move characters further into the game.
  2. At the end of practice, students with the most progress in game will combine into teams for a multiplayer bracket tournament.
  3. FINAL eSPORT COMPETITION FOR CASH PRIZE in front of a LIVE  audience.
  4. Winners will be offered FREE admission to the Programming Essentials in Python Course, a 16 week instructor-led that prepares them for the Python Certified Associate Programmer certification and jobs earning an average of $103,492.
 

Uplift, Inc. piloted this concept at a charter school, Covenant House Academy -SW

LOOK AT HOW FOCUSED THE STUDENTS ARE!!!!

 

While they are competing to win $100 dollars, they are learning Python an emerging computer language corporations are desperately seeking.

 

TOP EMPLOYERS LOOKING FOR PYTHON DEVELOPERS

    

IT TRAINING in a VIDEO GAME

 

Students learn Python programming as they play the game preparing them for industry certification as a Python computer programmer to secure one of the thousands of open jobs.

These young people join millions of others who have fallen in love with eSports - Video Game Competitions - where they compete for cash.

 

Singularity Hub reports “This week, dozens of professional video game players will descend on Toronto during NXNE, an annual music and arts festival, to compete in different games for prizes of up to US$1,000. Not a bad payday, perhaps, but still chump change in the eSports scene.

 

For example, Dota 2, a popular battle arena game published by Valve, recently handed out US$20 million to its top players during its finale.”

 

“As a  spectator sport, video games generate viewership at least on par with professional leagues.

 

“Take, for instance, 2016’s League of Legends tournament that drew 36 million viewers, five million more than the NBA Finals, in front of a sellout crowd at the famous Bird Nest stadium in China.” Bird Nest stadium seats 80,000 people.

( links to more information.)

 

IMAGINE MIDDLE/HIGH SCHOOL/ POST-SECONDARY AS A VIDEO GAME

 

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

Our goal for this campaign is $1000 for the first CASH PRIZE GIVEAWAY.

To operate a competition/ bootcamp for 1000 Detroiters we actually need $236,500 to fully fund the first 6 months

Python Instructor                 $  65,000

Finale Competition               $  45,000

Software License                  $  30,000

Marketing                                $  20,000

Prize                                          $  20,000

Coaches                                   $  20,000

Backer Gifts                            $  15,000

Office Space                            $    9,000

Admin                                        $    7,500

Certification Fees                   $  5,000

                                                      $236,500

IMPACT

At full funding, we would expose 1000 young people, ages 16-24, to the income opportunity of eSports and Python computer programming. We would  open their potential interest in both industries thereby reducing ....

poverty,

crime and

unemployment.

 

Uplift, Inc has hosted other cash prize events -------

 

AUTOMATION WORKZ

 

 

iSTEAM competitive Scavenger Hunt Event held at the North American International Auto Show every January

 

Final Prize Levels

1st Place Prize         $350

2nd Place  Prize       $250

3rd Place Prize         $150

 

Served 2987 people 2014-2017

 

CATALYST OF THE INVENTION REVOLUTION

 

iSTEAM competitive Scavenger Hunt Event held at the UAW/ Ford Training Center and Techshop Pittsburgh

 

Final Prize Levels

1st Place Prize         $150

2nd Place  Prize      $  75

3rd Place Prize         $ 50

 

Served 200 people 2013-2014

 

K.I.S.S. BEGINS AT HOME  Raffle

 

 

Final Prize Levels

1st Place Prize         $150

2nd Place  Prize      $  75

3rd Place Prize         $ 50

 

Served 13,456 people 1999-2012

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We may not be able to raise enough money to support 1000 Detroit young people immediately.

Whatever figure we raise would  start a TECH REVOLUTION of EPIC PROPORTIONS

 

 

CAN’T CONTRIBUTE CASH? SHARE THE GAME WORKZ MOVEMENT

 

Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Youtube, Vine and LinkedIn

Check out our website Uplift, Inc. www.upliftinc.org for more information.
