story:
THE FINAL COUNTDOW!

These are the last few hours of our campaign! Every tweet matter and every facebook share matters now! Every dollar we raise will helps finance the production costs! We're working non-stop on the game and really soon we'll have a working demo! Help us one last time in the FINAL COUNTDOWN!

"THE FINAL COUNTDOWN" Perk: This is the last chance for you to be inside the game! This perk can transform you into an NPC in TLB and it will give you a digital PREMIUM edition! Share it with your friends!! 

TOGETHER WE CAN DO IT!

----------------------------------------------


Hey everyone! We have some great news for you!
Starting today, you can win an AWESOME Premium Physical Box of Tiny Little Bastards containing:

- An EXCLUSIVE T-Shirt
- The Physical Premium Edition of the game (in a cool box!)
- The physical game guide book! 
- A CD with the Original Soundtrack by André Colares!
- A Full-Body Action Figure of Ivarr!! (about 5-inches tall)

It's not that hard to win yours! Follow the steps bellow:

1 - Contribute to our campaign if haven't done it yet!
2 - While logged into IndieGoGo (This is important!!!), use the "Share Tools" in the campaign page to share a link containing your unique ID.
3 - Ask your friends to contribute THROUGH YOUR shared link!
4 - If the sum of all contributions made through YOUR link reaches US$200 or more, you'll win this AWESOME(!!!) Premium Box!

For the rules and guide for this campaign, access our website! 

Feel free to message us if you have any questions!
contact@overlordgamestudio.com


-------
Se você é do Brasil e não possui cartão internacional, contribua pelo Splitplay! Toda a renda arrecada no Splitplay será revertida para essa campanha. Escolha sua recompensa diretamente por lá e nos ajude nessa quest! As recompensas disponíveis são:
  • The Goblin Trainee
  • The Goblin Brewmaster
  • The Goblin Lore Keeper


Tiny Little Bastards is a game about the love of a man for his beer. You’ll play as Ivarr, a viking tavern owner who had his tavern mysteriously sacked by a horde of annoying little creatures, the Goblins. Ivarr now has to take up arms to recover his stolen goods and save a desperate world from the severe beer drought the Goblins are causing.

Through exploration, resolution of quests and dialogue options, player’s choices will have meaningful impact on the world - from little brother and sister fights to nation-wide conflicts such as civil wars and more!

Our priority is to deliver you a game made with fun mechanics coupled by tight execution, focused on detailed gameplay that will keep players coming back to it. We aim for Tiny Little Bastards to be what we want to play ourselves.


Tiny Little Bastards is a 2D platformer Action RPG for PC (windows, Mac & Linux). Its character progression is similar to action RPGs such as Diablo and Torchlight while the level design is deeply inspired by all-time classics like Castlevania.


This means the player will be able to control character stats, talents and talent-based abilities while progressing in a vast and beautiful platform world with many bizarre, sometimes otherworldly regions, ranging from huge pumpkin dungeons to lands where sheep float in the sky!

The player will also be able to collect many different items such as weapons, trinkets, crafting materials, potions… and manage his own inventory. Items will be in ARPG-inspired style, appearing through the game by means of looting, crafting and exploration, as well as sold by charismatic vendors, and posessing a variety of randomized stats to allow for different playstyles.



To create strange potions and high value weapons, players can make use of the detailed crafting systems available. Each crafting system is attached to a different NPC (a smith can create weapons, a witch can make potions and an enchanter can craft trinkets).

You’ll find a diverse cast of crafters with compelling backstories and quests along the way and, if they like you, they’ll follow you around the world making your journey more interesting!

Through the journey, the player will have to overcome obstacles and puzzles based on the levels themselves. An infinity of dreadful traps and deadly pits are there to test your abilities, but you can beat them with the right moves and choices… if you’re skilled enough.

The combat is simple and yet very detailed. A wide variety of enemies will try to block the way as the game goes on.

The actual combat involves both player skill and stats:

  • Stamina will be drained when most actions are taken (especially using abilities)

  • Avoiding getting hit is crucial and equally items and talents will all play big part in deciding whether you’ll survive or not!

  • Every enemy will act acordingly to its own characteristics, so you’ll have to adapt your strategies on the fly.

A combination of good timing, knowledge of enemy patterns, resource management and smart character building are what makes the combat in Tiny Little Bastards a fun experience!

You can't always face your enemies with direct front hits. Remember, attacking consumes stamina!


Some foes take more damage while stunned.
The road will not be easy and there will be tons of obstacles on your way... Including awesome bosses, obviously!


We've been Greenlit in just 10 days! Thank you!




Overlord Game Studio is an independent game studio. This means we do not have a sponsor or a publisher behind us to cover the development expenses.

We are 100% dedicated to the development of Tiny Little Bastards and to do that, we had to quit our main jobs and focus all our energy at Overlord Game Studio and Tiny Little Bastards, and we did it because we love it. We have a strong passion for game devlopment and we wanna see our work become a reality.That's what drives us!  And for that, we’ll need your help as well.

Chosing IndieGoGo enabled us to get in touch directly with the players and to transform Tiny Little Bastards into a game people would want to play! For this reason, we want you to be part of the team with us! Communication is the essence of what we’re trying to develop, a game WE ALL love!


Making a great game, just like other great things, costs money. What we do with the money will define the outcome of the whole project and below is pie-chart (it's actually a shield-chart) defining the destination of the budget! 

"When developing a game, history tells us that cake is the best fuel for creativity. Let them eat cake!" - The Overlord



$5


$10


$15


$20


$25


$40


$50


$65


$80


$120


$150


$250


$350


$500


$1000


$1500


Will the game be released on Steam as well?
We plan to! We’ve started a Steam Greenlight campaign as well, but DRM-free copies will also be available. Every backer who gets a copy of the game will receive keys to any Early-Access we might have in the future.


What about other playable characters? Other races, genders?
This is above all, the story of Ivarr himself, changing the character would require even the plot to change substantially, you’ll find out why! We plan to, however, allow other playable characters in set parts of the game.


Will the game be entirely single player? Is there co-op?
So far the game is a strict single player experience. Co-op isn’t planned so far, however, we do have concepts for a whole multiplayer game-mode in the future!


How will ‘Help the team design a ...’ work?
Backers of this tier will be contacted by and will discuss with the Team their ideas. We’ll make everything possible to polish and implement the best ideas each backer has to offer! All the process of discussion, polishment and implementation will take place with the active participation of backers included in the appropriated reward tier.


How often will updates come by?
We’ll do weekly updates showcasing all content we create during that time. Stay tuned!


Is the game being developed in Unity or a similar engine?
No. Tiny Little Bastards is made in an engine built from scratch, as we believe this is the best way to have full control of the game’s mechanics.


What about PS3/4, Xbox 360/one and Wii U?
We’ll try our best to release to as many platforms as we can. But for the moment, we’re focused on Windows, Mac and Linux only. We’ll let you know if this changes.


Will the game be translated to other languages as well?
Currently, Tiny Little Bastards will only be released in English. But localisation to other languages are not excuded from our plans.


Will there be dinosaurs?
Yes. Absolutely!
story_txt:
THE FINAL COUNTDOW!These are the last few hours of our campaign! Every tweet matter and every facebook share matters now! Every dollar we raise will helps finance the production costs! We're working non-stop on the game and really soon we'll have a working demo! Help us one last time in the FINAL COUNTDOWN!"THE FINAL COUNTDOWN" Perk: This is the last chance for you to be inside the game! This perk can transform you into an NPC in TLB and it will give you a digital PREMIUM edition! Share it with your friends!! TOGETHER WE CAN DO IT!----------------------------------------------Hey everyone! We have some great news for you!Starting today, you can win an AWESOME Premium Physical Box of Tiny Little Bastards containing:- An EXCLUSIVE T-Shirt- The Physical Premium Edition of the game (in a cool box!)- The physical game guide book! - A CD with the Original Soundtrack by André Colares!- A Full-Body Action Figure of Ivarr!! (about 5-inches tall)It's not that hard to win yours! Follow the steps bellow:1 - Contribute to our campaign if haven't done it yet!2 - While logged into IndieGoGo (This is important!!!), use the "Share Tools" in the campaign page to share a link containing your unique ID.3 - Ask your friends to contribute THROUGH YOUR shared link!4 - If the sum of all contributions made through YOUR link reaches US$200 or more, you'll win this AWESOME(!!!) Premium Box!For the rules and guide for this campaign, access our website! Feel free to message us if you have any questions!contact@overlordgamestudio.com-------Se você é do Brasil e não possui cartão internacional, contribua pelo Splitplay! Toda a renda arrecada no Splitplay será revertida para essa campanha. Escolha sua recompensa diretamente por lá e nos ajude nessa quest! As recompensas disponíveis são:

The Goblin Trainee


The Goblin Brewmaster


The Goblin Lore Keeper

Tiny Little Bastards is a game about the love of a man for his beer. You’ll play as Ivarr, a viking tavern owner who had his tavern mysteriously sacked by a horde of annoying little creatures, the Goblins. Ivarr now has to take up arms to recover his stolen goods and save a desperate world from the severe beer drought the Goblins are causing.Through exploration, resolution of quests and dialogue options, player’s choices will have meaningful impact on the world - from little brother and sister fights to nation-wide conflicts such as civil wars and more!Our priority is to deliver you a game made with fun mechanics coupled by tight execution, focused on detailed gameplay that will keep players coming back to it. We aim for Tiny Little Bastards to be what we want to play ourselves.Tiny Little Bastards is a 2D platformer Action RPG for PC (windows, Mac & Linux). Its character progression is similar to action RPGs such as Diablo and Torchlight while the level design is deeply inspired by all-time classics like Castlevania.This means the player will be able to control character stats, talents and talent-based abilities while progressing in a vast and beautiful platform world with many bizarre, sometimes otherworldly regions, ranging from huge pumpkin dungeons to lands where sheep float in the sky!





The player will also be able to collect many different items such as weapons, trinkets, crafting materials, potions… and manage his own inventory. Items will be in ARPG-inspired style, appearing through the game by means of looting, crafting and exploration, as well as sold by charismatic vendors, and posessing a variety of randomized stats to allow for different playstyles.


To create strange potions and high value weapons, players can make use of the detailed crafting systems available. Each crafting system is attached to a different NPC (a smith can create weapons, a witch can make potions and an enchanter can craft trinkets). You’ll find a diverse cast of crafters with compelling backstories and quests along the way and, if they like you, they’ll follow you around the world making your journey more interesting!Through the journey, the player will have to overcome obstacles and puzzles based on the levels themselves. An infinity of dreadful traps and deadly pits are there to test your abilities, but you can beat them with the right moves and choices… if you’re skilled enough.The combat is simple and yet very detailed. A wide variety of enemies will try to block the way as the game goes on.The actual combat involves both player skill and stats:
Stamina will be drained when most actions are taken (especially using abilities)
Avoiding getting hit is crucial and equally items and talents will all play big part in deciding whether you’ll survive or not!
Every enemy will act acordingly to its own characteristics, so you’ll have to adapt your strategies on the fly.
A combination of good timing, knowledge of enemy patterns, resource management and smart character building are what makes the combat in Tiny Little Bastards a fun experience!

You can't always face your enemies with direct front hits. Remember, attacking consumes stamina!




Some foes take more damage while stunned.
The road will not be easy and there will be tons of obstacles on your way... Including awesome bosses, obviously!
We've been Greenlit in just 10 days! Thank you!Overlord Game Studio is an independent game studio. This means we do not have a sponsor or a publisher behind us to cover the development expenses.We are 100% dedicated to the development of Tiny Little Bastards and to do that, we had to quit our main jobs and focus all our energy at Overlord Game Studio and Tiny Little Bastards, and we did it because we love it. We have a strong passion for game devlopment and we wanna see our work become a reality.That's what drives us!  And for that, we’ll need your help as well.Chosing IndieGoGo enabled us to get in touch directly with the players and to transform Tiny Little Bastards into a game people would want to play! For this reason, we want you to be part of the team with us! Communication is the essence of what we’re trying to develop, a game WE ALL love!Making a great game, just like other great things, costs money. What we do with the money will define the outcome of the whole project and below is pie-chart (it's actually a shield-chart) defining the destination of the budget! "When developing a game, history tells us that cake is the best fuel for creativity. Let them eat cake!" - The Overlord$5

story:
The TEAM

image: Mallory (my daughter and puzzle contributor)
Here are a few of her riddles...

nigh,ten,gail =

nightingale

ill,us,trey,shun =

illustration

madge,ick,all =

magical

 



image: Noah (my son and puzzle contibutor)
Noah came up with the best instructional riddle of all time...

eggs,ham,pull =

example

 


image: Cathy (my wife, best friend, motivator, and reluctant puzzle contributor)
Here are a few of Cathy's riddles...

an,if,verse,hairy =

anniversary

(you think she was trying to drop a hint with that one?)

eek,whip,mint =

equipment

hoss,pit,towel,it,tee =

hospitality

 

Posse Creative LLC is a startup app design company located in Dallas, TX. Our first prototype of the Word Sphynx app (1.0) was approved for sale by Apple on the App Store on 02/03/2012. After extensive testing and feedback review, Posse Creative is ready to aggressively launch and market a retail version of Word Sphynx (2.0).  What’s different?  The new app – Word Sphynx 2.0 – will have a leaderboard for awarding prizes instead of a convoluted dungeon theme.

If you’re at all worried about us not having any “skin in the game” - don’t - we already have countless hours and closing in on $15,000 of our own money invested in this idea via development, legal, marketing and administrative fees.  We BELIEVE in this idea!  We have invested every spare dollar we had over the past two years into this project, but we need your help to cross the finish line.

The GOAL 

The purpose of this Indiegogo campaign is to raise the money needed to COMPLETE development ($9,920), re-submit the app to Apple for approval (free), and BEGIN the hard work of marketing the app to players ($2,500).  Wait, that doesn't add up to your funding goal?  Yep, we've got to include 9% for Indiegogo ($1,118) and 3% for the credit card processing fees ($373).  We overreached on our previous crowdfunding efforts by trying to include an iAd campaign, but those are simply too expensive for our first marketing efforts (about $15,000).  We believe we can accomplish the needed marketing using virool.com (video marketing) for a fraction of the iAd campaign.  Of course, our greatest marketing resources will be YOU.

Perks.  YOU are an integral part of this campaign and will be rewarded for your contribution.  Even $1 will earn you a perk.  For every $1 you support us with, we’ll MATCH with in-game currency once the app is live.  And the perks go up from there – check them out.

The APP 

Word Sphynx's competitive edge:

  • It's a new type of word puzzle game with a prize delivery system unlike anything on the App Store – you can win REAL rewards in the form of gift cards to major retailers. 
  • It uses word clues to create word puzzles in a way that isn't being done anywhere else. 
  • Word Sphynx's iOS app content rating is 4+ (not all apps can make this claim), which means it's available to all iPhone users young and old.  

Freemium: "Freemium" is a model that allows the app to be distributed for free, but has premium content for sale inside the app.

IAP: Abbreviation for “In App Purchase” and the method by which only 4% of all apps are generating 72% of ALL iPhone App Store revenue (most use the “freemium” model).

Word Sphynx uses the "freemium" model and creates incentive for monetization through a prize delivery system. Quite simply, the biggest button on the screen (the “LEADERBOARD” button) reveals the prize competition for that week. We’ve got a strong understanding of who our players will be and are rewarding them for their efforts. We know this because we ARE players & gamers ourselves - we have downloaded, played and spent many hours and a lot of money on many of the top rated apps on the App Store for years. As gamers ourselves, this is what we would want. If our core demographic changes, we can adjust the rewards being offered. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t support Word Sphynx with a contribution, PLEASE help us by spreading the word.  Use the links below the video to share this project with your friends.  Here are some additional ways you can help:

Follow us on Twitter & Like us on Facebook (at our website):

WordSphynx.com

Download Word Sphynx 1.0 so you’ll be immediately notified when Word Sphynx 2.0 is AVAILABLE:

1) Is Word Sphynx simple enough for me to understand and buy into? 

In a word, YES.  Simply put, it’s a word puzzle app with a unique prize delivery system. Apple has already approved the prototype. It’s been copyrighted and trademarked.

2) Does Word Sphynx solve a problem or meet a need? 

Yes. It challenges the user to think creatively, and creates a friendly, competitive environment with a built in prize system. This allows the users to match their skills against thousands of others. The game is unique in two ways. 1 - it uses word clues to create word puzzle in a way that isn't being done anywhere else. 2 - it has a prize delivery system unlike anything on the App Store - you can win real rewards in the form of gift cards.

3) Is there a big enough market and customer base for Word Sphynx?

Yes.  The app content rating is 4+, which means it's available to all iPhone users young and old. The game caters to English speaking players, because the current word puzzles are in English. We are ready to react to demand and offer it in numerous languages.

4) Does Posse Creative have the right people on their team to pull it off?

Our current team includes the "idea" guy (Marc Jennings), a iOS developer, legal counsel and a marketing consultant. We've invested thousands of dollars and hundreds of hours into creating Word Sphynx. We've got skin in the game right now. 

5) Do development duties reside with one person, or is there a team in place? 

Initially, the puzzle making duties were handled by Marc Jennings. After realizing the potential danger in having the app “go dark” if new puzzles were not being created, Marc wrote a set of guidelines for puzzle making and shared it with family. Now puzzles are created by not just Marc, but by multiple family members and trusted friends. Believe it or not, the most creative puzzles have come from our kids and they continue to contribute weekly. After making an initial sweep through the entire dictionary to prove puzzles could be made long term, the database of puzzles currently holds near 1000 puzzles and we haven’t even made it out of the “A’s” in the dictionary. 1000 puzzles is about 1 year worth of content for Word Sphynx. 

6) Why did we choose to launch on iOS and follow up on Android, Facebook? 

The answer is in the statistics. According to recent data announced at the Apple WWDC (World Wide Developer's Conference), about 80% of all iOS users are using the latest OS platform while only about 5% (or less) of all Android users are running the latest OS version of that platform. What is the "read" here? iOS users appear to be more likely to adopt the latest software updates and download the latest app content. The Blackberry and Windows Mobile markets have shown consistent declines since 2010 and are trending downward. It is for that reason we have ruled out those markets in favor of the iOS and Android markets. The Facebook market may not be experiencing the exponential growth that it once was, but even as it begins to level out with 1 billion users (as of early Oct. 2012), we believe this will be a viable market for Word Sphynx outside of the mobile device customer base. The fact that nearly 40% of Facebook users are mobile app users provides an ideal opportunity for cross promotion.

Video music attribution: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Dexter_Britain/Creative_Commons_Volume_2/Summers_Coming

story:
Hey! My name's James and I run Infamy Miniatures - a new company that makes high-quality resin miniatures.

Inspired by famous literary characters, each Infamy mini is twisted to fit into a steampunk version of London in the late 19th Century.

This campaign started out as a way to get this somewhat psychotic version of Doctor John Watson (sculpted by ex-Rackham supremo MIKH at 32mm scale) cast, but now the second stretch goal has been passed things change a bit.

A full production run on Watson is already covered, so thank you to everyone who has contributed.

Now I'm working towards other cool stuff. First up is Edwina Hyde and if contributions continue I'll be able to push her into production ahead of schedule.

I promised some previews of her if the second stretch goal was reached, so here she is.

You'll notice the material looks rather different to the Watson sculpt. That's because Hyde is a digital model, so she doesn't yet exist in a physical state.

Here's her concept art by Martin McKenna to give you a better idea of her final look.

Here's the fun stuff!

I've created different perks depending on how much you'd like to contribute. From a print of Martin McKenna's cool concept art, all the way to getting your likeness on a future Infamy model, there is a geeky reward for all budgets! :D

Postage costs are included in all the perk totals (wherever you may be in the world) so you'll save yourself money on the combined retail and postage price Watson will cost in my webstore (£14.99 before postage).

Now that the goal has been passed I'm also introducing Stretch Goals. Each time the total hits one of these points, there will be extra rewards. The first three Stretch Goals are:

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!
A sticker of the Baker Street Irregulars gang logo will be shipped out along with your other goodies. This Stretch Goal is for all perk levels.

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!
A PDF short story about Doctor John Watson. This Stretch Goal is for all perk levels.

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!
A restricted access forum called Infamy Insider featuring game updates, pictures, awesome competitions, stuff about new minis and I'll post regularly to answer questions and drop exciting development information.

This is your chance to really become a part of Infamy and for now the only way to get access to Infamy Insider will be through this campaign.

Anyone who contributes will be given access to the forum.

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!
Anyone who pitches in at the $58 level and above will get a scenic cast base designed to fit in with the look and style of Watson. This 50mm base is in production now and will be extremely limited edition.

If you have contributed at a lower level and would like to step up to get the base, you can't upgrade your perk, but get in touch with me directly and I'll sort it out. :)

If this target is reached I'll be able to get setup to do regular, proper quality video updates on developments in the Infamy Miniatures range and of course, a big batch of information on the game's development.

Each of these videos will be for Infamy Insiders only for the first week after their release, so you'll get the advanced scoop.

Anyone who contributes will be able to access Infamy TV

Everyone who contributes $10 or more will be shipped a high-quality print of Watson's concept art, by famed fantasy illustrator Martin McKenna.

I'm guessing you probably want to get your hands on some toy soldiers. I can help you get your fix! :D As soon as the casting run is done I'll be boxing Watson up for various levels of contributor to recieve.

Each Watson kit will include:

  • One nine part miniature 
  • One lip edged base
  • A hand numbered first run card, showing the concept art, painted miniature and gang logo.

Contribute $22 and we'll send you one of the first run castings of Doctor John Watson.

Contribute $40 and you'll get the Watson model along with a bonus model.

Contribute $58 and you'll get the Watson model along with 2 bonus models.

Bonus models:

  • Another Doctor John Watson
  • Sherlock Holmes
  • Henrietta Jekyll

Thanks for the support you've already given to Infamy Miniatures. It would kinda suck if you missed out on bargains because of that wouldn't it? Never fear, you won't!

If you made an order on Henrietta Jekyll and Sherlock Holmes through the Infamy Miniatures store before the launch of this campaign, but want to take advantage of the bonus miniatures offer here, you still can.

In place of a bonus miniature you will recieve a digital voucher to buy a future Infamy Miniature up to the value of £15.99.

My day job is as a freelance miniature painter, so I'll happily paint some models to a high-standard if you're not keen on doing your own brushwork.

I've made the final cut at Golden Demon many times, have had my work featured in White Dwarf magazine and my minis are a pretty regular feature on the Games Workshop website.

You can see my recently painted minis in my CMoN gallery and my current rank there is

Contribute $125 and you'll get the Watson model painted to a high standard.

Contribute $215 and you'll get the Watson model painted to a high standard along with a bonus model of your choosing.

I've added an extra perk. You can get a model painted by Javier Gonzalez (ArsiesStudio) - the man responsible for our studio paint job of Sherlock Holmes.

You can see more of his amazing minis in his CMoN gallery and his current rank there is a mighty

Contribute $315 and you'll get an Infamy model of your choosing painted by Javier.

If you've ever dreamed of being involved in the design of a mini, are desperate to see your face on a model or just have a hefty amount of cash burning a hole in your pocket, this is the perk for you!

Contribute $600 and I'll be really darned grateful. But that's not all! You can play a part in the design of, and have your likeness worked into a future Infamy model.

You'll also recieve casts of Watson, Holmes and Jekyll.

If you think this looks cool please spread the word, even if you can't contribute. Use the different share options on this page to let your friend know about this campaign and follow me in various places online for Infamy updates:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • The Infamy Miniatures website
story_txt:
Hey! My name's James and I run Infamy Miniatures - a new company that makes high-quality resin miniatures. 
Inspired by famous literary characters, each Infamy mini is twisted to fit into a steampunk version of London in the late 19th Century.
This campaign started out as a way to get this somewhat psychotic version of Doctor John Watson (sculpted by ex-Rackham supremo MIKH at 32mm scale) cast, but now the second stretch goal has been passed things change a bit.

A full production run on Watson is already covered, so thank you to everyone who has contributed.
Now I'm working towards other cool stuff. First up is Edwina Hyde and if contributions continue I'll be able to push her into production ahead of schedule.
I promised some previews of her if the second stretch goal was reached, so here she is.


You'll notice the material looks rather different to the Watson sculpt. That's because Hyde is a digital model, so she doesn't yet exist in a physical state.
Here's her concept art by Martin McKenna to give you a better idea of her final look.


Here's the fun stuff!
I've created different perks depending on how much you'd like to contribute. From a print of Martin McKenna's cool concept art, all the way to getting your likeness on a future Infamy model, there is a geeky reward for all budgets! :D
Postage costs are included in all the perk totals (wherever you may be in the world) so you'll save yourself money on the combined retail and postage price Watson will cost in my webstore (£14.99 before postage).
Now that the goal has been passed I'm also introducing Stretch Goals. Each time the total hits one of these points, there will be extra rewards. The first three Stretch Goals are:
STRETCH GOAL PASSED!A sticker of the Baker Street Irregulars gang logo will be shipped out along with your other goodies. This Stretch Goal is for all perk levels.

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!A PDF short story about Doctor John Watson. This Stretch Goal is for all perk levels.

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!A restricted access forum called Infamy Insider featuring game updates, pictures, awesome competitions, stuff about new minis and I'll post regularly to answer questions and drop exciting development information.
This is your chance to really become a part of Infamy and for now the only way to get access to Infamy Insider will be through this campaign.
Anyone who contributes will be given access to the forum.

STRETCH GOAL PASSED!Anyone who pitches in at the $58 level and above will get a scenic cast base designed to fit in with the look and style of Watson. This 50mm base is in production now and will be extremely limited edition.
If you have contributed at a lower level and would like to step up to get the base, you can't upgrade your perk, but get in touch with me directly and I'll sort it out. :)

If this target is reached I'll be able to get setup to do regular, proper quality video updates on developments in the Infamy Miniatures range and of course, a big batch of information on the game's development.
Each of these videos will be for Infamy Insiders only for the first week after their release, so you'll get the advanced scoop. 
Anyone who contributes will be able to access Infamy TV

Everyone who contributes $10 or more will be shipped a high-quality print of Watson's concept art, by famed fantasy illustrator Martin McKenna.

I'm guessing you probably want to get your hands on some toy soldiers. I can help you get your fix! :D As soon as the casting run is done I'll be boxing Watson up for various levels of contributor to recieve.
Each Watson kit will include:

One nine part miniature 
One lip edged base
A hand numbered first run card, showing the concept art, painted miniature and gang logo.
Contribute $22 and we'll send you one of the first run castings of Doctor John Watson.
Contribute $40 and you'll get the Watson model along with a bonus model.
Contribute $58 and you'll get the Watson model along with 2 bonus models.
Bonus models:

Another Doctor John Watson
Sherlock Holmes
Henrietta Jekyll


Thanks for the support you've already given to Infamy Miniatures. It would kinda suck if you missed out on bargains because of that wouldn't it? Never fear, you won't!
If you made an order on Henrietta Jekyll and Sherlock Holmes through the Infamy Miniatures store before the launch of this campaign, but want to take advantage of the bonus miniatures offer here, you still can.
In place of a bonus miniature you will recieve a digital voucher to buy a future Infamy Miniature up to the value of £15.99.

My day job is as a freelance miniature painter, so I'll happily paint some models to a high-standard if you're not keen on doing your own brushwork.
I've made the final cut at Golden Demon many times, have had my work featured in White Dwarf magazine and my minis are a pretty regular feature on the Games Workshop website.
You can see my recently painted minis in my CMoN gallery and my current rank there is 
Contribute $125 and you'll get the Watson model painted to a high standard.
Contribute $215 and you'll get the Watson model painted to a high standard along with a bonus model of your choosing.
I've added an extra perk. You can get a model painted by Javier Gonzalez (ArsiesStudio) - the man responsible for our studio paint job of Sherlock Holmes.
You can see more of his amazing minis in his CMoN gallery and his current rank there is a mighty 
Contribute $315 and you'll get an Infamy model of your choosing painted by Javier.

If you've ever dreamed of being involved in the design of a mini, are desperate to see your face on a model or just have a hefty amount of cash burning a hole in your pocket, this is the perk for you!
Contribute $600 and I'll be really darned grateful. But that's not all! You can play a part in the design of, and have your likeness worked into a future Infamy model.
You'll also recieve casts of Watson, Holmes and Jekyll.


If you think this looks cool please spread the word, even if you can't contribute. Use the different share options on this page to let your friend know about this campaign and follow me in various places online for Infamy updates:

Facebook
Twitter

story:
Summary

OnSong is used by thousands of musicians around the world to organize, prepare, practice and perform music. Due to overwhelming demand, we are looking to build OnSong for Android tablets. Help us reach our goal to build the best music app possible for Android.

What Is OnSong?

Take your binder of music and lead sheets and throw it away. OnSong stores your entir music repertoire of music in a thin, lightweight device of your choosing. Take the stress and time of preparation out of the equation so you can focus on your music. Features:

  • Holds thousands of songs in the palm of your hand.
  • Transpose or capo with a brush of your finger.
  • Format chords and lyrics for optimum viewing.
  • Annotate your chord charts with sticky notes or drawing right on it.
  • Write your own songs or edit existing ones with songwriting tools.
  • Quickly pull set lists and organize your event.
  • Share effortlessly with your band members
  • Tap on chords and see how they are played on many instruments.
  • Autoscroll or use wireless foot pedals for hands-free operation.
  • Playback your music files for practice, or for solo musicians.
  • Tap the tempo and play to a click track with a built-in metronome.
  • Integrates with online chord libraries for quality, legal content.
  • All of this for less than the price of that binder filled with sleeves and paper!

What We Need

OnSong is a small company of just a few people working hard to design, build and support the best music app for mobile devices. We are working to grow the company to support new features and platforms. In order to move to a second platform, we need to raise funds. Here's what funding this project will do:

  • Hire a second developer to focus on the Android version of OnSong.
  • Allow us to focus full time on the Android version as a priority project.
  • Ensure that we can build a business that can support multiple platforms.

What You Get

We believe in delivering value for a great price so we are making sure that your investment will go a long way! We have different funding levels to fit your budget.

  • Invest at a base level and receive our heartfelt thanks and a special gift.
  • Download OnSong for Android when it's ready and receive free updates for life.
  • Get full training videos for you and your team.
  • Get the full package with a wireless foot pedal for hands-free operation.
  • Limited edition OnSong t-shirts and awesome marketing materials.

About OnSong

In early 2010, Jason Kichline had a vision to create an app that would help church worship teams and musicians become more effective with their talent. By making an app, chord charts could be made digital and instantly transposeable reducing stress and placing the focus on music and ministry. OnSong was one of the first 2,000 apps available on the iPad app store. OnSong continues to be one of the top music apps and has become indispensible to many musicians.

In early 2012, the husband and wife team of Jason and Jaime Kichline started OnSong as a full-time venture. Jason left the business he started 12 years earlier to devote completely to the project. Jaime had become a vital part of the team as product and support liason. OnSong works closely with veterans of the music industry and continue to build staff to support our user base.

story:
Click here to vote on steam!

Prepare yourself for fast tracks, furious physics and a rush of adrenaline as you tackle daring obstacles and puzzles. 

O3DX will be the ride of your life!

Coming soon to PC/Mac/Oculus Rift/iOS/Android platforms.

The technology demo contains the first playable level in order to demonstrate the controls and graphical quality. 

Windows: Download the demo by clicking here. 
Mac: Download the demo by clicking here. 
Oculus Rift: Download the demo by clicking here. 

Minimum requirements: 2.3 GHz Core i7 with 8Mb of Ram

Use the following keyboard controls:
For Mac users: 
Arrow up - Accelerate
Space Bar - Brake
Arrow left - Tilt Backwards
Arrow right - Tilt forward 
"R" : Restart the level 
CMD+q: Quit

For Windows users:
Arrow up - Accelerate
Space Bar - Brake
Arrow left - Tilt Backwards
Arrow right - Tilt forward
"R" : Restart the level
ALT+Escape: Quit



Get behind the wheel of any of the 10 off-road vehicles and experience the breathtaking scenery while completing physics based challenges.

Complete each level, beat the time and collect all the stars to receive a bonus.

AAA visual fidelity:

Through harnessing the latest rendering technology and fine tuning resources to match your device, you are presented with immersive, realistic rides through breath-taking terrains of exquisite detail and class leading special effects.

Unlike any predecessor:

By rethinking and redesigning the way you interact with a vehicle, O3DX presents a whole new gaming experience.

Intuitive controls, maximum playability and camera angles that keep you in the thick of the action at the right moments. Ensuring a healthy dose of addictive adrenaline in what promises to become a whole new game genre. 

Smell the diesel, taste the dust! O3DX will be the new game you love..


Complete the level.

Overcoming obstacles is the focus of the fun; daring physics, brainteasers, speed and leaps will test your off road skills. Subsequent levels can only be unlocked by successfully finishing a level.


Beat the clock.

If that's it for you then continue to the next level, but if you're up for a titanic challenge you have to do it all over again, except that this time you have to beat the clock as well in order to unlock the second milestone of each level. 


Collect the stars.

Collect the stars as you go along in order to unlock future bonus levels. For each bonus level you need to have collected all the stars in the preceding levels. If you're really brave you will try to beat the clock while collecting all the stars. (Not for the feint hearted).



Much more:

- Easy controls.

- Ridiculously Realistic physics!

- Spectacular graphics!

- More level packs in development for non-stop entertainment.



Classic 4x4 vehicles, Military Off road Vehicles, Modern sporty all terrain vehicles and more.


and more..

What do we aim to achieve with the Indiegogo campaign funding? 

The game is 95% complete and currently in the late alpha phase of the development cycle. We're almost there and we have a sufficient budget to complete the game. This Indiegogo campaign has been created with you in mind. We want to offer enthusiastic individuals the opportunity to get involved and create a pre-launch community around this exciting game. We want to offer you the game on pre-order with perks only available to our backers. Have a look at the different backing opportunities and choose the option best suited to you. This is a once off opportunity. Once this campaign is over these perks will never be available again.



$20 000

  • Old man Bob the mechanic. Old man Bob becomes the voice enabled mechanic character that will guide you, upgrade your engines and give all round advice to you as you progress through the levels. He is the mechanic that no 4x4 enthusiast can live without.
  • More game assets (trucks, terrain assets, etc).

    $30k-$50,000

    • An additional level pack with 10 more levels!
    • Cross platform versions for Mac and PC and possibly Oculus Rift.
    • Even more game assets.


    $50K-$100,000

    • Oculus Rift guaranteed.
    • Two additional level packs with 20 more levels!
    • Our love and appreciation.

    • Much more game assets.


    $100 000+

    • Playstation + Xbox (Possibly WII)
    • Three additional level packs with 30 more levels!
    • Tons of additional game assets.

    • Our undying love and eternal appreciation!


    Accountability

    It is our commitment to you, our backers, that we will maintain consistent communication throughout the process. This means regular updates, product screenshots, and plenty of behind the scenes insight as we complete the creation of O3DX. After all, we built this game for you..
story_txt:
Click here to vote on steam!
Prepare yourself for fast tracks, furious physics and a rush of adrenaline as you tackle daring obstacles and puzzles. 
O3DX will be the ride of your life!
Coming soon to PC/Mac/Oculus Rift/iOS/Android platforms.










The technology demo contains the first playable level in order to demonstrate the controls and graphical quality. 



Windows: Download the demo by clicking here. Mac: Download the demo by clicking here. Oculus Rift: Download the demo by clicking here. Minimum requirements: 2.3 GHz Core i7 with 8Mb of Ram

Use the following keyboard controls:For Mac users: Arrow up - Accelerate Space Bar - Brake Arrow left - Tilt Backwards Arrow right - Tilt forward "R" : Restart the level CMD+q: Quit


For Windows users:Arrow up - Accelerate Space Bar - Brake Arrow left - Tilt Backwards Arrow right - Tilt forward "R" : Restart the level ALT+Escape: Quit






Created by Egamea Game Studio, O3DX is an off-road driving adventure designed to challenge the player's skill and endurance. Get behind the wheel of any of the 10 off-road vehicles and experience the breathtaking scenery while completing physics based challenges.

Complete each level, beat the time and collect all the stars to receive a bonus.
AAA visual fidelity:
Through harnessing the latest rendering technology and fine tuning resources to match your device, you are presented with immersive, realistic rides through breath-taking terrains of exquisite detail and class leading special effects.

Unlike any predecessor:
By rethinking and redesigning the way you interact with a vehicle, O3DX presents a whole new gaming experience.
Intuitive controls, maximum playability and camera angles that keep you in the thick of the action at the right moments. Ensuring a healthy dose of addictive adrenaline in what promises to become a whole new game genre. 
Smell the diesel, taste the dust! O3DX will be the new game you love..





Complete the level.


Overcoming obstacles is the focus of the fun; daring physics, brainteasers, speed and leaps will test your off road skills. Subsequent levels can only be unlocked by successfully finishing a level.



Beat the clock.

If that's it for you then continue to the next level, but if you're up for a titanic challenge you have to do it all over again, except that this time you have to beat the clock as well in order to unlock the second milestone of each level. 


Collect the stars.
Collect the stars as you go along in order to unlock future bonus levels. For each bonus level you need to have collected all the stars in the preceding levels. If you're really brave you will try to beat the clock while collecting all the stars. (Not for the feint hearted).



Much more:
- Easy controls.
- Ridiculously Realistic physics!
- Spectacular graphics!
- More level packs in development for non-stop entertainment.










Classic 4x4 vehicles, Military Off road Vehicles, Modern sporty all terrain vehicles and more.










and more..

New Genre
O3DX is not just a new game, it heralds the birth an entire new game genre. Welcome to the Self Steering Physics Obstacle Genre. By eliminating the need to steer we can provide you, the player, with unparalleled freedom to focus on that which matters most: Enjoying the Intuitive speed, leaps, physics and puzzles that the game has to offer. As a backer you will be one of the first people to try out this exciting new approach to gaming, with the opportunity to become involved in, or brand this little bit of history with your name.  


Cinematic camera angles
Another unique feature of O3DX is our proprietary spline based camera system that allows the artist to place the camera in the perfect spot at exactly the right time, no matter how you decide to play the game. This creates the feeling that you are the star in a blockbuster movie, with cinematic camera positions that will immerse you in the dust or fly you over valleys and canyons.



O3DX was built using Unity Pro Game Engine in combination with Grinder. 




Unity ProUnity is arguably the leading game engine around with a powerful rendering engine and class leading multi platform distribution. Unity contains the powerful 3D physics engine NVIDIA® PhysX® Physics. Expect immersive and visceral scenes with tires that screech and burn; walls that crumble and glass that shatters. We would not put our money behind any other game engine.GrinderGrinder is our in-house developed 4x4 engine that integrates with Unity and brings the 4x4 world to your screen. It was developed over the last 3 years undergoing 3 design iterations. Hundreds of thousands of downloads later, Grinder has matured into an off-road beast with no equivalent.  Smell the diesel...taste the dust! 





What do we aim to achieve with the Indiegogo campaign funding? 
The game is 95% complete and currently in the late alpha phase of the development cycle. We're almost there and we have a sufficient budget to complete the game. This Indiegogo campaign has been created with you in mind. We want to offer enthusiastic individuals the opportunity to get involved and create a pre-launch community around this exciting game. We want to offer you the game on pre-order with perks only available to our backers. Have a look at the different backing opportunities and choose the option best suited to you. This is a once off opportunity. Once this campaign is over these perks will never be available again.




However, if we were to exceed our base goal then it would allow us to implement many of our stretch goals and improve the overall experience of the game. Our list of stretch goals:
$20 000

Old man Bob the mechanic. Old man Bob becomes the voice enabled mechanic character that will guide you, upgrade your engines and give all round advice to you as you progress through the levels. He is the mechanic that no 4x4 enthusiast can live without.
More game assets (trucks, terrain assets, etc).


$30k-$50,000

An additional level pack with 10 more levels!

Cross platform versions for Mac and PC and possibly Oculus Rift.
Even more game assets.







$50K-$100,000

Oculus Rift guaranteed.

Two additional level packs with 20 more levels!

Our love and appreciation.
Much more game assets.








$100 000+

Playstation + Xbox (Possibly WII)

Three additional level packs with 30 more levels!

Tons of additional game assets.

Our undying love and eternal appreciation!





Accountability
It is our commitment to you, our backers, that we will maintain consistent communication throughout the process. This means regular updates, product screenshots, and plenty of behind the scenes insight as we complete the creation of O3DX. After all, we built this game for you..




Thank you for reading our Indiegogo page. We hope that you will consider backing O3DX and help us bring this game to market.
You can follow our progress via Facebook. We would love to hear from you as well. Please leave us your views and comments so that we can refine our game-play and make a game you really love.
Please spread the word and share our Indiegogo page with your friends!



Smell the diesel, taste the dust! O3DX will be the new game you love!

story:
"The world endures only for the sake of the breath of school children" (Talmud)


Our Story

We started AppSameach almost an year ago, with the aim of sharing creative and educational Printables and Apps about Jewish Holidays.

 

Today our website has tons of free Printables (Coloring Pages and Games) about almost all of the Jewish Holidays.

In December 2014 we released our first App about Hanukkah (IOS, Android).


The App "My Hanukkah" has been downloaded more than 10.000 times in less than a month.

Why We Need Your Help?

Today, we are ready to start developing an App for Pesach and we are looking for your help to partially fund the effort!

The App is going to be FREE, for both IOS and Android (for latest OS only).

About the App

  • 8-10 pages of Stories with Illustrations, Animations, Sounds, Music and Voice Over in multiple languages.
  • 3 Games about Passover and the Seder.
  • 10 Coloring Pages
  • A lot of music!

Release date

We are targeting to release the App one week before Passover 2015, hence during the last week of March.

story:
Just a video and a little bit of Text?!? NO!!
You can download a FREE Demo of our Game! Check out the DOWNLOAD button below.




We have got a new design!

Thanks Xpander69 for the Video:

 

This is only a demo with many bugs! A lot of features are missing!


What is ProjectMind?

-ProjectMind is a mix of Trackmania, surfing in Counter-Strike and Portal
-A Jump'n'Run which is made for speedrunning
-Multi- and Singleplayer, but the focus is based on the Singleplayer campaign (Multiplayer feature will be added in the future)

-The final version will run on Linux, Mac and Windows
(currently only on Linux and Windows)


Created with:


Features that will be added in the future:

Great features:
-More graphic because the graphic dont looks very good at the moment
-Multiplayer and Coop
-Mapcreator
-Online time ranking
-Story mode

Small features:
-A new kind of weapon/gimmik
-A better surf physic
-More speed!
-Boss levels
-New menu style
-Reset Button
-Options (windowed mode etc.)



Why we need the Money?

The final game is set to be completely free. So we don't get money for it. But for sounds, textures and some licences we need a small amout of money. Thats the reason why whe need your help.
We've got a lot of cool perks you get when you spend money in our project.

Be a part of ProjectMind

Until the campaign finishes we will start a devblog where you can post your ideas for our game! We want to get a great Community!

You don't have money to spend? No Problem!

When you don't have money but you love our project you can also be part of it!
Everybody who shares our game is welcome and can get the game completely FREE! You only have to send us an image where we can see that you shared the game (for example on Facebook or Twitter) and you will get the 1€ Perk!

Gameplay:




Music in the videos:
Gemafreie Musik von https://www.cayzland-music.de

story:
Short Summary

Hello all!
I'm Kalle Alanen a miniature gaming enthusiast from Finland. I have played miniature wargames for 14 years more or less actively and during this time I have tried my hand at modelling too. I decided one day to make resin bases for my Malifaux miniatures. After I made all the bases for my miniatures, I still had the moulds. And so I thought to myself, maybe I can make some more of the bases to sell to my friends, and if they like them, I'll try something bigger - to provide some income with my talents.
The campaign is basically me making bases and you paying me for them. I try to keep the prices low so anyone can get them yet get something out of my work.
Buy my bases, and you will see more different kinds of them in the future.
What We Need & What You Get

Due to Finnish laws, this is a pre-sale. You purchase the items and so you and I enter into a legal contract for you to pay me and I to deliver the items. So it doesn't matter if the goal is not reached - you will still get the items. I have to ask you to pay exact sums though.

If you are interested enough, I will launch other campaigns and/or set up a webstore in future. You can offer ideas for the future base sets if you want to - I'll try to make those ideas a reality.

    The Impact

    You get nice looking bases while I get to make more designs. As I mentioned above, please leave ideas for what you would like to see in the future. I want to keep making different base styles and later on other bits and pieces as well, and you can help me get to the road.
    Risks & Challenges
    There are some challenges of course. The moulds will break, the moulding process might fail, the bases itself might not come out perfectly. All these are problems to be overcome.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you can't or don't want to contibute, please tell your friends and ask them to do the same. There are the share tools to share this project on Indiegogo as well.

      Thanks for reading! 

      How to order?

      You need to choose what you would like to purchase. I have three different sized bases, 30mm, 40mm and 50mm. When you make the purchase, you pay for as many sets as you want, with basic sets being 3 euros and the collection with one set of each being 6 euros. So, if you want two sets of 30mm and one set of 40mm you would pay 7 euros + s&h total. If you want only 2 sets of 50mm bases, you'd pay 6 euros + s&h. For 20 sets (2 x 10 sets) you would pay 40 euros + s&h.
      I will be sending all purchasers a message after the campaign is over to check with you what you wish to get.

      Shipping and Handling:

      If you want to pick the items up from my place, then S&H is free. Otherwise, please keep reading.

      S&H fees will depend on the amount of bases you want to order. The bases will be sent 2nd class mail using Itella Posti (Finnish Postal Service) packed in a bubble wrapped cardboard mailing box.
      The S&H prices are as follows
      Pickup:
      1-many sets: 0,00€

      Finland:
      1-3 sets: 2,40€
      4-12 sets: 3,00€
      13-29 sets: 4,80€
      30-58 sets: 6,60€
      59-116 sets: 10,20€

      European Region*:

      1-3 sets: 3,20€

      4-12 sets: 4,20€

      13-29 sets: 5,90€

      30-58 sets: 9,80€

      59-116 sets: 18,20€


      Rest of the world:

      1-3 sets: 3,60€

      4-12 sets: 5,40€

      13-29 sets: 8,50€

      30-58 sets: 12,00€

      59-116 sets: 22,70€


      Please add this amount to your order total.
      If you need to get more than 116 sets, then we need to find another delivery method as the items will not fit as a letter. A Maxiletter will cost about one half extra for the same weight.
      *Europe includes: EU countries plus the following Albania, Andorra, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Faroe Islands, Gibraltar, Greenland, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Macedonia, Mayotte (France), Moldova, Montenegro, Norway, Russia, Saint-Pierre and Miquelon (France), San Marino, Serbia, Switzerland, Turkley, Ukraine, Vatican, plus the following Agion Oros (Greece), Büsingen area (Germany), Campione d'Italia (Italia), Ceuta and Melilla (Spain), French overseas departments Guadeloupe, Martinique, French Guyana, Réunion, Helgoland Island (Germany), The Canary Islands (Spain), The Channel Islands [Jersey, Guernsey, Alderney, Sark] (UK)

      Pictures

      As promised, below are pictures of the bases. First the masters and then 30mm and 50mm fresh from the moulds, washed black to show the textures a bit better. After those a couple of photos with a miniature on a painted base.

      30mm masters


      40mm masters


      50mm master

      30mm washed

      50mm washed

      Malifaux miniatures on 30mm painted bases.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hello all!I'm Kalle Alanen a miniature gaming enthusiast from Finland. I have played miniature wargames for 14 years more or less actively and during this time I have tried my hand at modelling too. I decided one day to make resin bases for my Malifaux miniatures. After I made all the bases for my miniatures, I still had the moulds. And so I thought to myself, maybe I can make some more of the bases to sell to my friends, and if they like them, I'll try something bigger - to provide some income with my talents.
The campaign is basically me making bases and you paying me for them. I try to keep the prices low so anyone can get them yet get something out of my work.
Buy my bases, and you will see more different kinds of them in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

 Due to Finnish laws, this is a pre-sale. You purchase the items and so you and I enter into a legal contract for you to pay me and I to deliver the items. So it doesn't matter if the goal is not reached - you will still get the items. I have to ask you to pay exact sums though.
If you are interested enough, I will launch other campaigns and/or set up a webstore in future. You can offer ideas for the future base sets if you want to - I'll try to make those ideas a reality.

You get nice looking bases while I get to make more designs. As I mentioned above, please leave ideas for what you would like to see in the future. I want to keep making different base styles and later on other bits and pieces as well, and you can help me get to the road.

story:
LEGO is a 6s team in Team Fortress 2 and we need your help with going to Dreamhack 2015. We thought doing a fundraiser would be a great way for us to ease the burden of travel while at the same time giving a bunch of stuff back to the community.

Team LEGO has had many forms over the seasons and this season the roster consisted of:

Izon and Sorex on scouts

Dmoule and Josh on soldier

Dr Phil on demo

Condom on medic.

For lan the roster is slightly different with Helberg, the former LEGO scout through many seasons, on Roamer and also the great Beater who played in season 20/21 will be casting at Dreamhack as well as driving LEGO to LAN.

Just to make one thing clear: We’re going to Dreamhack regardless of the result of this fundraiser. We’re fully committed and have already sorted flights and housing.

This fundraiser is simply an opportunity for you to support your (hopefully) favorite team while getting something cool in return.

So what exactly can you expect to get in return for donating, other than our eternal gratitude?

See right for all the perk information, ranging from 5 - 50 euros so it's affordable for everyone. For any further details look at the “perk information” at the bottom of the page.

Paying for housing is our first priority, followed by covering the cost of gas money, which will amount to a little bit less than 1000€. Anything we receive from then on will go towards covering the cost of transportation, starting with Josh and Sorex’s flights.

Going to Dreamhack to represent our team and showcase TF2 to a larger, new audience is a huge honour and pleasure for us, and we’re super hyped to showcase the labour of all of the hard work and passion that we’ve poured into the game over the years. Also, we’ll finally get to find out whether Josh really is a leprechaun!

Perk Information

Important!

If you donate for a weapon signing please be aware you must provide your own gift wrap, please give your steam community page URL and the player you want to sign your weapon. After the fundraiser and lan has ended you will then be added by a member of of our team, who will then organise getting your weapon signed. 

The Demo review will be one map but this includes an hour time slot and will include going over individual and team play, suggestions for game play and generally will teach you a lot. The players who are doing reviews include Dr Phil, Josh, Condom and Izon. I recommend going for class specific but most players have also played other classes for example Dr Phil has played medic and Izon soldier.

Casted games will be one map, this will be streamed on Dr Phil and Josh’s stream and will probably be using an old demo/stv, however we are also exploring the possibility of offering to cast a live match. If it's an official there is also a chance of this being streamed on one of teamfortresstv's channels, but this is not guaranteed!

The Mix with LEGO only has 6 slots, this will include playing with at least three players of LEGO in a 6s mix. Or two teams with three LEGO players in each team, that will play each other, 3 LEGO players and 3 perk donators on the teams.

Frag Movie made by Beater

This will be a 2-8 minute frag movie dependent on the amount of frag clips you provide. You can choose a song / songs you would want Beater to use, as well as the title of the video + any other specific request you might have.

The frag clips should be provided as demo files and in a zipped folder. If you purchase this perk please enter your steam profile into the notes and you will be contacted regarding this. Will take at most a month per video with a deadline of 28/12/15 for the first one. You can pick the name used for the video though it will include LEGO, this will be uploaded to Beater’s channel though you can also request the original file should you want this for personal use.

story:
A Brief Summary

DarkRisk began as a Web project type MMO Ogame several years ago to a group of programmers loving friends wargames and space simulation . It was never anything beyond a personal Beta .

• I'm Sergio Tapia (Author / Writer ( blogger, novel and drama) Software Development Manager) , you know something more about me, visit my Blog sergiotapia.es .

• I have over 20 years experience in the software development world and my passion is writing novels and video games. So think DarkRisk to tell a story of the most detailed and real as possible. Help me get a dream

• I want to create a persistent MMO universe that follow only two premises ; I absolutely accessible (bone , the idea is to reach any Os or device without excluding anyone ) and I want to be as detailed and real to make people feel you really have a second life.

• I want to create an emulator of the game, for those who have no programming skills the need to tell their story in a similar way and small universes spread worldwide . Emulation server can be used by any player DarkRisk account and you can create a private , non-commercial server without asking permission whenever, wherever.

What we need and what you get

• Creating an MMO and even more , a software that allows non-technical person without programming knowledge to create their own servers is not easy . Not only is create , release and forget , I also want to maintain it and evolve it . They must have an organization of dedicated people , a small company that can give continuity to the project. It has been assessed that in order to reach the first real version and then keeping it going during the early years it would take at least $ 500,000 for personnel and infrastructure.

• The idea is that future subscriptions DarkRisk funded players will be the monthly rate. For licenses player or private servers. To those who help us, providing direrentes rewards depending on the amount contributed, will be given different titles and fee waivers for long or forever, regardless of platform.

• If we fail our goal and do not get the funds to create an organization that can support the DR universe , I will continue working on the project individually the rest of my life if necessary . I will never give up and I will go forward with my personal media gradually , year after year to reach my goal, that, you can be sure.

What we create

• DR can be a great user experience and contribute to many people who love RPGs in space an opportunity to play an alternative lifestyle and quality from any device. Current MMO Mobile are little more than arcade have no real dimension of MMO. But we want our players to have creative restlessness to create their own private servers without anyone chasing them and achieve their dream of having their own history. Your friends can connect from your iPhone , Android , Windows Phone , BlackBerry , etc ... to your persistent universe . All with a single account.

• For years I have led technical teams in IT project management for major companies and I have programmed in different environments.

• I created the Blog www.darkrisk.com to be telling our progress slowly and all the latest news . I have also created a small app based on Google Play HTML serving as a basic model of an RPG in space set in my books and novels. The project has already started , you also want to join into legend ?

Other ways you can help

• You can also help in downloading the free app Google Play and giving a good rating or spreading the project on social networks , all help is welcome.

• Remember to share with Indiegogo .

email:  darkrisk@live.com 

twitter: @darkriskcom

story:
Interactive, Computer Controlled, Multi-Shooter, Airsoft Range

*Disclaimer - We only create Electronic Airsoft Target Systems.  We do not manufacture or sell any Airsoft guns. 

Crosshairs Airsoft takes the excitement of shooting Airsoft guns, but tracks your speed, accuracy, and progress at the same time.  A set of computer controlled targets are positioned at the end of a range with a large screen monitor placed above it.  Two players shoot simultaneously and compete with one another while their times and scores are calculated and displayed on the monitor above.

Who Are We?  

What do you get when you combine a Lockheed Martin Aerospace Engineer, a Surgical Robotic Engineer, An Ebay Software Engineer, and Game Architects who have worked at Playstation, Electronic Arts, and Namco? You get Crosshairs! The world's first electronic airsoft range of its kind! We are an All-Star team from the Silicon Valley that has combined our efforts to create a game changer in the Airsoft community. We just need support from you to bring more features to the system and move to a larger facility!

Mayhem Demo


Showdown Demo



- We need to manufacture more ranges and move to a larger location in the San Francisco Bay Area.  

- We are developing a mobile version of the range so they can be placed at any shop or facility around the world. 

- We have created a few IPSC style games for competition shooting, but we are also taking the opportunity to introduce Airsoft to the general community with video game style shooting.  We hope this will lead to a more favorable view of our community to the general public, showing that Airsoft is very safe and fun.  Some of the games we are developing are below:

Zombie Attack!: Zombies will be coming towards you on the screen corresponding to the targets below.  See if you can outlast your opponent!

Hostage:  Hostage is based on the old police shooters where both innocents and criminals pop up on the screen, requiring you to make quick judgment and maintain accuracy.

Football:  You will have a few seconds to hit targets equaling different amounts of yardage.  If you do not hit enough to score a touchdown, your opponent will pick up the ball where you left it on the field to bring it back the other way attempting to score a touchdown of their own. 

Combat: Using Battleship style gameplay, each target corresponds to a military vehicle.  The object is to hit each of your opponent's vehicles four times each before he/she does it to you.  

Safety, Fun, Community  

Shooting real guns is intimidating for many, and also very expensive, so this gives people a safe alternative to practice their accuracy, compete against another person, and have a fun social experience all at the same time!  For many of those that love popular first person shooter video games and want to try a real life simulation, this acts as a good transition for people to learn how to properly handle a gun before going out to an airsoft field.

Rewards

We have many great membership offers for those who participate.  However, we know not everyone lives in range of our facility, so we have created other ways for you to be involved.  Bad Mother Funder T-shirts are available for contributors, but you can also be on the big screen! 

We are offering a limited amount of in-game images from our donors for the games Hostage and Zombie Attack!

Hostage Images:

We need images of both hostages and criminals for our game.  After donors submit their photo, it will be digitized and altered like the images below:

If your character causes the game ending hit, you will receive a close up game over sceen:


Zombie Images:

Zombie images will be similar to the ones above.  A headshot photograph will be modified and digitized to resemble a zombie like the images below:

Exclusive Memberships

We are offering a limited amount of exclusive memberships that will allow you to come in once a month for a year and bring guests with you for free.  Safety glasses, BBs, and gun rental included.  Feel free to bring your own equipment though!


Improvements: 
We are hoping that everyone loves our first released versions of the targets, but we are aware that there are going to be critics...which is a good thing! We want to keep this ever improving, and we would love feedback from the Indiegogo community. None of this would be possible without you, and we hope we care create a revolutionary way to have fun together! 

Demand: 
One of the greatest challenges we feel that we will encounter is not being able to handle the demand for the product! We do not want fans of our systems to have to wait hours to use it, so we would definitely like to expand to other larger facilities from our central location in the San Francisco Bay Area, California. We know that Airsoft is growing in popularity everywhere, so we would like to forge partnerships with interested individuals that would like to bring our sophisticated target systems to other areas of the United States, and other countries as well.

story:
About Us:

We're looking to revive the golden age of arcade gaming right in the heart of  The City of Invention - Akron, Ohio, a place where the whole family can enjoy a night out while keeping their hard earned money local. No pizza loving rodents or creepy animatronic bands here, just a good time in a classic arcade!

Like PBS, this is a member supported project! We can't do this without the support and contributions of gamers like you! Join today and recieve perks such as free tokens and members only events. Packages starting as low as $10. 

By donating today you can help us acquire dozens of arcade cabinets, pinball machines, and other games! Your generous support will also help to repair some of the machines we've already acquired.

Here are a few of the games and activities you can enjoy:

Arcade Games:

  • Area 51
  • Asteroids
  • Centipede
  • Crystal Castles
  • Donkey Kong
  • Donkey Kong Jr.
  • Double Dragon
  • Ikari Warriors
  • Liberator
  • Lunar Lander
  • Mario Bros
  • Millipede
  • Missile Command
  • Mortal Kombat
  • Pac-Man
  • Ms. Pac-Man
  • Pong
  • Street Fighter
  • Super Breakout
  • Super Mario Bros.
  • Warlords
  • ...and many more!

Other Games:

  • Air Hockey
  • Billiards
  • Bocce
  • Foosball
  • Ice Hockey
  • Pinball Machines
  • Skee-ball
  • Snooker
  • Whack-A-Mole
  • ...and many more!

 

Funding:

  • Funds will go toward acquiring additional machines and repairs to existing machines.
  • Additional uses for funding will go toward renovating the space for the arcade in Akron.

In the event that our goal is not reached, all funds acquired will still be used for the uses stated above. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Unable to donate funds? We're also accepting new or used arcade cabinets or other games! Email us at RubberCityArcade@gmail.com if you're interested in donating hardware!

story:
Elementos is a fast paced strategy game for two. Rules are easy and quick to learn which unleashes a game with a surprising strategic depth. Elementos is about setting traps, thinking ahead, and exercising a neglected grey cell or two. It's a head to head challenge taking place in a natural setting.

Elementos is a game for all; kids and adults – as long as you enjoy a little challenging fun. All are invited! We see Elementos as a universal game; easily understood no matter where you're from or what language you speak.

The idea behind Elementos is simple. We play in a world of 3 fundamental elements: Fire, Water, and Tree. The 3 different elements complete a life cycle; fire takes tree, tree takes water, and water takes fire; the elements create a comfy state of equilibrium. Thing is, each game piece is actually a two faced deceiving character since each game piece can be flipped to reveal a different element on their opposite side that is known only to their master. These elements are potential carriers of your wand, which is the real star of the game.

Be the first player to advance the wand to the other side of the board – and you become an Elemaster, winner of the game.

We took our time to develop a meticulous design. Carefully crafted, all game parts are made of wood with top quality prints (silkscreened). All art and graphics were delicately adjusted to keep Elementos naturally simple and pretty. With our audience in mind, we designed a portable game case you can take to the beach, to the park, keep it in your car, or bring it to the bar. Feel free to take it to school, we're sure your teacher won’t mind. 

You get the idea. Enjoy!

Here's what Uwe Eickert of Academy Games has to say about ELEMENTOS:

"When I first saw Elementos, I thought, what a nice kids game. But then we began playing it and were amazed by the depth of the game. I love the strategy and tough decisions that I have to make in order to get ahead. Do I sacrifice a unit to open a path forward for my wand? Or do I wait until I have set more reinforcements, risking that my opponent may spring a trap if I wait too long. 

I highly recommend Elementos. The game quality and game play are both phenomenal - a wonderful Kickstarter project to support."

 Uwe Eickert, Academy Games

"Elementos is one of those rare games that combines a simple rules-set with layers of strategy. It can be very intense to play, yet can be taught in a matter of minutes. I highly enjoyed my plays of Elementos and I can see gamers enjoying it over and over again. Combined with a beautiful presentation, Elementos is a winning abstract strategy game that I'm sure will be loved by a wide variety of people!"  

 David Harding, Grail Games (creator of "101 The card game", "Guns & Steel")

HOT OFF THE PRESS - UNDEAD VIKING REVIEW


Words like "surprising depth and tactics", "easy to learn", "cool elements", "feels good", "fun experience", "cool box", "play at work over lunch", "teach kids basic strategy", "really really enjoyed playing" just keep echoing in our proud heads.

"Wood you like to play a unique new game? quite a revolutionary game, in which the basic elements face each other, and any move might be changed and reversed. Wooden, compact, neat game inspired by Rock-Paper-Scissors logic, in a fresh approach. Water, Wood and Fire are the elements in stake, light strategy will lead you across the board to win!"

Boaz Coster, partner and game designer, Theora Design (inventors of "Guess who?")

"Great-looking campaign! We featured it today on Casual Game Revolution"

 Chris James, founder, Casual Games Revolution (bringing positive change to the board game industry)

"Elementos - is a two player strategy game where players will each try and get their wand to their opponents side of the board. To do this ... It sounds cool and the wooden components (including the box that folds out to become the board) are very well done. Check it out."

Kick the Table, Mike Minutillo, as reviewd in Board Game Geeks


We both believe in quality and strive to give you not only a superb game experience, but also deliver a top quality product. We decided to produce the game using silkscreened prints on wood to make it a portable game that will last. Game is ready to go, tested, and admired by plenty of game makers who saw it. 

Thanks! Enjoy!
