story:
Short Summary

We document classic arcade cabinets, terminals, synthesizers, keyboards and more.  We have special training and equipment to physically process these systems in order to understand how they were built.

In the short time we had the chips we've preserved a series of chips including HD647180 (ex: Fire Shark), 8751 (ex: Tatakae Big Fighter), PICs (ex: Ultimate Mortal Combat), and more.

As you may be aware from similar projects, decapping is capital intensive.  Not only is equipment expensive (ex: microscope), but most work incurs costs like chemicals and special hardware.  So far everything has come out of pocket.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently planning Q1 2017.  We'd like to break even and secure funds to continue processing chips.  For reference, as of 2016-01-08 we've spent over $2500 of our own funds on chips already processed and in the pipeline.  This doesn't count the time we put into this project and also ignores equipment we already had.  Expenses include things like:

  • Equipment
  • Practice samples
  • Custom PCBs
  • Consumables like acid, acetone, gloves, etc

By supporting this project you allow us to continue delivering blog posts.  We'll also post high resolution chip pictures but won't be able to provide additional content beyond that.

In line with the Q1 plan we've posted perks to cover the next 2-3 months of work.  See perks for details.

For the time being we are focusing on the original sample lot.  If you are contributing hoping to see work outside of that, please contact us before contributing.

Finally, funds will likely get treated as personal taxable income for us.  We will try to deduct if possible, but actually breaking even may mean a premium on top of actual expenses.

 

The Impact

More funding means we can process more chips faster.  For example, purchasing an off the shelf adapter instead of building our own.  Adequate funding allows us to acquire better equipment to more reliably process rare chips.  Even if funding is below target we'll continue to process chips, but it may limit what we can do.

Case study: #45 "Tatakae Big Fighter".  We'd recommend either sending this out for bonding or purchasing a bonding machine.  But, since funds were not available, we did a grueling repair procedure.  Aside that we don't really want to do that again, this took a lot of time away from processing other chips.

 

Risks & Challenges

Health risks aside, decapping doesn't always work.  We've been very upfront and transparent about this.  For example, a damaged EPROM chip is very difficult to read out.  We make a best effort to deal with such situations, but still need to cover costs when such issues occur.

For example, some of the PICs don't have valid data on them.  The dump wasn't 100% successful, but we did what we reasonably could to get that dump.  However, we still need to cover our costs getting to that point.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute financially?  We will also be looking to the community for help acquiring samples.  Stay tuned for more info.

story:
Welcome to The ProSports Exchange

The Fantasy Baseball Game that allows Players to Make Money!

The PSX is a brand new leading edge Fantasy Sports game that allows players like you and me to make money by buying and selling virtual shares in professional sports leagues from around the world. This real money fantasy game will test your ability to analyze sports team match-ups and try to predict which team will be in line to receive dividends during the regular and post season.

There will be numerous opportunities to increase the value of your portfolio through your trading skills or through the Dividend prizes that are awarded throughout the season. Which ever way you make a profit, we guarantee you will have more fun and be more involved than any fantasy sports game you have ever played.

What We Need & What You Get

We have been developing this game quietly for a period of time using our own money and also from our friends and family but the time has come to launch this extraordinary game in time for the upcoming Major League Baseball season. We have run into an impasse in trying to raise money through the Venture Capital and Angel route for the money needed to finish the programming and marketing.

Since the PSX fantasy game involves the trading of Virtual shares, we will credit your account to build your own portfolio with a 20 times return on your pledge.

If you pledge $20.00, we will credit your account with $400.00 worth of credits to purchase any virtual team shares from the Virtual IPO which will take place prior to the start of the MLB season and remain in effect until the end of the first month of play. At this time, the Virtual IPO will close and trading will begin. Based on a team’s performance and other fundamentals relating to sports, prices will change.

Teams that didn’t perform well last year might start at a price of $0.10 but in this new season their worth could go through the roof in turn making you money!

The funds collected here will be used to bring this exciting product to the market. It has been in production for a few years and now we just need to develop it for the new platforms (web, mobile devices).

Why The ProSports Exchange?

Traditionally, the fantasy sports games have all been based on players and not teams. The PSX focuses on the teams giving players a long term playing platform that eventually can spread over many different leagues (NFL, NHL, NBA, EPL etc.).

Compare other Fantasy Sports Games;

Other Documents:

The ProSports Exchange Game Rules

The ProSports Exchange FAQs

The ProSports Exchange Glossary

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends about it! You can all have your own portfolios and trade with each other. You can pass this information through our social network channels!

Please share with others!

 

Screenshots of the ProSports Exchange

story:
What We Are Doing~ Non Profit Documentary Funding Campaign

Simply put, we are raising money.  NON PROFIT DOCUMENTARY! We only need $25K to produce this, and all other funds will be donated!!!  WE NEED YOUR HELP!! 

There are too many athletes committing suicide due to CTE. Chronic traumatic encephalopathy(CTE) is a progressive degenerative disease, diagnosed post-mortem in individuals with a history of multiple concussions and other forms of head injury.  The NFL has chosen to ignore some of the plea's for help.  We need to make America aware that multiple concussions can cause severe long term problems, and children as young as 10 years old are getting concussions on the football field.  The NFL has made some significant changes for new players, but what about the retired players?  Brent Boyd, Rocky Selanders, Terry Owens, and other members of NFL group, "Dignity After Football" all have a story to tell.  What about the Hall Of Fame Athletes like Rayfield Wright, Walter Payton, Larry Little, Troy Aikman, and Steve Young?  Are they or have they suffered from this terrible disease that left Junior Seau DEAD by suicide at the young age of 43?  Seau would be the second former N.F.L. player to commit suicide in the past two weeks. Ray Easterling, a safety for the Atlanta Falcons in the 1970s and a plaintiff in a high-profile lawsuit against the N.F.L. over its handling of concussion-related injuries, died on April 19 of a self-inflicted gunshot wound. In February 2011, the former Chicago Bears star Dave Duerson shot himself in the chest, saying in a note that he wanted his brain donated to the study of football head injuries. THIS HAS GOT TO STOP!  We want to shoot this documentary, "A Head Of The Game", to educate America on the dangers of concussions via the NFL athletes that suffer from them every day.  We will hear from expert neurolgist's like Dr. Daniel Amen who is doing the largest study on CTE, and chronic brain disorders in NFL athletes. We also plan to donate a significant amount of money for research for ongoing studies that relate to all athletes and chronic brain injuries. This is a serious issue and I intend to showcase the severe issues past NFL players are having from chronic brain injuries.  Again, will be donating a portion of the funds collected to Dr. Daniel Amen's research project with NFL athletes and chronic concussions. 

WHY WE ARE DOING IT

The Sports Girls LLC is a new company designed to educate america on sports via the athletes, coaches, and trainers that do it on a daily basis.  Our goal is to spend time with athletes, on and off the field and educate America on the game itself, the good, bad, and the ugly.  We decided to take a chance.  We are a young company that is trying to do the right thing.  The NFL is not helping some of these retired athletes like Brent Boyd, Rayfield Wright, and many more that you will hear from in this documentary.   These men are suffering on a daily basis.  They are not getting million dollar checks, nor did they ever!  Some NFL retired athletes cannot even get medical coverage from the NFL, and we are taLking about NFL athletes!  This is an incredible story that can only be told by the players that have lived it.  It will open up the eyes of many Americans, and we cannot let another athlete die.  There is help, and hope out there and we are going to show other athletes, moms, teachers, high school football players, dads, lawyers, children, college and even NFL athletes what really happened to these NFL players.  Concussions are a serious condition, and we are going to show you the medical proof!  We will even give Roger Goodell, and the NFL a chance to let America know what positive improvements and methodlogies are being put into place for current NFL athletes.  We will see if the NFL responds.  WE need your help.  Check out Dignity After Football on Face Book as Well.

WHO IS UP STREAM MEDIA?~

Up-Stream Media, Inc. is a multi-generational family of video and  musical professionals. We are also sports fans as are so many others.Members of our team have participated in over  40 award winning productions (including four Emmy nominated pieces) but never  one with such a complicated subject matter.As a full service HD production company who primarily produces television  and radio commercials, we are extremely aware of the market value of popular  athletes.We weren’t aware however, of  the probable cause for the decline of so many ex-pro football players until the Sport’s Girls asked us to come on board this project.  They shot our PSA for this fund raiser.

Up-Stream Media considers it an honor and privilege to participate  in the A-Head of the Game Documentary.As players become faster, stronger and more skilled there is no better  time than now, to aid those who have suffered such horrific repercussions  because of their commitments to greatness.Perhaps by becoming aware of the plight of past generations of football  players, we can not only help them, but present and future players as well.

We also will be using other media partners such as starlingproductions.com with their permission.  We also may use various production companies as needed to get this documentary shot.

We may use footage and other production needs from cantonfilms.com. 

~~FAQ~~

WHAT HAPPENS IF THE MONEY ISN'T RAISED IN TIME?~  We will use your funding.  If our production goal ($25,000) isn't met before the deadline we will have to make some changes to the production but the documentary should get made in some form.  The worst case scenario would be we would donate ALL the raised money (minus Indiegogo fees and cost of campaign) to Dr. Daniel Amen's research or any related NON PROFIT CAUSE on this issue.  The athletes involved will be very disappointed if we don't meet our goal. WE CANNOT LET THIS HAPPEN..  PLEASE HELP US.  We want to really show you what the NFL athletes are going through, and give the NFL a chance to let you know what improvements are being made.  We need to reach the goal, but will try to make this no matter what.  If we hit the $25K goal we can make this documentary happen.

CAN I INCREASE MY PLEDGE ONCE IT'S BEEN MADE?~  YES!! Once you donate to a campaign, you may want to change your incentive reward to a different one, or increase your pledge amount.  To do so, go to Indiegogo and sign in.  If you go to our campaign page, you can select your new donation package.   Please click it and you can enter a new amount, or choose a new incentive. 

CAN WE EXCEED THE GOAL?~  YES!!  That would be amazing as we are not a 501 (c)(3)  corporation, but want to help players suffering with CTE. We will not be able to shoot this documentary without your support.  All money will be used to produce this much needed documentary. However, as stated earlier we will DONATE all extra funds raised to Dr. Daniel Amen and possibly one other concussion awareness study for non profit.   

WHEN IS THE VIEWING PARTY?~  We cannot schedule the party until we have shot and edited the entire documentary.  We will first have to raise all of the funds in order to make that happen.  The viewing party will be prior to the documentary airing to the public and we will let you know way in advance.

HOW DO WE CONTACT YOU?~  So happy you asked me that.  Please send all inquiries to thesportsgirls@aol.com.  We will get back to you within one week. 

IF I DONATE, WHEN CAN I REDEEM THE INCENTIVE?~ All incentives big and small, will only happen if our goal is met.  If we do meet our goal, immediately after our deadline will will start to manufacture and ship all physical merchandise directly to you.  It will be our priority to schedule the more personal incentives as soon as possible.  You will be hearing from our Team.  WE NEED TO MAKE OUR GOAL!

WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?~  Every penny (minus the fees for Indiegogo's involvement) will go directly to The Sports Girls LLC, Owner and Creator of A Head Of The Game to produce this documentary!!  Your money goes directly to the funding of this documentary.  We cannot do it without YOU!  ANY MONEY RAISED ABOVE OUR GOAL WILL BE DONATED TO NON PROFIT RESEARCH!

Please e-mail us with any other questions.  Please tell every person you know about this project!  We want to help save lives and show America the truth about concussions and the NFL.  We will also try and get an official statement from the NFL or NFLPA on this imperative issue.

 PLEASE DONATE HERE TODAY**

What We Are Doing~ Non Profit Documentary Funding Campaign
Simply put, we are raising money.  NON PROFIT DOCUMENTARY! We only need $25K to produce this, and all other funds will be donated!!!  WE NEED YOUR HELP!! 
There are too many athletes committing suicide due to CTE. Chronic traumatic encephalopathy(CTE) is a progressive degenerative disease, diagnosed post-mortem in individuals with a history of multiple concussions and other forms of head injury.  The NFL has chosen to ignore some of the plea's for help.  We need to make America aware that multiple concussions can cause severe long term problems, and children as young as 10 years old are getting concussions on the football field.  The NFL has made some significant changes for new players, but what about the retired players?  Brent Boyd, Rocky Selanders, Terry Owens, and other members of NFL group, "Dignity After Football" all have a story to tell.  What about the Hall Of Fame Athletes like Rayfield Wright, Walter Payton, Larry Little, Troy Aikman, and Steve Young?  Are they or have they suffered from this terrible disease that left Junior Seau DEAD by suicide at the young age of 43?  Seau would be the second former N.F.L. player to commit suicide in the past two weeks. Ray Easterling, a safety for the Atlanta Falcons in the 1970s and a plaintiff in a high-profile lawsuit against the N.F.L. over its handling of concussion-related injuries, died on April 19 of a self-inflicted gunshot wound. In February 2011, the former Chicago Bears star Dave Duerson shot himself in the chest, saying in a note that he wanted his brain donated to the study of football head injuries. THIS HAS GOT TO STOP!  We want to shoot this documentary, "A Head Of The Game", to educate America on the dangers of concussions via the NFL athletes that suffer from them every day.  We will hear from expert neurolgist's like Dr. Daniel Amen who is doing the largest study on CTE, and chronic brain disorders in NFL athletes. We also plan to donate a significant amount of money for research for ongoing studies that relate to all athletes and chronic brain injuries. This is a serious issue and I intend to showcase the severe issues past NFL players are having from chronic brain injuries.  Again, will be donating a portion of the funds collected to Dr. Daniel Amen's research project with NFL athletes and chronic concussions. 
WHY WE ARE DOING IT
The Sports Girls LLC is a new company designed to educate america on sports via the athletes, coaches, and trainers that do it on a daily basis.  Our goal is to spend time with athletes, on and off the field and educate America on the game itself, the good, bad, and the ugly.  We decided to take a chance.  We are a young company that is trying to do the right thing.  The NFL is not helping some of these retired athletes like Brent Boyd, Rayfield Wright, and many more that you will hear from in this documentary.   These men are suffering on a daily basis.  They are not getting million dollar checks, nor did they ever!  Some NFL retired athletes cannot even get medical coverage from the NFL, and we are taLking about NFL athletes!  This is an incredible story that can only be told by the players that have lived it.  It will open up the eyes of many Americans, and we cannot let another athlete die.  There is help, and hope out there and we are going to show other athletes, moms, teachers, high school football players, dads, lawyers, children, college and even NFL athletes what really happened to these NFL players.  Concussions are a serious condition, and we are going to show you the medical proof!  We will even give Roger Goodell, and the NFL a chance to let America know what positive improvements and methodlogies are being put into place for current NFL athletes.  We will see if the NFL responds.  WE need your help.  Check out Dignity After Football on Face Book as Well.
WHO IS UP STREAM MEDIA?~
Up-Stream Media, Inc. is a multi-generational family of video and  musical professionals. We are also sports fans as are so many others.Members of our team have participated in over  40 award winning productions (including four Emmy nominated pieces) but never  one with such a complicated subject matter.As a full service HD production company who primarily produces television  and radio commercials, we are extremely aware of the market value of popular  athletes.We weren’t aware however, of  the probable cause for the decline of so many ex-pro football players until the Sport’s Girls asked us to come on board this project.  They shot our PSA for this fund raiser.
Up-Stream Media considers it an honor and privilege to participate  in the A-Head of the Game Documentary.As players become faster, stronger and more skilled there is no better  time than now, to aid those who have suffered such horrific repercussions  because of their commitments to greatness.Perhaps by becoming aware of the plight of past generations of football  players, we can not only help them, but present and future players as well.
We also will be using other media partners such as starlingproductions.com with their permission.  We also may use various production companies as needed to get this documentary shot.
We may use footage and other production needs from cantonfilms.com. 
~~FAQ~~
WHAT HAPPENS IF THE MONEY ISN'T RAISED IN TIME?~  We will use your funding.  If our production goal ($25,000) isn't met before the deadline we will have to make some changes to the production but the documentary should get made in some form.  The worst case scenario would be we would donate ALL the raised money (minus Indiegogo fees and cost of campaign) to Dr. Daniel Amen's research or any related NON PROFIT CAUSE on this issue.  The athletes involved will be very disappointed if we don't meet our goal. WE CANNOT LET THIS HAPPEN..  PLEASE HELP US.  We want to really show you what the NFL athletes are going through, and give the NFL a chance to let you know what improvements are being made.  We need to reach the goal, but will try to make this no matter what.  If we hit the $25K goal we can make this documentary happen.
CAN I INCREASE MY PLEDGE ONCE IT'S BEEN MADE?~  YES!! Once you donate to a campaign, you may want to change your incentive reward to a different one, or increase your pledge amount.  To do so, go to Indiegogo and sign in.  If you go to our campaign page, you can select your new donation package.   Please click it and you can enter a new amount, or choose a new incentive. 
CAN WE EXCEED THE GOAL?~  YES!!  That would be amazing as we are not a 501 (c)(3)  corporation, but want to help players suffering with CTE. We will not be able to shoot this documentary without your support.  All money will be used to produce this much needed documentary. However, as stated earlier we will DONATE all extra funds raised to Dr. Daniel Amen and possibly one other concussion awareness study for non profit.   
WHEN IS THE VIEWING PARTY?~  We cannot schedule the party until we have shot and edited the entire documentary.  We will first have to raise all of the funds in order to make that happen.  The viewing party will be prior to the documentary airing to the public and we will let you know way in advance.
HOW DO WE CONTACT YOU?~  So happy you asked me that.  Please send all inquiries to thesportsgirls@aol.com.  We will get back to you within one week. 
IF I DONATE, WHEN CAN I REDEEM THE INCENTIVE?~ All incentives big and small, will only happen if our goal is met.  If we do meet our goal, immediately after our deadline will will start to manufacture and ship all physical merchandise directly to you.  It will be our priority to schedule the more personal incentives as soon as possible.  You will be hearing from our Team.  WE NEED TO MAKE OUR GOAL!
WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?~  Every penny (minus the fees for Indiegogo's involvement) will go directly to The Sports Girls LLC, Owner and Creator of A Head Of The Game to produce this documentary!!  Your money goes directly to the funding of this documentary.  We cannot do it without YOU!  ANY MONEY RAISED ABOVE OUR GOAL WILL BE DONATED TO NON PROFIT RESEARCH!
Please e-mail us with any other questions.  Please tell every person you know about this project!  We want to help save lives and show America the truth about concussions and the NFL.  We will also try and get an official statement from the NFL or NFLPA on this imperative issue.
 PLEASE DONATE HERE TODAY**

story:
**IMPORTANT**

AFTER DONATING, PLEASE LEAVE YOUR INGAME NAME AND PREFERRED GUN IF APPLICABLE IN THE COMMENTS TAB!!! WE CAN NOT PUT GUNS OR ANY OTHER ITEMS IN BACKPACKS!

DO NOT REQUEST ANY PERK CHANGES HERE. ANY PERK CHANGE REQUESTS WILL BE IGNORED. PERKS CAN NOT BE CHANGED. YOU CAN DECIDE WHAT WEAPON YOU SPAWN WITH ONCE WHEN YOU DONATE. SO MAKE IT A GOOD ONE ;).

you can NOT spawn with any of the following:

1. items in BAGS

2. repair equipment (tyres, fuel etc)

3. rpgs, satchel charges, grenades or smoke grenades

4. radio

5. bags any larger than Alice size

IF YOU DONATE, the procedure for spawning with weapons is as such:

step 1; create a new character

step 2; once logged in, log out within 25 minutes of creating the character, and wait at the lobby for 1 minute

step 3; log back in, once logged in, you will have your weapons and will spawn at your vehicle location (if you have that perk)

step 4; if this does not work, repeat. if it still does not work, contact krauterz or mancow ingame or by email at krauterz@live.com.

step 5; DONATORS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR PERKS ONCE THE ORIGINAL REQUEST HAS BEEN PROCESSED!

**DONATION PERK RULES**

*1 DO NOT TELL ANYONE THE LOCATION OF VEHICLES!

*2 no deliberate trolling, or exploiting. this includes using vehicles that you have not got the perk access to use

*3 NO SPAWN CAMPING. it is ok to sit in capitals and murder innocents, but give them a change to get out of the city first..

*4 NO WASTING VEHICLES. dont crash one helicopter into 8 others..


*5 TRY NOT TO ADD TOO MANY VEHICLES TO THE GAME! take a chopper to a capital, but HIDE IT WELL. OR imobilize it.

*6 AND FINALLY, DONT DEATHMATCH OR SHOOT OTHERS AT PERK LOCATIONS!!! it takes up to 10 minutes to respawn there each time. please dont do it! DOING IT WILL RESULT IN A ONE DAY BAN, second warning is removal of perks for 2 days, third warning is permenant removal of perks.

*7 WE OFFER FULL REFUNDS FOR DONATIONS FOR ONLY 24 HOURS. AND ONLY IF PLAYER GIVES A RELIABLE REASON FOR THEIR REFUND REQUEST! THIS IS A DONATION SYSTEM! NOT A PAY TO RECEIVE SYSTEM!

**DONATING ACCEPTS THESE RULES. BREAKING RULES MAY RESULT IN SUSPENSION OF PERKS, REMOVAL OF PERKS AND DEPENDING ON THE MAGNITUDE OF THE INCIDENT, BANS MAY BE APPLIED**



Short Summary

ZUST is the most popular Day-Z sanctuary (private hive) server currently running. However, the owner has run into an unexpected problem which means he cannot pay for the next month of server hosting service. it is up to us to keep it going until the owner can once again run the show!

we just upgraded our server! its now an 8 core with HT (meaning 16 virtual cores!) 8gb of ram and almost 1gbps connection!


What We Need & What You Get
Realisticly, all we need is one months worth of funding, which is $360. ($169 for the server and $200 to hire 3 full time RDC admins) however, the more we collect, the better this server will become. more money means more slots, better uptime and less lag


QUIRKS INCLUDE WEAPONS AND VEHICLES! depending on how much you donate, the owner of the server can give you weapons, and other items. if you donate a lot, we can even give you a helicopter permenantly!
If we do not reach our goal of $260, the funds will be allocated to the next possible server restart stage. if its a few months away, this will aid in helping the server come back to life as much as possible.


The Impact
If ZUST gets shut down, players all across the world will lose their progress, vehicles and weapons. WE CANT LET THIS HAPPEN!
Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
Krauterz, the owner of the server, assures us that with proper funding, and with a goal that is met, not only could the server stay up indefinitly, but he could double the slot count. increase performance and add more perks to the game.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you cant donate, dont worry, just like us on facebook! and of course feel free to connect to our server to talk directly to an admin!

 

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
### Important Info ###

You can make contributions through Virtual credit cards, if you don't have a Credit Card. Most banks provide virtual CC service.

####

We thank you for checking our crowdfunding page for the board game 'Politics of India', contribute to help us raise the funds for India's first crowfunded board game.

 

SCAMS, ISSUES, DEVELOPMENT, CORRUPTION, PAY PER VOTE, BOGUS VOTING and everything that real politics have!

'Politics of India' is a pure strategy based board game with unique but easy to understand game play. 'Politics of India' simulates the Parliament elections of India and gives you a chance to become the best political party in India and make government. Either you can fight for election on the issues like 'Development', 'Women safety' etc. or you can play dirty politics and use unethical methods such as 'booth capturing', 'bogus voting' or 'bahubali' and try to win maximum number of seats. But when you are using unethical resources, be aware of 'election commision raid' during voting otherwise your candidate will be disqualified.

It's a game which you can play with friends, family and even with children.

Game play duration can be as short as 30-45 minutes or can be increased for power users. It's not a just roll-the-dice , but a pure strategy game, with lots of twist and tricks.

If you have loved games such as Monopoly, Power grid or likes, you are certainly going to love 'Politics of India'.

Our target is to ship at least 100 game pieces in the first installment. We also want to keep the price reasonable, such that average Indian can buy and enjoy the game. Some of the games today available in the market are so costly that even we have to think twice before buying.

Help us make this game a reality, your contributions means a lot for us.

 

(A picture of the printed prototype of the game.)

 


The Game Play, rules and strategies

You are one of the national political party of India and this is the election time. Your goal is to win maximum number of seats in India by using any way, be it money, ethical or unethical way and form the government in the center.

Each player assumes role of a political party and is given 15 candidate cards and 15 crore rupees at the start of the game. The game has two stages.

During the first stage, you field your candidates for various seats in different states of India like Delhi, Rajasthan or Bihar, and in the second stage, voting happens and it's winner is decided.

 

Strategy– You only have 15 turns, use them wisely to mange between fielding candidates, buying resources and putting up resource to maximize your chances to win most number of seats. It's a good strategy to try to defeat the other players on maximum number of seats, instead of focusing on just winning the seats.

Stage 1st ends after 15 turns are over. By the end of the 15th round, all players must have fielded maximum number of candidates.

 
To read full rules, please check out the pdf in the gallery.

Our story

I am Shree Kant Bohra, I am an engineer by profession, living in Bangalore. I am founder of of a tech startup. Though we are a software and hardware company and currently building some really challenging stuff for solar power plants, we are also avid boardgames lover.

So now you may be wondering how this board game came into being from a company that is building hardware and software? The true answer is, we also don't know. The idea of this game stuck to me while I was thinking about how to improve the Monopoly and suddenly I was working on a totally new board game in my mind. From that idea, this game got it's version on a drawing sheet, then I designed it in computer, got it printed. This all happened very quickly. But the first game we played and I knew, we are on to something interesting. From there number of improvements happened in the game play and design and finally we decided that we could actually tell others about it. So now we are here.

Other than me, the people who helped in improving the game and gave awesome feedbacks about it are Ritu Choudhary, Deepika Bohra and Anuj Raj Singh.

Why we want to crowdfund this game?

We believe that we have an awesome game and it's our duty that we should make it availabe for other board games lovers as well (:D). For this we could have tried the traditional methods of publishing the game, but by crowdfunding we will instantly get to know if there are people who like what we have.

We have the designs ready, game play is done and tested with number of gamers on a prototype printed board. Now we need funds to get the real hardbound game board out with the kind of cards and board quality we would love to play, again and again.

Most of the funds raised will go in the following tasks

  • Designs are ready, but we need graphics to be done and for that we are hiring a good graphfics designer with lots of experience. With quality comes the price.
  • Rest of the funds will go in printing, packaging the game. We have finalized on a game manufacturer in China, with good track record of manufacturing board games with the perfect quality and within our budget.

story:
(UPDATE: Contribuições pela Nuuvem ACABARAM)

Click on the banner to play

Racketboy is an old school block breaking bullet hell that takes you to a colorful universe of nonsense creatures, beautiful worlds and non-stop space tennis action. Help Racketboy save his planet from a horde of cute-yet-deadly foes who will stop at nothing to bring pain and suffering to our hero's homeland. 

We built a very fun concept in 72 hours for a game development competition. Now we want to create the full version with your help! Here's what we are planning:

  • 6 Insane Worlds with 2 different Acts each
  • 30 kinds of enemies
  • 6 Powerful Mini-bosses
  • 15 Epic Bosses
  • 6 Power-ups
  • 6 Buddies Species
  • 6 Ball Powers to choose from
  • Awesome retro art style, inspired by the great cute'em ups from the past
  • Procedurally generated enemy waves and random bosses to assure that no playthrough is the same as the one before
  • Endless Mode to challenge your limits! 
  • Leaderboards for you to compete with the world and conquer the top with the best racketing skills!


Platforms

With Unity3D, we plan to launch the game initially for Windows, Mac and Linux. If the campaign is funded, we'll check the possibility of making the game available for mobile devices as well.

Estimated launch : Mid 2016



 

After some heavy brainstorming, mechanics experiments, and a whole lot of dying while playing insane arcade shooters, we developed a combination of two classic genres to create a completely unique experience. Racketboy will challenge you in a new and exciting way.


You won't have access to weapons or be able to freely shoot at enemies. Instead, you will have to explore the uses of your handy laser racket to send enemies bullets flying straight back at them. But be careful, for some bullets can't be striked back!
However, if you manage to master your tennis skils, you will be able to turn a ball into a deadly sphere of ominous destruction to lay waste to everything in sight. 

  

 

Despite our different approach to the genre, we want fans of the good old shoot'em up games to feel encouraged to compete for high scores and perfect runs in our game.

That's why we will make our best efforts to bring a worthy challenge to hardcore fans, rewarding them for achieving a perfect run through a game or a perfect boss battle, and many other skill related achievements.


There will also be leaderboards to house the all-time best players, so get ready for some really tough competition!
And if you want to test your endurance, the Endless Mode will also be available, taking you into an intense challenge that forces you to face everything you already unlocked in the game for as long as you can go.

 

 

We are developing a lot of tools to provide you with tons of power and to allow for many different strategies. There are many ideas still being discussed and developed, but we'll be listing some features you can already expect to see !

Power-ups

You will count on a variety of different power-ups to help out on your fierce battles. They will provide special advantages to turn the tides in your favor. 

Big Racket      Projection  Racket

Power RacketForce Field Racket

Sticky Racket

 Payback ScarfShield Scarf

Speedy Scarf    Teleport Scarf 

 

Buddies

Tiny satellite allies that assist you with some very special skills! Buddies come in all shapes and types, complementing your play style with all sorts of abilities.


Balls

Racketboy has the ability to charge his strikes to the point where a shot transform into a much more powerful one. And the player will have quite some options of final forms he can choose from his super shot. 

Growing BallHoming Ball

 Laser BallPiercing Ball

Power BallShatter Ball

Stun Ball

 


The universe is filled with cute, cuddly, friendly-looking faces... and they’re all out to destroy you and everything you love! You will be facing the cutest and most vile creatures in the universe, all armed with intense bullet hell patterns and destructive-yet-vulnerable balls of destruction. You will also encounter many different approaches to the classic block breaker patterns, all designed to enhance Racketboy’s unique sense of challenge. 


 

 

 


No shooter is complete without gigantic bosses with overwhelming bullet patterns, and rest assured you will encounter as many as you can fight ! Each level will have a single boss waiting for you in the end, and new bosses can be unlocked through achievements, increasing the roster more and more. Minibosses are there to make it even more challenging, trying to beat you at your own game of space tennis, using every dirty strategy they can to completely destroy you.



 


We prepared lots of cool rewards to thank you for helping us! They go from getting the full game, all the way to getting your own Racketboy mini-arcade machine! 




Well, let's get into some more detail about each one of those nice perks:

- Name on credits

First of all, we will love you forever because you helped us! And we will share that love by putting your name in our "Special Thanks" session of the game's credits!

- Wallpaper

An amazing illustration that shows what Racketboy's all about, for you to decorate your desktop.

- Backer's Forum

We'll give you access to a backer's exclusive forum, where we will be sharing development info and getting feedback! 

- Digital Copy of Racketboy

This is the real deal. This is why you are here! Get a digital copy of our full game as soon as it's launched! Your gateway and passport to the world of RacketBoy!
- Manual (Digital)
We love old-school guidebooks, filled with nice curiosities about the world and pretty images. And that's what we want for Racketboy. You'll get a PDF file of our illustrated guidebook.

- Original Soundtrack (Digital)

You will have access to Racketboy's complete soundtrack, so you can enjoy our musician's beautiful, bouncy tunes.

- Beta Testing

Test the game while it's under development and start giving us feedback!
As soon as we have a nice playable version with the most important features, we will release it to beta testers so they can help us do some fine-tuning.

- Digital copy of "Songs for a Hero"

There are so many great Brazilian developers, we just want you to get to know more of their work! We will send you a digital copy of the game "Songs of a Hero", by Dumativa Studios. We're sure you're gonna love it!

- Racketboy Shirt

You will get a shirt with an awesome Racketboy design to adorn your body.

- Racketboy Poster

Get some beautiful Racketboy art to hang on your wall!

- Manual (Printed)

You will receive a printed version of our guidebook, just like old days!

- Pixel Avatar

Send us a nice picture of you and we will channel our retro art skills to turn you into a pixel portrait that will appear somewhere in the game! 

- Custom Boss

Pixel portrait not enough? Then how about a mighty BOSS based on you!? Send us a nice (or not so nice) picture and we'll make it into an insane boss to be featured in the game! Truly your biggest enemy will be... yourself!

- 16 bit material

You will get a physical copy of RacketBoy. It will come in a nice little retro-style box, with a cartridge-shaped case! You can choose between a Super Nintendo style cartridge or a Mega Drive (Genesis) style cartridge.

- Mini-Arcade

If you want the REAL arcade experience, then we will send you an amazing RacketBoy arcade machine so you can compete with your friends for high-scores, or start your very own arcade shop!


 

We created the prototype using Construct 2, a very simple game making engine, in a 72 hours competition. Therefore, a lot of mistakes were made and almost no optimization due to time constraints. We are re-building the whole game on Unity3D with a much more stable and organized build, which means we are creating the game from scratch!

We all love our work very much, and dedicate as much of our time as possible to Double Dash's projects to ensure a game that every one of us would love to play.

Sadly, we all have work to make money while we don't complete the game. That reduces drastically the amount of time we can put into the creation of Racketboy.

We want to be able to work 100% of our time on Racketboy, and that's why we need your help. Every dollar invested on this project will be dedicated to covering development costs, fees and other expenses, as well as making sure that you receive quality rewards.

                              

This amount also covers the fact that a big chunk of that money is lost to taxes, sadly. 

Double Dash is an indie developer studio from Brazil, formed by 5 talented members that are completely passionate about retro gaming and simple fun. The team focus their efforts in creating intense challenges through different approaches, trying to explore well-known mechanics in original and unseen manners.

  Lucas Thiers - Game Designer 

Luíza Shimura - 2D Artist

 Eduardo Saporski - Music and SFX

Jandê Saavedra - 2D Artist

 Kim Kaznowski - Programmer

 

 

We are aware that game development is always a risky business. From team members getting sick, to insane game-breaking bugs, all sorts of problems may happen when you're making a game. Our time planning always has a percentage of extra hours, considering potential problems and bug solving that will be a part of the process. We have already taken into consideration the prices of producing the rewards, so don't worry about that. 

What matters the most is that our team is formed by very dedicated professionals who will stop at nothing to see this game done in the best way possible. So rest assured that the more backers help us, the better the game will be. It's all up to you! 

 

 

Can't make a pledge? Just don't want to? Well, that's ok!! Any kind of help is important, so, if you don't feel like helping us out with a pledge, but still want Racketboy to happen, you can always help by sharing our campaign on your social networks.
story_txt:
(UPDATE: Contribuições pela Nuuvem ACABARAM)Click on the banner to playRacketboy is an old school block breaking bullet hell that takes you to a colorful universe of nonsense creatures, beautiful worlds and non-stop space tennis action. Help Racketboy save his planet from a horde of cute-yet-deadly foes who will stop at nothing to bring pain and suffering to our hero's homeland. We built a very fun concept in 72 hours for a game development competition. Now we want to create the full version with your help! Here's what we are planning:
6 Insane Worlds with 2 different Acts each
30 kinds of enemies
6 Powerful Mini-bosses
15 Epic Bosses
6 Power-ups
6 Buddies Species
6 Ball Powers to choose from

Awesome retro art style, inspired by the great cute'em ups from the past

Procedurally generated enemy waves and random bosses to assure that no playthrough is the same as the one before

Endless Mode to challenge your limits! 

Leaderboards for you to compete with the world and conquer the top with the best racketing skills!





Platforms
With Unity3D, we plan to launch the game initially for Windows, Mac and Linux. If the campaign is funded, we'll check the possibility of making the game available for mobile devices as well.
Estimated launch : Mid 2016





 
After some heavy brainstorming, mechanics experiments, and a whole lot of dying while playing insane arcade shooters, we developed a combination of two classic genres to create a completely unique experience. Racketboy will challenge you in a new and exciting way.



You won't have access to weapons or be able to freely shoot at enemies. Instead, you will have to explore the uses of your handy laser racket to send enemies bullets flying straight back at them. But be careful, for some bullets can't be striked back!However, if you manage to master your tennis skils, you will be able to turn a ball into a deadly sphere of ominous destruction to lay waste to everything in sight. 
  



 
Despite our different approach to the genre, we want fans of the good old shoot'em up games to feel encouraged to compete for high scores and perfect runs in our game.
That's why we will make our best efforts to bring a worthy challenge to hardcore fans, rewarding them for achieving a perfect run through a game or a perfect boss battle, and many other skill related achievements.


There will also be leaderboards to house the all-time best players, so get ready for some really tough competition!And if you want to test your endurance, the Endless Mode will also be available, taking you into an intense challenge that forces you to face everything you already unlocked in the game for as long as you can go.

 



 
We are developing a lot of tools to provide you with tons of power and to allow for many different strategies. There are many ideas still being discussed and developed, but we'll be listing some features you can already expect to see !
Power-ups
You will count on a variety of different power-ups to help out on your fierce battles. They will provide special advantages to turn the tides in your favor. 
Big Racket      Projection  Racket
Power RacketForce Field Racket
Sticky Racket
 Payback ScarfShield Scarf
Speedy Scarf    Teleport Scarf 
 
Buddies
Tiny satellite allies that assist you with some very special skills! Buddies come in all shapes and types, complementing your play style with all sorts of abilities.




Balls
Racketboy has the ability to charge his strikes to the point where a shot transform into a much more powerful one. And the player will have quite some options of final forms he can choose from his super shot. 
Growing BallHoming Ball
 Laser BallPiercing Ball
Power BallShatter Ball
Stun Ball
 




The universe is filled with cute, cuddly, friendly-looking faces... and they’re all out to destroy you and everything you love! You will be facing the cutest and most vile creatures in the universe, all armed with intense bullet hell patterns and destructive-yet-vulnerable balls of destruction. You will also encounter many different approaches to the classic block breaker patterns, all designed to enhance Racketboy’s unique sense of challenge. 

 



 
 






No shooter is complete without gigantic bosses with overwhelming bullet patterns, and rest assured you will encounter as many as you can fight ! Each level will have a single boss waiting for you in the end, and new bosses can be unlocked through achievements, increasing the roster more and more. Minibosses are there to make it even more challenging, trying to beat you at your own game of space tennis, using every dirty strategy they can to completely destroy you.









 



We prepared lots of cool rewards to thank you for helping us! They go from getting the full game, all the way to getting your own Racketboy mini-arcade machine! 























Well, let's get into some more detail about each one of those nice perks:
- Name on credits
First of all, we will love you forever because you helped us! And we will share that love by putting your name in our "Special Thanks" session of the game's credits!

- Wallpaper
An amazing illustration that shows what Racketboy's all about, for you to decorate your desktop.

- Backer's Forum
We'll give you access to a backer's exclusive forum, where we will be sharing development info and getting feedback! 

- Digital Copy of Racketboy
This is the real deal. This is why you are here! Get a digital copy of our full game as soon as it's launched! Your gateway and passport to the world of RacketBoy!
- Manual (Digital)

We love old-school guidebooks, filled with nice curiosities about the world and pretty images. And that's what we want for Racketboy. You'll get a PDF file of our illustrated guidebook.

- Original Soundtrack (Digital)
You will have access to Racketboy's complete soundtrack, so you can enjoy our musician's beautiful, bouncy tunes.

- Beta Testing
Test the game while it's under development and start giving us feedback!As soon as we have a nice playable version with the most important features, we will release it to beta testers so they can help us do some fine-tuning.

- Digital copy of "Songs for a Hero"
There are so many great Brazilian developers, we just want you to get to know more of their work! We will send you a digital copy of the game "Songs of a Hero", by Dumativa Studios. We're sure you're gonna love it!

- Racketboy ShirtYou will get a shirt with an awesome Racketboy design to adorn your body.

- Racketboy Poster
Get some beautiful Racketboy art to hang on your wall!

- Manual (Printed)You will receive a printed version of our guidebook, just like old days!

- Pixel Avatar
Send us a nice picture of you and we will channel our retro art skills to turn you into a pixel portrait that will appear somewhere in the game! 


- Custom Boss


Pixel portrait not enough? Then how about a mighty BOSS based on you!? Send us a nice (or not so nice) picture and we'll make it into an insane boss to be featured in the game! Truly your biggest enemy will be... yourself!

- 16 bit material
You will get a physical copy of RacketBoy. It will come in a nice little retro-style box, with a cartridge-shaped case! You can choose between a Super Nintendo style cartridge or a Mega Drive (Genesis) style cartridge.

- Mini-Arcade
If you want the REAL arcade experience, then we will send you an amazing RacketBoy arcade machine so you can compete with your friends for high-scores, or start your very own arcade shop!














 
We created the prototype using Construct 2, a very simple game making engine, in a 72 hours competition. Therefore, a lot of mistakes were made and almost no optimization due to time constraints. We are re-building the whole game on Unity3D with a much more stable and organized build, which means we are creating the game from scratch!
We all love our work very much, and dedicate as much of our time as possible to Double Dash's projects to ensure a game that every one of us would love to play.
Sadly, we all have work to make money while we don't complete the game. That reduces drastically the amount of time we can put into the creation of Racketboy.
We want to be able to work 100% of our time on Racketboy, and that's why we need your help. Every dollar invested on this project will be dedicated to covering development costs, fees and other expenses, as well as making sure that you receive quality rewards.
                              
This amount also covers the fact that a big chunk of that money is lost to taxes, sadly.

The team focus their efforts in creating intense challenges through different approaches, trying to explore well-known mechanics in original and unseen manners.
  Lucas Thiers - Game Designer 
Luíza Shimura - 2D Artist


 Eduardo Saporski - Music and SFX
Jandê Saavedra - 2D Artist


 Kim Kaznowski - Programmer

 
 

We are aware that game development is always a risky business. From team members getting sick, to insane game-breaking bugs, all sorts of problems may happen when you're making a game. Our time planning always has a percentage of extra hours, considering potential problems and bug solving that will be a part of the process. We have already taken into consideration the prices of producing the rewards, so don't worry about that. 
What matters the most is that our team is formed by very dedicated professionals who will stop at nothing to see this game done in the best way possible. So rest assured that the more backers help us, the better the game will be. It's all up to you! 

 


 


Can't make a pledge? Just don't want to? Well, that's ok!! Any kind of help is important, so, if you don't feel like helping us out with a pledge, but still want Racketboy to happen, you can always help by sharing our campaign on your social networks.

story:
Artipia Games is proud to present Briefcase. It is a new and exciting game by two Greek designers, Sotiris Tsantilas and Nikolas Sakaloglou. In a game of Briefcase, two to four players take over the role of young entrepreneurs aiming for wealth and success. By acquiring and activating various companies, players strive for financial supremacy.







Our main goal is to raise $10,000. We have a busy and ambitious production schedule for 2012 and your contributions will help us bring this game to life.





The English version of the Briefcase rulebook can be downloaded by clicking on the link below:

www.artipiagames.com/briefcase/rules/Briefcase_ENG_Rulebook.pdf

The game is language independent and several languages will be available online.





Inside the box you will find:

  • Rulebook (English, German, French rules with more languages available online)
  • 96 Company cards (large square 8x8cm)
  • 30 Company Randomizer cards (large square 8x8cm)
  • 48 Buy Decision cards (standard euro 5.9x9.1cm)
  • 36 Activate Decision cards (standard euro 5.9x9.1cm) 
  • 45 Obstacle Decision cards (standard euro 5.9x9.1cm)
  • 16 Hire Decision cards (standard euro 5.9x9.1cm)
  • 24 Personnel Resource cards (4.35x6.75cm) 
  • 20 Steel Resource cards (4.35x6.75cm)  
  • 20 Concrete Resource cards (4.35x6.75cm)  
  • 20 Paper Resource cards  (4.35x6.75cm)  
  • 20 Imported Resource cards  (4.35x6.75cm)  
  • 20 Energy Resource cards  (4.35x6.75cm)  
  • 2 Resource Block cards  (4.35x6.75cm) 
  • 1 Company Block card  (4.35x6.75cm)
  • 20 Victory Point cards  (4.35x6.75cm)  
  • 1 Central Bank Board  (23x11cm) 






Briefcase uses a combination of deck building and resource management mechanisms producing an interesting and unique result. 


Each player begins the game with the same Decision cards which form the Decision Deck. Each turn a player draws 4 cards from his deck and uses the cards to acquire and activate companies. During his turn a player can also purchase resources from the resource market in order to pay for the activation costs of his companies. Whenever player activates a company he collects its production and adds it to his Decision Deck.


Company Cards
Steel Factory Company card.
On the top of each company card is the buying cost, status, title and victory point value.
On the bottom is the activation cost, the ability and the production.

The Steel Factory is one of the 30 different companies included in the game. The artwork of the game is done by Antonis Papantoniou, illustrator of Drum Roll. It is still under development. Several company cards in the rulebook are not ready yet. They are currently being created and should appear as updates as our campaign progresses.

Decision Cards
The deck building mechanism evolves around four different decision cards. Those are:

Buy: allows the player to acquire new companies, resource and can also be converted to victory points through the central bank.

Activate: allows the player to activate his companies and produce more decision cards to enrich his deck with.

Hire: allows the player to temporarily use another player's company card by paying him half the production cost.

Obstacles: does nothing but through various company cards becomes a very useful card.

 Decision Card Back

Resource Cards 

After acquiring companies, a player needs to activate them in order to produce more decision cards for his deck and score their victory points when the game ends. Each company consumes resources and has a production cost the player must pay each time he wants to activate it. There are 5 basic resources. Personnel, Concrete, Steel, Paper and Energy. A player can purchase the first 4 from the Resource Market in order to activate companies. Energy can only be produced from the Power Plant which is the company each player begins the game with. After one of the resources is exhausted, a sixth resource enters the market, the Imported resource. They can be used as any basic resource but cost double to buy.









Briefcase is language independent. Everything is described through symbols.








All supporters of our funding campaign will be rewarded with exclusive promo material. These are limited promos, never to be sold or distributed elsewhere. If our campaign reaches its funding goal we will be rewarding all supporters with 5 exclusive promo Companies. That is 20 extra cards. Those are:

Shipyard

Multiplex
Model Agency 
Football Club  
Dot Com

We are happy to announce our first over-funding reward. If our campaign reaches $12.500, we will also offer a casino company set to all those have chosen promo-offering perks.

Casino
For more details on the offer and the rules, please click on the updates tab on the top of this page.

Make sure to spread the word because the more this campaign makes, the more you get.






Briefcase is scheduled for production around the middle of April 2012. This means that delivery  is expected within June of 2012.
The production of the game will be done in Germany's largest manufacturer ensuring the quality of the components.





The game will be dispatched from Greece for worldwide delivery.

For USA and Canada the game will be delivered through our local distributor.

We have a flat shipping cost for EU, USA and Canada which is included in the Perk level. 
  • Supporters from USA and Canada will be receiving the game through our local distributor which allows us to offer a shipping cost equal to EU. 
  • Supporters from all other countries should include $12 more in their payments because of the higher shipping costs.
  • Perks for individual copies of Briefcase include a flat cost of $15 for EU, USA and Canada for shipping, packaging and distributor fees.





Payments are processed through Paypal which ensures the security of your transaction and refund in case our funding goal isn't reached. That does not mean that you need to have a Paypal account nor that you have to create one. You can use any Credit Card.

Please note that the published product may have small differences regarding sizes or quantities because of production limitations.

Should you have any comments or questions, feel free to contact us at info@artipiagames.com or visit our website at www.artipiagames.com
                                                  

                                           Â© 2012 Artipia Games. All rights reserved.

story:
The goal of this fundraiser is to raise $100 to pay the Steam Greenlight fee. All leftover funds will go directly into the development of the game.


Rock Simulator is a free to play game. Therefore, we have no money to license our software. All money contributed toward this project will go directly toward the game.


Like Strange Panther Games on facebook and follow us @StrangePanther on twitter to keep updated!

story:
UPDATE: Unfortunately the campaign wasn't a success. :( But don't worry, I will continue to develop the game, but it will take a lot of time.

Best regards,

Viktor


 

Escape from our well-known world, forget its rules, cast the mundane roles off - and join us to fight for the revival of an olden marvelous land!        

In Moonshades, you roam through an underground world loaded with ancient myths and magic, embedded in a compelling story. Revelations and captivating missions await you among the nesting monsters—along with traps, tricks, hidden nooks and corners, spatial puzzles, challenging quests, and tactical combat.



The beta version available on the Google Play Store and tried by thousands of players, presented my very first ideas and the game's bearing! This is the beginning of a long road, one I’m hoping to follow with your help.

I want to thank you for all your support so far, for the many heartening responses and constructive criticism. I’m committed to making Moonshades the best game I possibly can.


Judging from the reviews, private messages, and rate of downloads, I believe that Moonshades will engage with more than a narrow circle of gamers. I hope the game will prove entertaining to a wide audience, while exciting nostalgia for past dungeon crawlers.



"I am a wizardry and might & magic fan and this could be the best first person dungeon crawler i have ever played..."

"So, in the ninteys I played eye of the beholder for about two years and never completed it due to its size and complexity. I see the same level of quality and detail in this game. It's left me wanting more both my son and myself have been loving it although the spiders creeped him out...​"

"After familiarizing yourself with the UI this is probably the best dungeon crawler I've played on mobile platforms, the interactivity with the dungeon is such a welcome feature. My only complaint is that there isn't more of it, can't wait for the full release!​"

 


 


    A once thriving kingdom, Harken is under siege by demons from another realm who appeared under the moon of Okrin, god of chaos and destruction—through portals of an unknown origin. The people of Harken tremble, rightly; those brave or foolish enough to stand in the demons’ path now lie lifeless on abandoned city streets. Any survivors are deep in hiding to the east, under the mountains of Greydawn, border to undiscovered lands.

    Under a blood red sky, two wanderers arrive to repel the horde and close the portals. They guard a secret. The demons give them a wide berth.

    Why?
     

    Find out in the complete game through gripping, rewarding gameplay.

    Walk into combat; decode puzzles; gather legendary, ethereal items. After hard-fought victories, study enigmatic surroundings, searching for traces of magic. Discover the last fractions of deep riddles. Stumble into desperate fights with bone-chilling bosses. Follow NPCs towards thrilling discoveries in the heavy gloom, into huge caverns or to vast treasure.

    You'll expand your characters however you want using experience points. Implant armour with miraculous gems or other ornaments—for wondrous effects if in the right constructions.

    Moonshades will use a grid-based 3D movement, its world viewed from a first-person perspective with ninety-degree turns and place-to-place movement.


    • A deep story and fabulous secrets
    • Engaging and detailed scenery: massive, cryptic dungeon environments & chilling
      outdoor areas.
    • Many NPCs to find out eclipsed options and colour the gameplay.
    • Pet-system
    • More puzzles and deadly traps.
    • Thousands of upgradable items from weapons to armour and accessories.
    • At least 90 devastating, protective or remedial spells and skills in battle.
    • A brand-new skill-tree.
    • Over a hundred different enemies.


    While working in a full-time job, I'm also an indie developer and gamer.

    Making Moonshades is the culmination of a long-felt desire since I was a child without a computer or smartphone, who could hardly wait to get to ‘dungeon’ parties, armed with dice, paper, pens, and my own tales. When Eye of the Beholder and Wizardry appeared, I was completely enchanted.

    I’ve longed to make a game in a mesmerising imaginary world with roots in those experiences. The beta meant diving head first into that world and I was thrilled to complete it in a relatively short time. Bringing the full game to life is a challenge, but I’m happy to start this adventure with you on Indiegogo.


    I’m developing Moonshades by myself, working steadily on the new chapters in my free time—but I'm alone and, simply put, am in a race against time! I have some savings to help me produce the finished game, but these will not last long.

    I’m on Indiegogo hoping to convince you to help me raise the funds needed to finish Moonshades, ensuring the highest possible quality. Capable graphic artists are expensive, as are animators, 3D modellers, concept artists, and programmers. I can get a certain distance on stock graphic packs, but these are not coherent in style or detail and are pricey if used for everything in the game. Instead, I’d like to find a ‘golden mean’ of more common assets and original work.

    If I reach my goal here on Indiegogo with your help, I’d also like to be able to afford original music, sound effects, and advertising. The campaign will help make these a reality.
     

     

    I will complete Moonshades whatever happens, but I’d love to be able to release the game sooner rather than at a date in an unforeseeable future, using only prefabricated assets.

    I’m committed to posting all progress on Moonshades frequently on this page, so you can see where any donations are going. Thank you very much indeed for all your support. It’s very much appreciated.


      If you’d consider sharing the link to my campaign here on Indiegogo, that would mean a great deal to me! I welcome your comments about Moonshades. Please feel free to contact me.
story_txt:
UPDATE: Unfortunately the campaign wasn't a success. :( But don't worry, I will continue to develop the game, but it will take a lot of time.
Best regards,
Viktor

 
Escape from our well-known world, forget its rules, cast the mundane roles off - and join us to fight for the revival of an olden marvelous land!        
In Moonshades, you roam through an underground world loaded with ancient myths and magic, embedded in a compelling story. Revelations and captivating missions await you among the nesting monsters—along with traps, tricks, hidden nooks and corners, spatial puzzles, challenging quests, and tactical combat.

The beta version available on the Google Play Store and tried by thousands of players, presented my very first ideas and the game's bearing! This is the beginning of a long road, one I’m hoping to follow with your help.
I want to thank you for all your support so far, for the many heartening responses and constructive criticism. I’m committed to making Moonshades the best game I possibly can.

Judging from the reviews, private messages, and rate of downloads, I believe that Moonshades will engage with more than a narrow circle of gamers. I hope the game will prove entertaining to a wide audience, while exciting nostalgia for past dungeon crawlers."I am a wizardry and might & magic fan and this could be the best first person dungeon crawler i have ever played..."
"So, in the ninteys I played eye of the beholder for about two years and never completed it due to its size and complexity. I see the same level of quality and detail in this game. It's left me wanting more both my son and myself have been loving it although the spiders creeped him out...​"
"After familiarizing yourself with the UI this is probably the best dungeon crawler I've played on mobile platforms, the interactivity with the dungeon is such a welcome feature. My only complaint is that there isn't more of it, can't wait for the full release!​"
 
 


A once thriving kingdom, Harken is under siege by demons from another realm who appeared under the moon of Okrin, god of chaos and destruction—through portals of an unknown origin. The people of Harken tremble, rightly; those brave or foolish enough to stand in the demons’ path now lie lifeless on abandoned city streets. Any survivors are deep in hiding to the east, under the mountains of Greydawn, border to undiscovered lands.Under a blood red sky, two wanderers arrive to repel the horde and close the portals. They guard a secret. The demons give them a wide berth.
Why? Find out in the complete game through gripping, rewarding gameplay.
Walk into combat; decode puzzles; gather legendary, ethereal items. After hard-fought victories, study enigmatic surroundings, searching for traces of magic. Discover the last fractions of deep riddles. Stumble into desperate fights with bone-chilling bosses. Follow NPCs towards thrilling discoveries in the heavy gloom, into huge caverns or to vast treasure.
You'll expand your characters however you want using experience points. Implant armour with miraculous gems or other ornaments—for wondrous effects if in the right constructions.
Moonshades will use a grid-based 3D movement, its world viewed from a first-person perspective with ninety-degree turns and place-to-place movement.


A deep story and fabulous secrets
Engaging and detailed scenery: massive, cryptic dungeon environments & chillingoutdoor areas.
Many NPCs to find out eclipsed options and colour the gameplay.
Pet-system
More puzzles and deadly traps.
Thousands of upgradable items from weapons to armour and accessories.
At least 90 devastating, protective or remedial spells and skills in battle.
A brand-new skill-tree.
Over a hundred different enemies.


While working in a full-time job, I'm also an indie developer and gamer.
Making Moonshades is the culmination of a long-felt desire since I was a child without a computer or smartphone, who could hardly wait to get to ‘dungeon’ parties, armed with dice, paper, pens, and my own tales. When Eye of the Beholder and Wizardry appeared, I was completely enchanted.
I’ve longed to make a game in a mesmerising imaginary world with roots in those experiences. The beta meant diving head first into that world and I was thrilled to complete it in a relatively short time. Bringing the full game to life is a challenge, but I’m happy to start this adventure with you on Indiegogo.

I’m developing Moonshades by myself, working steadily on the new chapters in my free time—but I'm alone and, simply put, am in a race against time! I have some savings to help me produce the finished game, but these will not last long.
I’m on Indiegogo hoping to convince you to help me raise the funds needed to finish Moonshades, ensuring the highest possible quality. Capable graphic artists are expensive, as are animators, 3D modellers, concept artists, and programmers. I can get a certain distance on stock graphic packs, but these are not coherent in style or detail and are pricey if used for everything in the game. Instead, I’d like to find a ‘golden mean’ of more common assets and original work.
If I reach my goal here on Indiegogo with your help, I’d also like to be able to afford original music, sound effects, and advertising. The campaign will help make these a reality.   
I will complete Moonshades whatever happens, but I’d love to be able to release the game sooner rather than at a date in an unforeseeable future, using only prefabricated assets.I’m committed to posting all progress on Moonshades frequently on this page, so you can see where any donations are going. Thank you very much indeed for all your support. It’s very much appreciated.


If you’d consider sharing the link to my campaign here on Indiegogo, that would mean a great deal to me! I welcome your comments about Moonshades. Please feel free to contact me.

story:
About the Game:

Equals is a strategic card game for 2-6 players that can also be used to help teach younger players mathematical skills. I have personally tested this with my own 6 year old who loves playing it!

Players take turns playing cards from their hands in an attempt to make the value of both sides of the playing field equal. Each time the sides are equaled the player receives points.

The first player to the designated point value wins the game!

I am currently waiting for my first proof of the game from the manufacturer and will update this campaign with pictures and more video when I receive it.

The game will retail for $14.99 plus s/h once the first production run has been made.

About Me:

I LOVE games, especially board games and card games. I love games so much that I've decided to try my hand at designing them.

I have lots of other game ideas and I look forward to getting these games into homes all across the U.S. starting with this project.

About the Campaign:

My goal with this campaign is to be able to make my first production run of 100 units.

$2000 will allow me to purchase all 100 production units as well as provide all perks, including shipping.

Thanks in advance for your contribution. Let's bring back family game night!

Dave Welch

PERK INFORMATION:

$10 - PDF Version: I will send you a pdf of the game rules as well as all the card faces so you can print your game out if you wish. Card backs will not be included, only the faces and rules will be in the pdf.

$15 - Game Pre-purchase: You will receive one of the games from my first production run. Perk includes shipping. Also includes all lower perks.

$25 - Signed Card Proof: You will receive a proof page of up to 8 card faces of your choosing with a thank you and signature from me. Also includes all lower perks.

$50 - My Next Game: You will receive a proof copy of my next game "Bombs & Bunkers." Also includes all lower perks.

$100 - Lifetime Thank You: Your name will be added to our Equals game deck as a Collaborator for every game that is printed... forever. (25 copies only) Also includes all lower perks.

$500 - Personal Instruction: I will personally teach you and your friends how to play the game in 1 skype call (up to 1 hour). (5 copies only) Also includes all lower perks.


Perks requiring delivery outside the US, please add $10 for shipping.
